companyOverview.html:
What We Are
We are the internet of things (IoT) startup for fish/shrimp farming, purely local, based on Bandung, full of action, all passion, no drama, no bullshit 
What We Do
We build a smart feeding solution that can automatically feed the fish, sense the fish’s appetite, and connected to the internet 
Why We Do It
We want to solve the biggest problem from one of the most crucial and fastest-growing industry in the world: aquaculture. We strive to help hundreds of millions of farmers globally by delivering this breakthrough, especially for people at the bottom of the pyramid. eFishery is trying to disrupt aquaculture industry and tackles global challenge in food security, creating real impacts for our mankind.

summary: Flexible working hours with free lunch for everyone
We're Indonesian leading Aquaculture IOT Tech Startup

jobDescription.html:
Your daily routine will be:
  • Build sustainable relationships and trust with customer accounts through open and interactive communication.
  • Handle customer complaints, provide appropriate solutions and alternatives within the time limits, follow up to ensure resolution.
  • Identifying and assessing customers’ needs to achieve satisfaction.
  • Provide accurate, valid and complete information by using the right methods/tools.
  • Keep records of customer interactions, process customer accounts and file documents.
  • Collaborate closely with other department in order to support expansion opportunities.
  • Maximize customers’ retention by taking the extra mile to engage customers.
You'll enjoy (or survive, depends on the case) if you:
  • Possess at least a Bachelor’s/Professional degree from reputable university.
  • Have exceptional communication and computer skills.
  • Have an extensive experience in customer success area for at least 2 years.
  • Love to continuous learn, have a friendly and professional demeanour, and will to work closely with farmers in various areas.

companyOverview.html:
Agate is an award-winning game developer based in Bandung, Indonesia.
It was founded in April 2009 by 18 passionate and ‘crazy’ founders. We focus on crafting high quality entertainment game as well as delivering serious games for corporate and brand via training games, advertising games, and education games.

Started from a humble premise of fun.
Agate has produced over 200 games and it has been played by over 5 million people from Indonesia and the world. Agate is powered by 100 talented and spirited crews on their mission to make the world a better place for everyone.

Playing at work and working to play.
Work hard, play hard. That’s the usual thing in our workplace. Agate is a great place to work. You can work, have fun, and play games from arcade to board game in our workplace. We also provide many great books to develop our crew’s skill and broaden their knowledge.

Explore the game industry with us.
Not just making games, Agate always wanted to create better ecosystem for local game industry. We have established the Agate Academy to provide courses materials, and curriculum about game development. we also have partnered up with 10 universities to help us develop young and fresh talents who are interested in the game industry.

REQUIREMENTS

  • Proficient in Microsoft Office especially Microsoft Excel.
  • Strong analytical skills.
  • English is a must (written and spoken)
  • Having knowledge with SAP will be an advantage
  • Have robust knowledge about tax will be an advatage

jobDescription.html:
RESPONSIBILITIES
  • Work with the CMO, business development, Marketing Communications and Brand teams to create and maintain a favorable public image. 
  • Create, manage, and execute PR strategies and tactics that actively pushes the company’s image, visibility, business development and products, including but not limited to: 
    • Creating, adhering to, and maintain public facing Company tone and points of view 
    • Writing press releases (English & Indonesian) 
    • Conducting internal audits and briefings to align company and brand voice, tone, and points of view. 
    • Fostering direct and friendly relations with journalists, editors, and other media stakeholders in Indonesia 
    • Fostering direct and friendly relations with game industry journalists, editors, and other game industry media stakeholders in Indonesia and internationally 
    • Fostering direct and friendly relations with game industry peers in marketing, PR, and corporate leadership in Indonesia and internationally 
    • Creating public and media events that serve company PR and marketing goals 
    • Proactively create PR engagement opportunities 
    • Create and maintain, an annual list of PR events, engagements, opportunities 
  • Create, maintain, and curate media lists and connections in Indonesia and abroad. 
  • Create, maintain, and curate industry connections in Indonesia and aboard. 
  • Represent the company in interviews, press conferences, presentations, and any other public facing engagements. 
  • Provide feedback and advice to external facing company initiatives (marketing, PR or otherwise) to align with company PR strategies and initiatives 
ADMINISTRATIVE REQUIREMENTS
  • Must not currently active in school or college
  • Able to work full-time at Agate 
REQUIREMENTS
  • Must be able to write competently in English and Indonesian 
  • Must be able to communicate effectively in English and Indonesian 
  • Must have excellent written and verbal communication skills 
  • Strong interpersonal skills to engage and develop mutually beneficial relationships in the field. 
  • Must have an understanding of the game industry, its PR and business practices 
  • Excellent proactive and reactive management skills 
  • Able to negotiate, present, and network effectively with an international audience 
  • Strong work ethic and a self-starter mindset 
PLUSES
  • Extensive personal networks in the game industry, media, and marketing 
  • Active social media presence and reach 
  • Proven examples of PR activities during a game launch

jobDescription.html:
If you are passionate in creating art using your strokes of brushes – then you might be interested in becoming a 2D artist. As a 2D Artist, you will be involved in visualizing the game concepts and creating the final 2D art assets that will be used in the game.
Some of  a 2D artist’s tasks in a game development process are:
  • Creating concept arts based on the ideas and feel from the game design: characters, environments, etc.
  • Creating 2D Animation for character
  • Making Visual effects to polish the game feel and look
  • Creating the Graphic al User Interface (GUI)
  • Making illustrations
  • Making textures for 3D models
ADMINISTRATIVE REQUIREMENTS
  • Must not currently active in school or college
  • Able to work full-time at Agate HQ (Bandung, Indonesia)
  • Fresh graduate are welcome
2D ARTIST REQUIREMENTS
  • Proficiency in digital drawing programs: raster (such as Photoshop or GIMP), and/or vector (such as Illustrator).
  • Able to create good quality 2D animation (sprite and/or Flash tween animation).
  • A good skill and sense in creating concept sketches (in traditional or digital media).
  • Knowledge and good sense in art basics.
  • Good teamwork, good communicating skills, self-motivated.
  • Passion for creating and playing video games, such as: will pursue perfection in creating art needed for the game.
  • Passion to push your skills to the next level.
  • Variations in art styles.
PLUSES
  • A minimum 2 year of experience in creating art for game development, or other art fields that related to creating illustrations, or 2D animation.
  • Familiar with 3D programs.
  • Strong traditional art.
Every applicant must send portfolio in digital format or link to your portfolio website.
Please state the year of creation in each of your art submittance in your portofolio or portofolio website.
Also state the role you take part in the art if it involved many people such as creating GUI, character design, etc.

jobDescription.html:
RESPONSIBILITIES
  • Make 3D models from 2D concepts
  • Experience in converting 3d models to engines (understand basic pivots, scales, export import, modifiers, etc.)
  • Advanced in low poly modeling and rigging
  • Basic Unwrap Capabilities
ADMINISTRATIVE REQUIREMENTS
  •  Not currently active in school or college
  • Able to work full-time at Agate HQ (Bandung, Indonesia)
REQUIREMENTS
  • Fresh graduate are welcome
  • A gamer, your passion for video games is what drove you to the industry
  • Are fluently using 3D software (3dsmax, maya, blender, etc) and 2D software(photoshop, etc)
  • Familiar with stylized art direction
  • Experienced in creating character concept
  • Fast speed in sketching and presenting early ideas
  • Able to communicate designed concept pieces clearly
  • Passionate to explore new 3D workflow and pipeline to achieve the best and efficient result
  • Had knowledge and experience in the 3D game development project is a big plus
PLUSES:
  •  Able to paint stylized texture
TERMS:
  • This is a fulltime position, not a part-time, so you can’t do other work such as freelance or other contract works.
  • This is an onsite position, which means that you are required to work in Jakarta, there a no possibility for remote work
  • Every applicant must send the portfolio in digital format or link to your portfolio website.
  • Please state the year of creation in each of your portfolio or website portfolios.
MAKE SURE YOUR PORTFOLIO INCLUDES :
  • Beautiful Pose, Final Rendered Model, Wireframe 3D Model and Texture
  • Animation demo that shows your best animation skill (In video format)
  • Please include your best 2D art (illustration, concept, texture)

companyOverview.html:
Kami menghimbau agar Anda berhati-hati saat melamar  pekerjaan dengan selalu memastikan iklan lowongan tersebut sesuai dengan profil perusahaannya. 
Waspadalah jika Anda menemukan hal-hal di bawah ini :
• PT Combiphar tidak pernah memungut biaya apapun dalam proses rekrutmen.
• PT Combiphar tidak pernah bekerja sama dengan travel agent / biro perjalanan tertentu dalam proses  rekrutmen.
• Apabila Anda diminta untuk membayar sejumlah uang dalam bentuk pembayaran tiket pesawat dan hotel atau  akomodasi lainnya agar diabaikan.
• Apabila ada Panggilan wawancara di lokasi yang tidak sesuai dengan iklan yang tertera pada iklan lowongan.
• Jangan memberikan data pribadi atau data keuangan Anda kepada siapapun.
Combiphar was founded in 1971 as a home industry in Bandung, West Java producing antibiotics, analgesics and the legendary OBH Combi cough syrup. In 1983, a larger manufacturing facility was established in Padalarang, West Java to support its growth. 
In 1985, two important figures in the development of the pharmaceutical industry in Indonesia, DR. Biantoro Wanandi - Doctor of Natural Sciences from Swiss Federal Institute of Technology in Zurich Switzerland who also served as Chief, Drug Policies and Management Unit at the World Health Organization (WHO) and Bapak Hamadi Widjaja - a graduate from INSEAD Fountainebleau in France, started a new era in Combiphar with one huge vision: to provide better access to the public through quality medicine. Through their leadership, Combiphar continued to grow and expand through a focused strategy and keen ability to take advantage of the opportunities even during the economic turbulence, a period which marked a significant turning point particularly in the history of OBH Combi’s nation-wide growth.
In response to Company’s increasingly rapid growth potential, Combiphar’s new vision “Championing a Healthy Tomorrow” has given birth to numerous business expansion opportunities outside of its main focus in prescription and over-the-counter categories, allowing the company to enter new business growth opportunities in nutrition and bio-research. 
Through the years, Combiphar has successfully established cooperation with international pharmaceutical companies from 18 countries across the globe, and today, is a trusted partner for these multi-national companies through licensing agreement and joint-venture. Through these partnerships, Combiphar undergoes regular quality control audits and is routinely equipped with the newest training and skills from its international counterparts, further strengthening its foundation in prioritizing the highest in quality.

companyOverview.html:
The group of companies that is today known as MENSA GROUP started through the establishment of PT Menjangan Sakti by its founder - Mr. Jimmy Sudharta in April 1975. The company started its business in trading raw material for pharmaceutical industry throughout Indonesia. Within a short period, the company expanded its business and diversified its activity covering cosmetic, food and feed industries. Continuous growth of PT Menjangan Sakti, has provided the company ability and resources to expand in related business. Since 1981, PT Menjangan Sakti has started to acquire some companies and formed a group business known as Mensa Group. Now, Mensa Group comprises of several companies with diversified activity such as importing and trading pharmaceutical raw materials, food, feed and cosmetics; pharmaceutical manufacturing, medical supplies and dental equipment manufacturing; pharmaceutical' hospital / medical supplies, consumer goods distribution and healthcare service. The group employs approximately 6500 employees for running its business and established a solid distribution network throughout Indonesia as an asset for further growth.
History
The group of companies that is today known as MENSA GROUP started through the establishment of PT Menjangan Sakti by its founder – Mr. Jimmy Sudharta in April 1975. The company started its business by trading pharmaceutical raw materials throughout Indonesia. With time the company expanded its business and diversified its activity to include the cosmetic, food and feed industries. Continuous growth of PT Menjangan Sakti has provided the company the ability and resources to expand into related business. Starting 1981, PT Menjangan Sakti acquired several other companies in related activity including pharmaceutical manufacturing companies and Distribution Company, forming what is today known as Mensa Group. Mensa Group comprises of several companies with diversified activity such as: - importing and trading pharmaceutical raw materials including food, feed and cosmetics; - pharmaceutical manufacturing ; - medical supplies and dental equipment manufacturing; - Pharmaceutical, hospital / medical supplies, consumer goods distribution and healthcare service. The group employs approximately 6500 employees, and main aim in the near future is to establish a solid synergy between the companies and amongst other to develop a nationwide distribution network as an asset for further growth.
Product & Services
Mensa Group, comprises of several companies with diversified activity such as import, export and trading pharmaceutical raw materials, food, feed, and cosmetic; generic pharmaceutical manufacturing, medical supplies and dental equipment manufacturing, pharmaceutical; hospital/medical supplies, consumer goods distribution and healthcare service. This website will act as a portal that links to all the companies within Mensa Group.

jobDescription.html:
R&D Manager

Job Desc :
1. Melaksanakan koordinasi dan pembagian tugas dan pelaksanaan kerja di setiap seksi.
2. Menyusun rancangan atau desain untuk penelitian dan pengembangan produk baru dan reformulasi produk lama sesuai dengan data-data penunjang yang memadai.
3. Memeriksa dan menandatangani catatan pengolahan batch, catatan pengemasan batch, pedoman baku pengujian untuk bahan baku, bahan kemas dan obat jadi, protokol dan laporan validasi metode atau proses, protokol dan laporan uji stabilita serta dokumen mutu lainnya dalam menunjang dokumentasi dalam lingkup tugas departemen penelitian dan pengembangan.
4. Memonitoring pelaksanaan penelitian dan pengembangan agar berjalan secara efektif dan efisien.
5. Melakukan evaluasi kebenaran pelaksanaan dan hasil percobaan yang dilaksanakan di setiap seksi.
6. Memonitoring keseluruhan kerja agar ketertiban di lingkungan Departemen Litbang dapat terjaga dengan baik.
7. Melaksanakan review bulanan tentang progress pelaksanaan penelitian dan pengembangan produk baru maupun reformulasi produk lama.
8. Menyusun laporan bulanan yang mendata progress, pencapaian, dan permasalahan dalam pelaksanaan penelitian dan pengembangan produk baru maupun reformulasi produk lama.
9. Melaksanakan koordinasi dengan Departemen terkait (Produksi, Logistik, Pengawasan Mutu dan Pemastian Mutu serta Pengembangan Bisnis).
10. Menyusun rencana kebutuhan alat (capital expenses) dan operasional expenses dalam menunjang pelaksanaan penelitian dan pengembangan, dilengkapi dengan data spesifikasi yang sesuai.
Kriteria :
1. Minimal lulusan sarjana farmasi atau apoteker
2. Memiliki pengalaman kerja di bidang R&D minimal 6 tahun
3. Menguasai CPOB terkini
4. Memahami sarana-sarana penunjang perusahaan (sistem air, sistem tata udara, steam,
               sistem udara tekan, sistem gas (N2, O2, LPG)
5. Menguasai validasi dan kualifikasi.
6. Menguasai pembuatan dan analisa kontrak.
7. Menguasai cara menyeleksi dan mengevaluasi vendor.
8. Memiliki pengetahuan tentang keselamatan di tempat kerja.
9. Memahami konsep Manajemen Mutu ISO 9001: 2008, HSE, GLP (ISO17025).
10. Mampu melakukan project management.

companyOverview.html:
Agate is an award-winning game developer based in Bandung, Indonesia.
It was founded in April 2009 by 18 passionate and ‘crazy’ founders. We focus on crafting high quality entertainment game as well as delivering serious games for corporate and brand via training games, advertising games, and education games.

Started from a humble premise of fun.
Agate has produced over 200 games and it has been played by over 5 million people from Indonesia and the world. Agate is powered by 100 talented and spirited crews on their mission to make the world a better place for everyone.

Playing at work and working to play.
Work hard, play hard. That’s the usual thing in our workplace. Agate is a great place to work. You can work, have fun, and play games from arcade to board game in our workplace. We also provide many great books to develop our crew’s skill and broaden their knowledge.

Explore the game industry with us.
Not just making games, Agate always wanted to create better ecosystem for local game industry. We have established the Agate Academy to provide courses materials, and curriculum about game development. we also have partnered up with 10 universities to help us develop young and fresh talents who are interested in the game industry.

jobDescription.html:
Agate is looking for Associate Product Managers to own, ship & run products at rocket speed. It’s a fast-paced, high-adrenaline job, with plenty to learn and build. You will be working closely with more senior Product Managers in Agate who you can learn a lot from. This position is well suited for people who search for experience in Product Management.
If you enjoy crunching numbers, are never satisfied with the products around you, and have always wanted to build things your way, you’ll love this job.
Responsibilities
  • This is a hands-on leadership role that includes end-to-end ownership of the product road map, writing game/feature specs, analyzing key performance metrics and driving business results.
Requirements
  • Quite simply, we’re looking for smart, creative product people who can drive results quickly, at high quality
  • Bachelor’s degree in a technical field or MBA is preferred; fresh graduates are welcome to apply
  • We care most about learning and growth, if you really like to learn and grow, this is a perfect role for you
  • Ability to prioritize ruthlessly, and willingness to get your hands dirty
  • It would help if you had an appreciation for the finer details of product design & usability
  • It would really help if you had prior experience with web/mobile consumer products
  • It would really, really help if you demonstrated product leadership in the past (doesn’t have to be a Product Manager)

PT. Indovisual Presentatama telah berdiri selama 18 tahun lebih sampai dengan sekarang. Didirikan pada tahun 1999, profil dari PT. Indovisual Presentatama adalah sebagai perusahaan yang menyediakan referensi untuk model sukses dan mengesankan dari segi audio visual perusahaan di Indonesia. Indovisual memulai bisnis sebagai sebuah perusahaan dengan tenaga kerja hanya dua karyawan, namun kini PT. Indovisual Presentatama telah menjadi pemain industri terbesar dan bereputasi di industri audio visual. Dengan anda bermitra dengan Indovisual, Anda akan yakin bahwa segala pertanyaan Anda, kebutuhan atau bahkan permintaan anda akan dijawab oleh seorang individu yang tahu Anda dan organisasi Anda secara tangan pertama. Dilengkapi dengan sertifikasi spesialis teknis dan dukungan fasilitas dan off-situs yang komprehensif, tim kami yang selalu ada setiap kali Anda memerlukan kami.

Agate has produced over 200 games and it has been played by over 5 million people from Indonesia and the world. Agate is powered by 100 talented and spirited crews on their mission to make the world a better place for everyone.

Playing at work and working to play.
Work hard, play hard. That’s the usual thing in our workplace. Agate is a great place to work. You can work, have fun, and play games from arcade to board game in our workplace. We also provide many great books to develop our crew’s skill and broaden their knowledge.

Explore the game industry with us.
Not just making games, Agate always wanted to create better ecosystem for local game industry. We have established the Agate Academy to provide courses materials, and curriculum about game development. we also have partnered up with 10 universities to help us develop young and fresh talents who are interested in the game industry.

jobDescription.html:
As a producer, you are responsible to support the development team to create games based on the vision for the game

  • Coordinate the development team that consists of different disciplines: art, game design, technical, etc.

  • Assist other departments (marketing, product development, etc) for development related tasks
REQUIREMENTS
  • Have passion in the game industry and digital industry as a whole
  • Had experience in project management in digital industry (software, game, animation, or comic), conventional industry (event organizer, contractor), or other organization (NGO, academic).
  • Have an understanding about how a game is made and know what needs to happen and when
  • Excellent communication skills, written and oral, both in Indonesian and English.
  • Able to prioritize task based on the impact to the game being developed
  • Works well despite pressures or tight schedule
ADMINISTRATIVE REQUIREMENTS
  • Must not currently active in school or college
  • Able to work full-time at Agate Studio HQ (Bandung, Indonesia)

companyOverview.html:
PT. KASOEM PIONER OPTIK
BE THE PART OF THE TEAM WITH PASSION FOR KNOWLEDGE, PEOPLE & SERVICE
 

PT. KASOEM PIONER OPTIK, pada awal berdirinya bermula dari divisi Optik yaitu pada tahun 1939 dengan nama A. Kasoem Optical. Pemiliknya yaitu Bapak Kasoem adalah Pria pribumi pertama asal Garut Jawa Barat yang berhasil mendirikan pabrik  LENSA pertama di Indonesia dan mendapatkan penghargaan sebagai Perintis Pendiri Pabrik Lensa Pribumi dan mendapatkan Gelar Pioner dari Department Perdagangan Indonesia saat itu dan berganti nama menjadi A. Kasoem Pioner Optik.
Pada tahun 1988, mengembangkan bisnis dengan mendirikan divisi Alat Bantu Dengar (Divisi Auidologi) dengan nama A. Kasoem Hearing & Speech Center. Semula Divisi ini hanyalah sebagai Toko Penyedia Alat Bantu Dengar saja. Dalam masa evolusi setelah 26 tahun, divisi Audiologi ini tumbuh dan berkembang sangat pesat hingga memiliki 19 cabang di kota-kota besar di seluruh Indonesia dan menjadi Perusahaan Audiologi pertama yang mengusung konsep One Stop Solution bagi masyarakat yang mengalami gangguan dengar. Pelayanan A. Kasoem meliputi : konsultasi pendengaran, pemberian informasi mengenai gangguan dengar, pemasangan alat bantu dengar dan penjualan alat bantu dengar, terapi berbahasa dan purna jual yang keseluruhan pelayanan berada dalam supervisi para tenaga ahli yang selalu memperbaharui ilmu di bidangnya.
Staff kami berasal dari berbagai disiplin Ilmu. Dengan didukung oleh para Ahli di bidang Audiologi dan Akustik bersertifikat dan  Strata 2 dari Philipine, London dan Amerika, kami memberikan pelatihan khusus bagi seluruh calon karyawan dari berbagai disiplin ilmu, untuk menciptakan tenaga-tenaga yang handal yang mampu memberikan pelayanan terbaik dan optimal bagi seluruh pelanggan.  
Tahun 2018, A. Kasoem Hearing & Speech Center akan melakukan pengembangan bisnis dengan membuka cabang-cabang baru di kota-kota besar di Indonesia.
Manfaatkan peluang berkarir dan menjadi professional untuk menjadi bagian dari keluarga besar A. Kasoem Hearing & Speech Center.

PT. Eureka Logistics 
Solusi logistik untuk perusahaan yang memproduksi dan mendistribusikan produknya di Indonesia.
Eureka Logistics memiliki 50 unit kendaraan dan berbagai variasi jenis kendaraan seperti L300 Box, CDE (Colt Diesel Engkel), CDD (Colt Diesel Double), Engkel Fuso 6 Tire, Tronton Wingbox dan Trailer Wingbox dalam melayani pengiriman area Jawa dan pengiriman luar Jawa melalui kirim darat, kirim laut dan kirim udara.
Pengiriman Darat
Pelayanan menggunakan transportasi darat dengan 50 unit kendaraan dan berbagai variasi jenis kendaraan yang telah dilengkapi GPS dan Sistem ERP dalam melayani pengiriman area Jawa dan pengiriman luar Jawa.
Pengiriman Laut
Pelayanan menggunakan transportasi laut untuk pengiriman luar Jawa menggunakan fasilitas Less Truck Load (LTL) dan Full Truck Load (FTL) yang melayani pengaturan pengiriman atau transportasi Door To Door(DTD), Door To Port (DTP), Port To Door (PTD) dan Port To Port (PTP) seperti jenis kapal Roro, kapal Pelni, dan cargo keseluruh wilayah Indonesia.
Pengiriman Udara
Pelayanan menggunakan transportasi udara dalam pengirman luar negeri maupun dalam negeri, pengiriman kesuluruh wilayah Indonesia.

What We Are
We are the internet of things (IoT) startup for fish/shrimp farming, purely local, based on Bandung, full of action, all passion, no drama, no bullshit 
What We Do
We build a smart feeding solution that can automatically feed the fish, sense the fish’s appetite, and connected to the internet 
Why We Do It
We want to solve the biggest problem from one of the most crucial and fastest-growing industry in the world: aquaculture. We strive to help hundreds of millions of farmers globally by delivering this breakthrough, especially for people at the bottom of the pyramid. eFishery is trying to disrupt aquaculture industry and tackles global challenge in food security, creating real impacts for our mankind.

summary: Flexible working hours with free lunch for everyone
We're Indonesian leading Aquaculture IOT Tech Startup

Work hard, play hard. That’s the usual thing in our workplace. Agate is a great place to work. You can work, have fun, and play games from arcade to board game in our workplace. We also provide many great books to develop our crew’s skill and broaden their knowledge.

companyOverview.html:
FKS Group is a South-East Asian holding company focused on food, energy and property.
Its companies combine a strong commitment to logistics and infrastructure with deep domestic and international understanding to realize the potential of businesses and people across the region.
The Group’s commitment is strengthened by more than 40 years of experience and expertise that extends globally to sourcing, manufacturing, refining, logistics, shipping, financing, risk management as well as trading logistics, shipping, financing, risk management as well as trading.
Rapidly growing, FKS Group is focusing on import, trading, process and distribution of physical grain commodities such as food and feed in Indonesia. As the number one importer and distributor of soybean and soybean meal in Indonesia, the Group handles huge supply chain volume in both food and feed sectors.
FKS Group strives to exceed stakeholders’ expectation and investment by ensuring a continued growth of the Group and developing employee’s competencies. The Group’s significant interests in sugar refineries, energy and property developments are managed by the subsidiaries.
For more information please visit www.fksgroup.com

companyOverview.html:
PERUSAHAAN KAMI
Sejak tahun 2010, PT. Karya Putra Nusantara Perkasa bergerak dibidang jasa penyedian dan man supply serta pengelolaan sumber daya manusia. PT. Karya Putra Nusantara Perkasa adalah perusahaan nasional perseroan terbatas dikelola secara langsung oleh berbagai macam profesi dan ahli terakreditasi serta berpengalaman secara global dari berbagai macam organisasi. Memulai pengalaman manajemen selama ini. Banyak kendala-kendala yang dihadapi tentang permasalahan sumber daya manusia (tenaga kerja), bak dalam daya mendapatkan sumber daya manusia / tenaga kerja yamg potensial dan cost –cost yang dilkeluarkan serta pengelolaan lanjutannya.
Berdasarkan pengalaman tersebut, manajemen berusaha mencari dan memikirkan solusi yang terbaik, dengan kerja keras manajemen akhirnya menemukan titik yang langsung dipraktekan dilingkungan sendiri dan memang membuahkan hasil yang optimal, dengan demikian manajemen melihat peluang yang ingin diberikan kepada PT. Karya Putra Nusantara Perkasa yang bergerak dibidang Man Power Service dan pemberian nama tersebut dimanifestasikan dari usahanya mencari suatu solusi memecahkan masalah yang dihadapi yang akhirnya membuahkan hasil suatu mitra dan yang diharapkan karya tersebut menjadi suatu kemandirian bagi dunia bisnis untuk menjadi yang utama.

companyOverview.html:
Established in 1996, PT Erajaya Swasembada Tbk. (“Erajaya”) has grown beyond an integrated mobile telecommunication device importer, distributor and retailer, where the Company is also acknowledged as the largest and most trusted companies in its business in Indonesia.
Erajaya engages in the distribution and retail of mobile telecommunication devices, such as mobile phones and tablets, subscriber identity module card (SIM Card), mobile network operator voucher top-up, accessories, and gadgets such as computers and other electronic devices.
By the end of 2011, Erajaya executed initial public offering (IPO) corporate action by offering 31.7% of its shares. With ERAA ticker code, Erajaya is officially listed as Issuer at Indonesia Stock Exchange.
In September 2012, PT Eralink International, one of Erajaya’s majority shareholders released another 8.3% shares ownership to public that brought final shares ownership owned by public to 40.03% as end of 2012.
Erajaya has built strategic partnership with various distinguished global brands, in addition, the Company also ditributes Venera, a product of Erajaya. The Company, further, also cooperates with credible network operators in Indonesia for their products distribution.

companyOverview.html:
FinAccel is a fun, fast growing company with lofty ambitions. Starting with instant ecommerce financing, we are on a goal to disrupt unsecured lending in Southeast Asia, one of the fastest growing economic regions globally.
The company leverages deep data analytics across users’ digital footprint to automate credit risk scoring and access to credit in Southeast Asia, the 7th largest economy in the world.
Our flagship product, Kredivo Buy now, Pay later, enables e-commerce buyers to apply and qualify for instant credit and pay back over time. Merchants using Kredivo benefit from providing point-of-sale financing using a 2-click checkout to eligible buyers. FinAccel is backed by leading investors and regulated by OJK in Indonesia.
To know more about FinAccel and Kredivo, visit www.finaccel.co and www.kredivo.com.
Here is our latest press coverage:
https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2019-12-02/singapore-app-lending-startup-scores-500-million-valuation

companyOverview.html:
Agate is an award-winning game developer based in Bandung, Indonesia.
It was founded in April 2009 by 18 passionate and ‘crazy’ founders. We focus on crafting high quality entertainment game as well as delivering serious games for corporate and brand via training games, advertising games, and education games.

Started from a humble premise of fun.
Agate has produced over 200 games and it has been played by over 5 million people from Indonesia and the world. Agate is powered by 100 talented and spirited crews on their mission to make the world a better place for everyone.

Playing at work and working to play.
Work hard, play hard. That’s the usual thing in our workplace. Agate is a great place to work. You can work, have fun, and play games from arcade to board game in our workplace. We also provide many great books to develop our crew’s skill and broaden their knowledge.

Explore the game industry with us.
Not just making games, Agate always wanted to create better ecosystem for local game industry. We have established the Agate Academy to provide courses materials, and curriculum about game development. we also have partnered up with 10 universities to help us develop young and fresh talents who are interested in the game industry.

companyOverview.html:
PENGUMUMAN :
  • PT Garudafood Putra Putri Jaya Tbk tidak pernah memungut biaya apapun dalam proses rekrutmen.
  • PT Garudafood Putra Putri Jaya Tbk tidak pernah bekerja sama dengan travel agent / biro perjalanan tertentu dalam proses rekrutmen.
  • Apabila Anda diminta untuk membayar sejumlah uang dalam bentuk pembayaran tiket pesawat dan hotel atau akomodasi lainnya agar diabaikan.
  • Jangan memberikan data pribadi atau data keuangan Anda kepada siapapun.
  • Jika membutuhkan klarifikasi lebih lanjut dapat langsung menghubungi PT Garudafood Putra Putri Jaya Tbk
============================================================================
GarudaFood is a food and beverage company subordinated of Tudung Group. In addition to GarudaFood, Tudung Group also subordinates in Agribusiness companies operating ini Crude Palm Oil field and Peanuts.
GarudaFood Group had originated from PT Tudung, it was established in Pati, Central Java. The company founder is the deceased Darmo Putro, ex-warrior who had chosen to engage in business sector after the independence of Indonesia. In early of 1987, TPJ started selling its peanut production products using a brand of Kacang Garing Garuda, which was recently known as: Kacang Garuda. Kacang Garuda earned the following awards: Indonesian Customer Satisfaction Award (ICSA) under the category of branded peanut for eight times consecutively (2000-2007); Superbrands (2003); Top Brand for Kids (2004); Indonesian Best Brand Award (IBBA, 2004-2007); Top Brand (2007). When national economy suffered from economic crisis, on December 1997, PT GarudaFood Jaya (GFJ) was established, producing Gery-branded biscuit. Gery Saluut earned Indonesian Best Brand Award (IBBA) from MARS and SWA Magazine for a period of 2005-2010 under the category of wafer salut. In 2007-2010 Gery Chocolatos earned IBBA under the category of wafer stick. In 1998 GarudaFood acquired PT Triteguh Manunggal Sejati (TRMS), producer of jelly and launched jelly product using brands of Okky and Keffy. Achievement of Okky jelly has been proven by its successfulness in earning Top Brand for Kids (TBK) Award 2004 under the category of jelly. In addition to TBK, OKKY Jelly also managed to earn IBBA (2005-2010). Okky jelly Drink also earned Top Brand Award 2007-2010 from Marketing Magazine in cooperation with Frontier. In the end of 2002, TRMS launched jelly beverage products with a brand of Okky Jelly Drink and it also constituted a new phase for GarudaFood to deal with beverages business. Seriousness of GarudaFood in focusing on beverages business had also become apparent by the launching of Mountea, fruit-flavored tea beverage. Mountea had even been awarded by IBBA 2007-2010 under the category of tea beverage in cup packaging. GarudaFood also produces Snack with a brand of Leo, for category of Potato chips, banana chips, cassava chips products initiated from the end of 2005. In 2007-2010 Leo earned IBBA award for category of potato chips. In national level, GarudaFood is also positively perceived as one of the admired food and beverage companies. Survey made by Frontier and BusinessWeek Indonesia Magazine in Jakarta and Surabaya in 2006-2010 indicated that GarudaFood was in the third position of Indonesian Most Admired Company (IMAC). GarudaFood also actively performs corporate social responsibility (CSR) under the flag of GarudaFood Sehati. To accelerate the achievement of its vision, in 2011 GarudaFood Group with non-alcohol divion of  Suntory Beverage & Food, a company from Japan established a subsidiary PT Garuda Suntory Beverage, focused on the development of the beverage. Now, all potencies supported by 20 thousands knowledge workers have become main asset to GarudaFood in the effort to go forward to meet a success as sustainable enterprise.

companyOverview.html:
PERUSAHAAN KAMI
Sejak tahun 2010, PT. Karya Putra Nusantara Perkasa bergerak dibidang jasa penyedian dan man supply serta pengelolaan sumber daya manusia. PT. Karya Putra Nusantara Perkasa adalah perusahaan nasional perseroan terbatas dikelola secara langsung oleh berbagai macam profesi dan ahli terakreditasi serta berpengalaman secara global dari berbagai macam organisasi. Memulai pengalaman manajemen selama ini. Banyak kendala-kendala yang dihadapi tentang permasalahan sumber daya manusia (tenaga kerja), bak dalam daya mendapatkan sumber daya manusia / tenaga kerja yamg potensial dan cost –cost yang dilkeluarkan serta pengelolaan lanjutannya.
Berdasarkan pengalaman tersebut, manajemen berusaha mencari dan memikirkan solusi yang terbaik, dengan kerja keras manajemen akhirnya menemukan titik yang langsung dipraktekan dilingkungan sendiri dan memang membuahkan hasil yang optimal, dengan demikian manajemen melihat peluang yang ingin diberikan kepada PT. Karya Putra Nusantara Perkasa yang bergerak dibidang Man Power Service dan pemberian nama tersebut dimanifestasikan dari usahanya mencari suatu solusi memecahkan masalah yang dihadapi yang akhirnya membuahkan hasil suatu mitra dan yang diharapkan karya tersebut menjadi suatu kemandirian bagi dunia bisnis untuk menjadi yang utama.

Geekseat is an Australian owned and managed IT Consultant company. Our software developers are all employees of Geekseat and are located in our development centres in Indonesia.

companyOverview.html:
What We Are
We are the internet of things (IoT) startup for fish/shrimp farming, purely local, based on Bandung, full of action, all passion, no drama, no bullshit 
What We Do
We build a smart feeding solution that can automatically feed the fish, sense the fish’s appetite, and connected to the internet 
Why We Do It
We want to solve the biggest problem from one of the most crucial and fastest-growing industry in the world: aquaculture. companyOverview.html:
Kami menghimbau agar Anda berhati-hati saat melamar  pekerjaan dengan selalu memastikan iklan lowongan tersebut sesuai dengan profil perusahaannya.
Waspadalah jika Anda menemukan hal-hal di bawah ini :

• PT Transpacific Finance tidak pernah memungut biaya apapun dalam proses rekrutmen.
• PT Transpacific Finance tidak pernah bekerja sama dengan travel agent / biro perjalanan tertentu dalam proses  rekrutmen.
• Apabila Anda diminta untuk membayar sejumlah uang dalam bentuk pembayaran tiket pesawat dan hotel atau  akomodasi lainnya agar diabaikan.
• Apabila ada Panggilan wawancara di lokasi yang tidak sesuai dengan iklan yang tertera pada iklan lowongan.
• Jangan memberikan data pribadi atau data keuangan Anda kepada siapapun.
PT Transpacific Finance was established in 1994 with the first name as PT Transpacific Mutual Finance Corporation. After changing the company names for several times, the company changed its name into PT Transpacific Finance in 2006 which has been approved by the Ministry of Finance through the Letter of Decision KEP-032/KM.5/2006.
PT Transpacific Finance is an Independent Finance Company which its primary activity is to provide financial solutions to the customers in the form of leasing financing, factoring financing, and consumer financing for new and used vehicle ownership.
With the support of the new management and a reliable resource, PT Transpacific Finance is always committed to provide financial solutions according to the customer needs by providing a quick process, flexible and professional services.
It is proven from the awards received by the company from Infobank Multifinance Awards for 2013, 2014, and 2017 successively. In addition, an award from Indonesian Financial Services Association (IFSA) as the Best Finance Company 2013 for Total Assets Under Rp 500 Billion Category.
Currently, PT Transpacific Finance focuses in developing business in Jabotabek and Bandung through the office outlets located in Jakarta, Tangerang, Depok, and Bandung. The management is committed to provide the best financial solutions for the customers, but keep prioritizing the principles of prudence and compliance with the regulations. PT Transpacific Finance has been registered and supervised by the Financial Services Authority (OJK).

companyOverview.html:
PT. Ayo Media Network
Merupakan perusahaan multimedia yang berkantor pusat di Bandung. PT. Ayo Media Network memiliki beberapa news portal yaitu ayobandung.com, ayobekasi.net, ayobogor.com, ayocirebon.com, ayopurwakarta.com, ayotasik.com, ayosemarang.com, dan ayohotel.co.
AyoBandung.com
Mengakses berita melalui internet sudah menjadi gaya hidup yang tak terelakkan. Seiring dengan arus itulah, kami mencoba hadir untuk melengkapi pilihan dan kebutuhan pembaca, berharap membuat hidup Anda makin berwarna.
Mengapa AyoBandung.com?
Tak dipungkiri lokalitas dan kecintaan pada tempat berpijak atau berasal sejatinya ada di setiap diri manusia. Karena itu segenap peristiwa, kabar atau kehebohan akan selalu menarik bagi mereka yang terlibat di dalamnya.
Mencoba memenuhi kebutuhan dan kerinduan akan kabar dan cerita-cerita tempat bernaung inilah AyoBandung.com hadir dengan menawarkan konten situs berita yang bisa anda akses kapanpun dan di manapun.
Namun sejalan dengan semangat untuk memberikan yang terbaik bagi Bandung tercinta tentu saja kami tak cuma menawarkan berita.
Kami juga mencoba menawarkan persaudaraan dan kebersamaan, karena kami juga memberikan ruang yang sangat luas untuk informasi kegiatan masyarakat dan komunitas di Kota Bandung.
Ekspansi PT. Ayo Media Network
Saat ini, Ayo Media Network sedang bersiap untuk ekspansi ke level nasional dengan membuka dan mengembangkan produk baru di sejumlah daerah.
Jadi, mimpi besar kami semoga AyoBandung.com dan produk situs web lainnya, khususnya news portal tak hanya menjadi tempat mencari berita, tetapi juga "rumah besar bagi interaksi dan informasi komunitas secara nasional".

companyOverview.html:
Everything written about eCommerce opportunity in Southeast Asia is overwhelmingly positive - a population of 600 million plus consumers, growing internet connectivity, broad penetration of smartphones, a young and tech-savvy population and expanding GDP and purchasing power. The region’s rate of eCommerce share of total retail at around 1 percent shows enormous opportunity in comparison to 14-17% in the west and China.
Despite these extraordinary possibilities, the logistics environment in Southeast Asia remains a huge challenge.
Lazada eLogistics (LeL) mission is to address these challenges, delight customers and win them over to eCommerce. We are building an innovative, highly visible, low-cost logistics network. Our operating model is based on an ecosystem of logistics partners stitched together with state of the art technology and our modular infrastructure
Lazada eLogistics (LeL) is the Logistics arm of the Lazada Group and is structured around four operating Business Units
  • Express: own B2C last mile delivery capabilities from pick-up to sort to delivery
  • Transport: Management of our ecosystem of partners (3PLs) along all the transportation components
  • Fulfilment: Operation of a network of warehouses that can fill retail orders on our own behalf, as well as providing fulfilment services to merchants and international brands
  • Crossborder: Build-up & management of international logistics network giving seamlessly access to ASEAN

companyOverview.html:
PT. Royal Abadi Sejahtera's business policy is: Satisfaction of customers is our top priority by providing them the best quality products at the best price and with the best service. Pre-requisites to realize this policy are good quality materials and high standard of service. A well-organized working environment, precise delegation of responsibilities and commensurate remuneration ensure a satisfied work force Given these factors, the Company looks forward to a bright and prosperous future.
The continuous investments in Research and Development ensures the Company will continue to meet the most exacting standards, and supply the need of customers in terms of both quality and service. Every process in production – from raw materials, processing, work in process to final inspection – is controlled by experienced and skilled operators and Quality Control staffs.
To strengthen further the actualization of this policy, the Company has decided to adopt the Quality Management System of ISO 9001:2008.

companyOverview.html:
PT. Citra Van Titipan kilat (TIKI) mengawali bisnisnya tahun 1970 di Jakarta. Berbekal pengalaman itu kami mendapatkan guru terbaik untuk terus berkomitmen dan meningkatkan kualitas layanan bagi konsumen. Di tunjang dengan jaringan yang tersebar luas di Indonesia dengan lebih dari 500 kantor perwakilan TIKI di seluruh pelosok nusantara sebagai bukti nyata bahwa TIKI terus berupaya memberikan yang terbaik kepada konsumen.
Kami juga menjelajahi ke penjuru dunia, semuanya dengan kualitas prima dan harga bersaing. Sektor penjualan juga mendorong dan memberikan kemudahan kepada konsumen secara penuh 24 jam untuk melakukan melakukan pengiriman di 8 titik sales counter dengan layanan drive thru. Sistem kerja yang modern dengan teknologi komputer memudahkan untuk memonitor mulai dari awal pengiriman, tracking hingga status penerima, semuanya berlangsung sangat mudah, aman dan nyaman.
Team yang ramah, terampil dan professional siap melayani apapun kebutuhan konsumen dengan baik dan sempurna. Kami tidak akan berhenti berinovasi sebelum anda puas, karena kesuksesan diukur dari kesempurnaan kami dalam melayani konsumen.

companyOverview.html:
The Company has operated since April 14, 1985 by the name of PT. Purnamala Internasional Indonesia (PII). In 1989, the Company changed it’s name into PT. Asuransi Jiwa Eka Life, which then in 2007 changed again into PT. Asuransi Jiwa Sinarmas (Sinarmas Life Insurance). In 2011, PT. Asuransi Jiwa Sinarmas became a joint venture life insurance Company, thus the name changed into PT. Asuransi Jiwa Sinarmas MSIG (also called Sinarmas MSIG Life – SMiLe), whose shares owned by PT. Sinar Mas Multiartha, Tbk and Mitsui Sumitomo Insurance Company Limited – Japan, 50% respectively.
As a joint venture life insurance Company, Sinarmas MSIG Life has obtained permits from the concerned institutions. The Ministry of Legal and Human Rights Affairs of the Republic of Indonesia has issued their endorsement through Decree Number AHU- 32784.AH.01.02 of 2011, dated July 01, 2011. Likewise, the Ministry of Finance of the Republic of Indonesia has issued a business permit through Decree Number Kep-649/KM.10/2011 dated August 3, 2011.
In its further growth, Sinarmas MSIG Life (SMiLe) has shown a significant development that can be seen from the continued increasing of premium income from year to year. Until the end of 2012, the Company recorded a total asset of Rp. 24.3 trillion and a total premium of Rp. 10.7 trillion. With accurate and prudent performance, the realization of leverage ratio by the end of 2012 using Risk Based Capital (RBC) was 546.86%.
The development of Sinarmas MSIG Life (SMiLe) is supported by an excellent financial coordination, product innovation, customer service, and the ownership of a wide business network, which is actualized in the presence of 87 marketing offices and 23,945 marketing officers dispersed all over Indonesia. Sinarmas MSIG Life (SMiLe) is ready to provide the excellent service for you and your Company financial needs.

This millennia is marked by various disruptions caused by information technology (digital) in almost every sector. There is no area that cannot be disrupted by this technology. Then most organization start to digitalize their business. But unfortunately, some of them were failed to gain benefit from it. So that many resources and investments were sunked and in the same time their problems still remain unsolved.
In order to gain the benefits of this millennia era, an organization will be required to choose the right solution and in the right management and governance approach. Such a solution that right solve the root cause of the problem, and with a comprehensive approach of governance and management. Then here we are offering the right solution and approach suitable for this millennia. We are Millennia Solusi Informatika. Develop it, Manage it, Succeed it.

companyOverview.html:
Quadra is a brand owned by Lyman Group. Quality and reliability is our business. A reliable, expert and high-technological partner for top-level architecture and interior design projects worldwide.
Quadra specializes in providing extra large slabs for your luxurious and sophisticated high end design and building projects. As a sintered slab, quadra embodies the form of an ultra fine man made stone, brought to perfection by employing the exact same method of pressure and heat in the same way Mother Nature does only faster. This ‘sinterization’ process fuses the stone particles together to the point where they become one unified material. The creation of combining the highest inspiration for design. Europian quality raw materials, rigorous process in every step, the latest and improved Italian technological machinery and meticulous quality control ensures that the final products achieve the highest level of quality.
CAUTION!
PT Quadra Dinamika Internasional never charges any fees and cooperates with any travel agent in the recruitment process!

The chosen candidate will work within a team to evolve designs from early-stage prototype through to full commercialisation. Experience working well independently and also within a team and meeting strict deadline is an advantage.
What will you be doing?
  • Draft/develop software requirements in collaboration with the Product Owner and your team.
  • Deliver/support with any Proof of Concept work, focusing on any uncertain design aspects/features.
  • Develop detailed design outputs, including software code and release notes.
  • Draft software test protocols as part of design verification activities, execute any testing as necessary, and produce test reports.
  • Develop CI/CD pipelines to support your development efforts
  • Manage change control within the product life cycle.
  • Identify design improvements and value engineering opportunities.
  • Attend design reviews and project technical progress meetings.
What about you?
  • Experience in Node.js - (Noide.js implemented through TypeScript would be nice to have)
  • Experience in React.js - at least one previous project in React.js
  • AWS knowledge is a plus
  • Having reasonable English written and spoken
  • Undergraduate University degree  
What can Mitrais offer you?
  • A CAREER, not a JOB!
  • Competitive salary
  • Excellent working environment, with the possibility to relocate to our regional offices and working remotely
  • Free English classes, English is our working language
  • Lots of opportunities to improve your competencies on our technical boot camps, certification programs and soft skills training courses
  • Hackathons with big prizes !
  • Take a break with Happy Hours, Billiard Tables, gaming rooms and free drinks and snacks to keep you 100% effective
Learn about life at Mitrais from our current team by searching #mitraislife on Facebook or LinkedIn.  
 
To Apply…
 Simply click the apply button, complete the form and upload your latest CV in English! What are you waiting for?
MITRAIS Online Recruitment

PENGUMUMAN :

DGIT is a specialist supplier of software and services to digital and communications service providers, using cutting-edge technology to create intuitive, flexible and highly customisable solutions for the modern digital marketplace.
DGIT is the creator of Telflow, the multi-award winning quote-to-cash platform that provides CPQ, order capture, provisioning and inventory management for digital and communications service providers. DGIT is also home to Inomial, the innovative revenue management and billing platform that handles subscription management and billing solutions for telecommunications carriers, digital media distributors, utilities companies and cloud service providers. Together, Telflow and Inomial can be used to seamlessly automate and effortlessly manage the complete end-to-end opportunity-to-operate journey for digital and communications services.
DGIT plays a key role in contributing to the B2B and REST API standards advanced by the TM Forum, and has been consistently recognised by TM Forum awards for its role in transforming the operations of digital and communications service providers, and for its outstanding open architecture and API design. DGIT is also a significant contributor to the Metro Ethernet Forum (MEF) in the area of inter-provider wholesale B2B APIs.
Originally founded in Melbourne in 2005, DGIT now has offices in Melbourne, Auckland and Denpasar – with around 100 employees across these three locations – and is represented by partners in the Asia-Pacific, the UK, North America, Africa and the Middle East. DGIT has almost 80 customers including Tier 1 and Tier 2 telecommunications providers, digital service providers and enterprise organisations, and is rapidly expanding its customer base around the world.

jobDescription.html:
We are looking for a contract based talented developer to join an experienced team of front-end engineers working on our flagship product Telflow, a multi-award winning quote-to-cash platform for digital and communications service providers (http://telflow.com) and Inomial, a high-performance ecosystem of billing microservices (http://inomial.com)
  • Get hands-on experience developing globally-competitive software platform using the latest technology and a microservices and micro-frontend architecture.
  • Learn new technologies with support from senior developers.
  • Work with like-minded peers in a fun, casual office.
If you are passionate about technology, love helping customers achieve their goals, and are enthusiastic about learning new skills and applying them to real-world problems, we want to hear from you!
What you will do
At DGIT, we pride ourselves on our highly collaborative and creative engineering team culture, where everyone is able to use their unique skills and ideas to help our customers achieve their goals and contribute to the company's success.
Our developers work on challenging problems using cutting-edge technology, and have the opportunity to make a significant impact on our rapidly-growing software platform.
As a Frontend developer, you will:
  • Apply your skills to help create new features for a market-changing software platform
  • Work creatively to solve real-world problems for customers around the world
  • Design and develop new features for the UI/UX and API of our core product
  • Delivery business-enhancing solutions to our global customers
  • Contribute ideas to the product design and architecture
  • Collaborate with a creative international team on award winning software
Technical experience
For this role, we are looking for either a recent graduate from a software engineering (or similar) degree, or someone with 1+ years software development experience in front-end fundamentals (HTML, CSS, JavaScript).
You'll fit in well with our team if you have a drive to deliver, take pride in the quality of your work, enjoy finding creative solutions to challenging technical problems, and can work with others to overcome roadblocks and get the job done.
Skills we are looking for
  • Strong knowledge of HTML, CSS and JavaScript
  • Good Knowledge of building user-friendly UI/UX
  • Knowledge of modern CSS framework (i.e: Bootstrap, Material Design)
  • Knowledge of contemporary JavaScript frameworks (i.e: Angular or React, NodeJS) is a plus
  • Understanding of software development methodologies, including unit testing
  • The ability to communicate well, and work in a collaborative team environment
  • A demonstrated passion and curiosity to investigate technology and acquire new skills
Our technology: We will train you in these frameworks! 
  • Cutting-edge integration technologies – Angular, Micro-Frontend, GraphQL 
  • Business Process Management and Rules libraries (Activiti, Drools, etc) 
  • Docker microservices & Docker Swarm orchestration
  • High performance & Highly available architectures, data structures and algorithms 
  • Training in Telecommunications and Service Provider Domain
Benefits:
  • An attractive salary package with contract based work, we will reward high achieving graduates with pay above industry average
  • Opportunity to travel internationally to work with our team and attend conferences 
  • Medical insurance package (BPJS & Private Healthcare Insurance)
  • Teleworking or relocated to Bali (after COVID) including relocation package both for individual or with core family members (for non Bali residence)
How to apply
Send your CV in English, Non English CV will not be sorted

companyOverview.html:
PT Asuransi Bintang Tbk. is one of oldest public insurance company, established on March 17th, 1955 by numbers of ex-1945 independence heroes: Bapak Soedarpo Sastrosatomo, Bapak Idham, Bapak Wibowo, Bapak Pang Lay Kim, Bapak Ali Budiarjo, Bapak Roestam Moenaf, Bapak J.R Koesman and Bapak Ismet. While world business competition has become very tight, and globalization effect has entered into whole business sector, PT Asuransi Bintang Tbk. keep standing itself through the insurance market which has celebrated its 60th anniversary in 2015.
Thanks to the experience, when a big flood disaster attacked Jakarta and its surroundings in early 2002, PT Asuransi Bintang Tbk. has handled the massal assurance claim very well within short time. Also in settlement of Interm Payment claim about Terrorism & Sabotage at JW Marriot Hotel, PT Asuransi Bintang Tbk. were doing excellent and within short time the hotel returned to its normal activity. Immediately before the end of 2006, PT Asuransi Bintang Tbk. has done its first Limited General Bidding for gaining capital addition used to increase its capacity to the risk restraint. And then managed to step into Sharia Insurance Business in 2007. Interm Payment claim continously strengthen itself by get focus on the service as well as on the company’s infrastrucuture improvement.
Looking up how assurance market behave now, and later on, PT Asuransi Bintang Tbk. has determined the new mission, to be a leading assurance service provider in margin of profit, by means of adaptation ability, creativity, and technology.
In the course of our change and growth, we are looking for dynamic and energetic people, highly motivated, strong responsibility, talented and committed People who possess strong interpersonal, recpect with others, and trusted with a continuous record of achievements to be a part of our spirit team to develop career at  PT Asuransi Bintang Tbk.

============================================================================
GarudaFood is a food and beverage company subordinated of Tudung Group. In addition to GarudaFood, Tudung Group also subordinates in Agribusiness companies operating ini Crude Palm Oil field and Peanuts.
GarudaFood Group had originated from PT Tudung, it was established in Pati, Central Java. The company founder is the deceased Darmo Putro, ex-warrior who had chosen to engage in business sector after the independence of Indonesia. In early of 1987, TPJ started selling its peanut production products using a brand of Kacang Garing Garuda, which was recently known as: Kacang Garuda. Kacang Garuda earned the following awards: Indonesian Customer Satisfaction Award (ICSA) under the category of branded peanut for eight times consecutively (2000-2007); Superbrands (2003); Top Brand for Kids (2004); Indonesian Best Brand Award (IBBA, 2004-2007); Top Brand (2007). When national economy suffered from economic crisis, on December 1997, PT GarudaFood Jaya (GFJ) was established, producing Gery-branded biscuit. Gery Saluut earned Indonesian Best Brand Award (IBBA) from MARS and SWA Magazine for a period of 2005-2010 under the category of wafer salut. In 2007-2010 Gery Chocolatos earned IBBA under the category of wafer stick. In 1998 GarudaFood acquired PT Triteguh Manunggal Sejati (TRMS), producer of jelly and launched jelly product using brands of Okky and Keffy. Achievement of Okky jelly has been proven by its successfulness in earning Top Brand for Kids (TBK) Award 2004 under the category of jelly. In addition to TBK, OKKY Jelly also managed to earn IBBA (2005-2010). Okky jelly Drink also earned Top Brand Award 2007-2010 from Marketing Magazine in cooperation with Frontier. In the end of 2002, TRMS launched jelly beverage products with a brand of Okky Jelly Drink and it also constituted a new phase for GarudaFood to deal with beverages business. Seriousness of GarudaFood in focusing on beverages business had also become apparent by the launching of Mountea, fruit-flavored tea beverage. Mountea had even been awarded by IBBA 2007-2010 under the category of tea beverage in cup packaging. GarudaFood also produces Snack with a brand of Leo, for category of Potato chips, banana chips, cassava chips products initiated from the end of 2005. In 2007-2010 Leo earned IBBA award for category of potato chips. In national level, GarudaFood is also positively perceived as one of the admired food and beverage companies. Survey made by Frontier and BusinessWeek Indonesia Magazine in Jakarta and Surabaya in 2006-2010 indicated that GarudaFood was in the third position of Indonesian Most Admired Company (IMAC). GarudaFood also actively performs corporate social responsibility (CSR) under the flag of GarudaFood Sehati. To accelerate the achievement of its vision, in 2011 GarudaFood Group with non-alcohol divion of  Suntory Beverage & Food, a company from Japan established a subsidiary PT Garuda Suntory Beverage, focused on the development of the beverage. Now, all potencies supported by 20 thousands knowledge workers have become main asset to GarudaFood in the effort to go forward to meet a success as sustainable enterprise.

header.jobTitle: Front End Back End Full Stack Web Developer

companyOverview.html:
Didirikan pada tahun 2018 untuk menyikapi perkembangan Era Digital.
Semakin tumbuh dan berkembang dimasa PANDEMI. Sementara situasi ekonomi menurun, S-Gala.com terus berinovasi untuk menyikapi perubahan perilaku konsumen yang semakin familiar dengan kegiatan "BELANJA ONLINE".
S-Gala.com berkembang dan tumbuh dengan VISI :
"MENJADI TERBAIK,TERKEMUKA, PENDIDIK DAN PENOLONG"
Kami membangun bisnis ini dengan semangat partnership dan menjadikan semangat millennial sebagai budaya kerja di keseharian kami.
Tempat kerja yang nyaman, homies, tanpa drama, dan kompetitif menjadi salah satu kunci pertumbuhan kami. Setiap individu diberikan kesempatan untuk berkembang-berkarir dengan cepat, sesuai dengan kompetensi dan pencapaian harian, terhitung dari hari pertama bekerja.
Kami menjadikan seluruh karyawan kami sebagai partner dan kunci sukses perkembangan bisnis ini. Keterbukaan aturan-informasi, Akses Mendetail Perhitungn Insentif, Penggajian Tepat Waktu membangun rasa percaya antara kami dengan seluruh partner yang turut serta membangun bisnis ini.
Kami menjadikan PENDIDIK dan PENOLONG sebagai bagian dari VISI kami. Dengan memberikan pendidikan kepada para Reseller dan niatan tulus untuk mengembangkan kehidupan dari keluarga Reseller kami, membuat kami yakin bahwa bisnis ini akan membantu banyak sekali keluarga di Indonesia.

jobDescription.html:
Dibutuhkan segera Front End/Back End/Full Stack Programmer
DESKRIPSI PEKERJAAN :
Membangun dan mengurus infrasuktrukter website untuk menunjang proses bisnis dari S-Gala.com. Dengan tujuan akhir membangun ekosistem digital yang memudahkan reseller dan proses internal bisnis. Sehingga S-Gala.com bisa bertumbuh dan berkembang sebagai partner yang menyenangkan dan menguntungkan bagi para Reseller. 
Klasifikasi Front End
  • Pernah bekerja dan menguasai salah satu framework berikut (REACT/VURE/SVELTE)
  • Menugasai JQuery
  • Memiliki kemampuan problem solving
  • Mempunyai akun GIT/Repository (Github/Bitbucket)
  • Minimal pengalaman bekerja sebagai programer 2 tahun
  • Terbiasa bekerja kolaborasi dengan tim dan mendokumentasikan pekerjaan
  • Terbiasa bekerja dilingkungan perokok
  • Menguasai framework bootstrap
  • Mempunyai daya eksplorasi dan kreatifitas untuk mendesign website
Hal lainnya yang menjadi pertimbangan/nilai tambah Front End :
  • Pernah bekerja menggunakan modul bundler (webpack/roullup/gulp)
  • Memiliki pengalaman mengerjakan user interface
  • Memiliki pengalaman bekerja menggunakan salah satu  aplikasi berikut (FIGMA/SKETC/XD)
Klasifikasi Back End Programer
  • Menguasai/pernah bekerja menggunakan salah satu framework berikut (PHP, Node.JS, Composer, API, MySQL
  • Memiliki kemampuan problem solving
  • Mempunyai akun GIT/Repository (Github/Bitbucket)
  • Minimal pengalaman bekerja sebagai programer 2 tahun
  • Terbiasa bekerja kolaborasi dengan tim
  • Bekerja secara terdokumentasi dengan baik
  • Terbiasa bekerja dilingkungan perokok
  • Menguasai database MySql maupun NoSql
  • Berpengalaman menggunakan REST API & GraphQL
Hal lainnya yang menjadi pertimbangan/nilai tambah Back End:
  • Pernah bekerja menggunakan bahasa pemrograman Python/ Framework Flash atau Django
  • Memiliki pengalaman sebagai DevOps
  • Pernah menggunakan Docker
  • Memiliki pengalaman mengembangkan SPA
KARAKTER :
  • Memiliki jiwa MUDA, KOMPETITIF, BERSEMANGAT untuk mengejar bonus dan target 
  • Tertarik bekerja di lingkungan yang FLEXIBLE dan RAMAH MILLENNIAL
  • Memiliki kemampuan untuk berkomunasi dengan para pelanggan dengan RAMAH dan ASIK
  • Memiliki keinginan untuk berkembang secara skill dan pribadi
JAM KERJA :
Senin-Jumat 08.00-17.00
Sabtu 08.00-16.00 
Hari Sabtu diperbolehkan WFH bila target pekerjaan 1 minggu dianggap terselesaikan dengan baik di hari Jumat
BENEFIT & SITUASI KERJA :
  • Budaya kerja millenial TANPA DRAMA
  • Pakaian bebas
  • Bonus berdasarkan pencapaian KPI s/d 3x gaji pertahun
  • Tersedia area kerja smoking dan non smoking
Untuk anda yang muda dan bersemangat, yang ingin serius berkarir di lingkungan yang menyenangkan. Mari bergabung bersama kami menjadi bagian dari perusahaan RASA MILLENNIAL yang sedang tumbuh dan berkembang ini. Selamat datang di S-Gala.com
Lokasi Kerja : Komplek Kopo Permai - Bandung
Proses Interview akan dilaksanakan menggunakan aplikasi Zoom
DESKRIPSI PEKERJAAN :
Mempermudah proses bisnis reseller, agar tercipta hubungan bisnis yang menguntungkan dan menyenangkan. Dapat memberikan dampak ekonomi secara langsung dan meningkatkan kualitas hidup dari keluarga para reseller. Mencapai visi tersebut dengan cara mengirimkan barang sesuai pesanan dan tepat waktu dan memastikan proses bisnis internal berjalan sesuai SOP. Berfokus pada penerapan program “1 Day Service” dan pengukuran-pengukuran untuk terus meningkatkan kesuksesan tim operasional dalam menjalan program. Melaksanakan tugas harian dengan baik sesuai dengan Visi, Misi dan Value dari perusahaan.

companyOverview.html:
PT Dana Puma Investama merupakan anak perusahaan dan Dana Pensiun BCA didirikan berdasarkan akte notaris No.123, pada tanggal 24 April tahun 2007, sejak itu PT Dana Purria Investama diharapkan dapat berkembang pesat menjadi salah satu ‘The Trend Setter” industri Facility Management Services di Indonesia.
 
PT. Dana Purna Investama mempunyai visi service untuk menjadi salah satu badan usaha yang besar dan baik di Indonesia : “Menjadi perusahaan yang menjadi pilihan utama dibidang Facility Management Services di Indonesia” dengan menjalankan proses migrasi dari Single Service Excellence ke Multi Services Excellence dan terus berkembang menjadi Facility Services Excellence.
PT. Dana Purna Investama (DPI) merupakan perusahaan yang antara lain bergerak di bidang Facility Management Services yang saat ini sedang tumbuh berkembang dengan cepat sejak didirikan pada bulan April tahun 2007. Meskipun merupakan perusahaan yang relatif baru, dengan visi yang jauh kedepan dan misi yang tepat, kami yakin dapat turut serta mengambil peran aktif dalam industri ini.
Kami percaya untuk masa yang akan datang, kami dapat menjadi salah satu perusahaan Manajemen Operasional Pemeliharaan Gedung besar di Indonesia dan menjadi pilihan utama baik untuk Klien, Investor, Karyawan dan Relasi Bisnis. Dengan dukungan financial dan team support yang profesional dan dengan memiliki kolektif pengalaman lebih dari 50 tahun, kami yakin perusahaan kami dapat menjadi tolok ukur (Benchmarking) kepuasan klien.
Dukungan manajemen sumber daya manusia yang handal dan kompeten dengan total lebih dari 800 orang yang tersebar di seluruh Indonesia saat ini, serta sistem rekrutmen, seleksi dan pelatihan yang terencana, kami yakin dapat mencetak sumber daya manusia yang siap menangani situasi yang bervariasi dan dengan segala kondisi.

companyOverview.html:
PT Sanbe Farma adalah perusahaan farmasi yang berkantor pusat di Bandung, saat ini Kami sedang membutuhkan karyawan baru yang professional, cekatan dan bertanggung jawab untuk dapat bergabung bersama kami
Sanbe Farma was founded in 1975. As of now after more than three decades since inception, we are the largest pharmaceutical manufacturers in Indonesia and according the recent IMS Report, we rank highest among all the Pharmaceutical Manufacturers in Indonesia including Multinational Companies. Out of top 10 products ethically prescribed, 4 products are from Sanbe. Our market coverage in Indonesia includes more than 37,000 Doctors served by 1,000 Medical Representatives, through our associate’s net-work of 1,100 Sales persons, 35 depots, 60 sub-depots and our corporate work force consisting 8,000 personnel. Our eight manufacturing facilities in Indonesia are cGMP approved plants as per the International Standards. Our sterile preparations unit (LVPs & SVPs) is the first in South East Asia with State-of-the-Art manufacturing equipment and technology from US and Europe and PIC(S) & TGA, Australia compliant.
Our international operations in 20 countries are set to make substantial contribution to the global healthcare. Our international operations cover not only export of our formulations to various developing and under developed countries, but also seek partnerships and alliances from and to developed and regulated markets such as North America and Europe with an aim to put Sanbe Farma on the global map to supply Generic and specialty formulations not only for Indonesia but also to the rest of the world. We are also looking for new acquisitions in potential markets to make our products globally available at affordable prices.
Our propinquity to invest in profitable and strategic ventures would encourage potential and strategic companies to partner with us for mutual benefit not only for generic formulations but also for New Drug Delivery Systems (NDDs), New Chemical Entities (NCEs) and Biosimilar products.
We are committed to strive for continued achievement to provide quality products for quality health through our sincere endeavor to become global generic pharmaceutical manufacturer from Indonesia in the days to come.

Sanbe Farma was founded in 1975. As of now after more than three decades since inception, we are the largest pharmaceutical manufacturers in Indonesia and according the recent IMS Report, we rank highest among all the Pharmaceutical Manufacturers in Indonesia including Multinational Companies. Out of top 10 products ethically prescribed, 4 products are from Sanbe. Our market coverage in Indonesia includes more than 37,000 Doctors served by 1,000 Medical Representatives, through our associate’s net-work of 1,100 Sales persons, 35 depots, 60 sub-depots and our corporate work force consisting 8,000 personnel. Our eight manufacturing facilities in Indonesia are cGMP approved plants as per the International Standards. Our sterile preparations unit (LVPs & SVPs) is the first in South East Asia with State-of-the-Art manufacturing equipment and technology from US and Europe and PIC(S) & TGA, Australia compliant.
Our international operations in 20 countries are set to make substantial contribution to the global healthcare. Our international operations cover not only export of our formulations to various developing and under developed countries, but also seek partnerships and alliances from and to developed and regulated markets such as North America and Europe with an aim to put Sanbe Farma on the global map to supply Generic and specialty formulations not only for Indonesia but also to the rest of the world. We are also looking for new acquisitions in potential markets to make our products globally available at affordable prices.
Our propinquity to invest in profitable and strategic ventures would encourage potential and strategic companies to partner with us for mutual benefit not only for generic formulations but also for New Drug Delivery Systems (NDDs), New Chemical Entities (NCEs) and Biosimilar products.
We are committed to strive for continued achievement to provide quality products for quality health through our sincere endeavor to become global generic pharmaceutical manufacturer from Indonesia in the days to come.

companyOverview.html:
PT. Ayo Media Network
Merupakan perusahaan multimedia yang berkantor pusat di Bandung. PT. Ayo Media Network memiliki beberapa news portal yaitu ayobandung.com, ayobekasi.net, ayobogor.com, ayocirebon.com, ayopurwakarta.com, ayotasik.com, ayosemarang.com, dan ayohotel.co.
AyoBandung.com
Mengakses berita melalui internet sudah menjadi gaya hidup yang tak terelakkan. Seiring dengan arus itulah, kami mencoba hadir untuk melengkapi pilihan dan kebutuhan pembaca, berharap membuat hidup Anda makin berwarna.
Mengapa AyoBandung.com?
Tak dipungkiri lokalitas dan kecintaan pada tempat berpijak atau berasal sejatinya ada di setiap diri manusia. Karena itu segenap peristiwa, kabar atau kehebohan akan selalu menarik bagi mereka yang terlibat di dalamnya.
Mencoba memenuhi kebutuhan dan kerinduan akan kabar dan cerita-cerita tempat bernaung inilah AyoBandung.com hadir dengan menawarkan konten situs berita yang bisa anda akses kapanpun dan di manapun.
Namun sejalan dengan semangat untuk memberikan yang terbaik bagi Bandung tercinta tentu saja kami tak cuma menawarkan berita.
Kami juga mencoba menawarkan persaudaraan dan kebersamaan, karena kami juga memberikan ruang yang sangat luas untuk informasi kegiatan masyarakat dan komunitas di Kota Bandung.
Ekspansi PT. Ayo Media Network
Saat ini, Ayo Media Network sedang bersiap untuk ekspansi ke level nasional dengan membuka dan mengembangkan produk baru di sejumlah daerah.
Jadi, mimpi besar kami semoga AyoBandung.com dan produk situs web lainnya, khususnya news portal tak hanya menjadi tempat mencari berita, tetapi juga "rumah besar bagi interaksi dan informasi komunitas secara nasional".

companyOverview.html:
PT Dana Puma Investama merupakan anak perusahaan dan Dana Pensiun BCA didirikan berdasarkan akte notaris No.123, pada tanggal 24 April tahun 2007, sejak itu PT Dana Purria Investama diharapkan dapat berkembang pesat menjadi salah satu ‘The Trend Setter” industri Facility Management Services di Indonesia.
 
PT. Dana Purna Investama mempunyai visi service untuk menjadi salah satu badan usaha yang besar dan baik di Indonesia : “Menjadi perusahaan yang menjadi pilihan utama dibidang Facility Management Services di Indonesia” dengan menjalankan proses migrasi dari Single Service Excellence ke Multi Services Excellence dan terus berkembang menjadi Facility Services Excellence.
PT. Dana Purna Investama (DPI) merupakan perusahaan yang antara lain bergerak di bidang Facility Management Services yang saat ini sedang tumbuh berkembang dengan cepat sejak didirikan pada bulan April tahun 2007. Meskipun merupakan perusahaan yang relatif baru, dengan visi yang jauh kedepan dan misi yang tepat, kami yakin dapat turut serta mengambil peran aktif dalam industri ini.
Kami percaya untuk masa yang akan datang, kami dapat menjadi salah satu perusahaan Manajemen Operasional Pemeliharaan Gedung besar di Indonesia dan menjadi pilihan utama baik untuk Klien, Investor, Karyawan dan Relasi Bisnis. Dengan dukungan financial dan team support yang profesional dan dengan memiliki kolektif pengalaman lebih dari 50 tahun, kami yakin perusahaan kami dapat menjadi tolok ukur (Benchmarking) kepuasan klien.
Dukungan manajemen sumber daya manusia yang handal dan kompeten dengan total lebih dari 800 orang yang tersebar di seluruh Indonesia saat ini, serta sistem rekrutmen, seleksi dan pelatihan yang terencana, kami yakin dapat mencetak sumber daya manusia yang siap menangani situasi yang bervariasi dan dengan segala kondisi.

Ezzer merupakan perusahaan trading & contracting terkemuka di Indonesia untuk produk epoxy lantai, cleaning chemical dan oli pelumas industri. Didirikan sejak tahun 2001 dengan misi untuk memberikan solusi total perawatan bagi industri di Indonesia.

Melihat peluang pasar yang luas dan potensial, EZZER akan terus berkembang seluas mungkin untuk melayani permintaan pasar, sambil tetap menciptakan inovasi baru di sepanjang pengembangan teknologi.

Kinerja produk EZZER dipantau dan dievaluasi secara konsisten bersama dengan kepuasan pelanggan untuk memberikan Produk Terbaik dan Layanan Terbaik.

Dukungan Teknis EZZER dengan kinerja terbaik akan memberikan layanan terbaik bagi semua pelanggan seperti Pengecatan Pabrik, Mesin Pembilasan, Pembersihan Mesin dan Menara Pendingin, Pembentukan Boiler atau Chiller.
