PT. KASOEM PIONER OPTIK, pada awal berdirinya bermula dari divisi Optik yaitu pada tahun 1939 dengan nama A. Kasoem Optical. Pemiliknya yaitu Bapak Kasoem adalah Pria pribumi pertama asal Garut Jawa Barat yang berhasil mendirikan pabrik  LENSA pertama di Indonesia dan mendapatkan penghargaan sebagai Perintis Pendiri Pabrik Lensa Pribumi dan mendapatkan Gelar Pioner dari Department Perdagangan Indonesia saat itu dan berganti nama menjadi A. Kasoem Pioner Optik.
Pada tahun 1988, mengembangkan bisnis dengan mendirikan divisi Alat Bantu Dengar (Divisi Auidologi) dengan nama A. Kasoem Hearing & Speech Center. Semula Divisi ini hanyalah sebagai Toko Penyedia Alat Bantu Dengar saja. Dalam masa evolusi setelah 26 tahun, divisi Audiologi ini tumbuh dan berkembang sangat pesat hingga memiliki 19 cabang di kota-kota besar di seluruh Indonesia dan menjadi Perusahaan Audiologi pertama yang mengusung konsep One Stop Solution bagi masyarakat yang mengalami gangguan dengar. Pelayanan A. Kasoem meliputi : konsultasi pendengaran, pemberian informasi mengenai gangguan dengar, pemasangan alat bantu dengar dan penjualan alat bantu dengar, terapi berbahasa dan purna jual yang keseluruhan pelayanan berada dalam supervisi para tenaga ahli yang selalu memperbaharui ilmu di bidangnya.
Staff kami berasal dari berbagai disiplin Ilmu. Dengan didukung oleh para Ahli di bidang Audiologi dan Akustik bersertifikat dan  Strata 2 dari Philipine, London dan Amerika, kami memberikan pelatihan khusus bagi seluruh calon karyawan dari berbagai disiplin ilmu, untuk menciptakan tenaga-tenaga yang handal yang mampu memberikan pelayanan terbaik dan optimal bagi seluruh pelanggan.  
Tahun 2018, A. Kasoem Hearing & Speech Center akan melakukan pengembangan bisnis dengan membuka cabang-cabang baru di kota-kota besar di Indonesia.
Manfaatkan peluang berkarir dan menjadi professional untuk menjadi bagian dari keluarga besar A. Kasoem Hearing & Speech Center.

companyOverview.html:
PT. Bank Permata Tbk  (PermataBank) merupakan hasil merger 5 (lima) Bank yaitu, PT. Bank Bali Tbk, PT. Bank Universal Tbk, PT. Bank Artamedia, PT. Bank Patriot dan PT. Bank Prima Ekspress pada tahun 2002, dan saat ini telah berkembang menjadi sebuah bank swasta Utama yang menawarkan produk dan jasa inovatif serta komprehensif terutama di sisi delivery channel-nya termasuk Internet Banking dan Mobile Banking. PermataBank memiliki aspirasi untuk menjadi penyedia jasa keuangan terkemuka di Indonesia, dengan fokus di segmen Konsumer dan Komersial.

DI tahun 2004, Standard Chartered Bank dan PT. Astra Internasional Tbk mengambil alih PermataBank dan memulai proses transformasi secara besar-besaran di dalam organisasi. Selanjutnya, terhadap wujud komitmennya terhadap PermataBank, kepemilikan gabungan saham utama ini meningkat menjadi 89.01% pada tahun 2006.
Kombinasi unik dari kedua pemegang saham strategis merupakan salah satu kekuatan Utama PermataBank. PT. Astra Internasional Tbk merupakan perusahaan Indonesia yang besar dan memiliki pengalaman kuat di pasar domestik. Standard Chartered Bank dengan keahlian dan pengalaman global terkemuka yang dimilikinya menjadikan PermataBank berada dalam posisi yang unik.

Dan saat ini PermataBank telah berkembang menjadi sebuah bank swasta utama yang menawarkan produk dan jasa inovatif serta komprehensif terutama di sisi delivery channel-nya termasuk Internet Banking dan Mobile Banking. PermataBank memiliki aspirasi untuk menjadi penyedia jasa keuangan terkemuka di Indonesia dengan fokus di segmen Konsumer dan Komersial.
VISI
Menjadi Bank pilihan dengan terus membina kemitraan dan menciptakan nilai bermakna bagi stakeholders
MISI
  • Berperan aktif sebagai mitra di bidang keuangan dan agen pembangunan yang efisien bagi nasabah dan mayarakat.
  • Memberikan layanan keuangan menyeluruh secara sederhana, cepat, andal dan inovatif.
  • Berkomitmen untuk memberikan pengalaman unggul bagi pemangku kepentingan dan membangun nilai positif bagi pemegang saham.

companyOverview.html: Barry Callebaut is the world’s leading supplier of high-quality cocoa and chocolate products. Our broad range of products and services span all aspects from cocoa sourcing to fine chocolate products, which are loved by people of all ages worldwide. We are passionate about our business and work hard every day to ensure that there is enough chocolate in the world. Nothing is more important to our success than the combined expertise of our 8,500 Barry Callebaut employees around the world. Our international focus in the fascinating world of cocoa-growing and chocolate are the colorful backdrop for our many functions across a wide range of disciplines. In addition to sharing a passion for chocolate, Barry Callebaut employees live our other corporate values every day - customer focus, entrepreneurship, integrity and team spirit. We are committed to making sure that they have the right skills, know-how and deep understanding of our customers and their needs. Engaging and developing our employees is the key to our success. Because our business focus is so broad, the scope of career opportunities within Barry Callebaut can cover many functional areas.

jobDescription.html:
Job Objective
The maintenance planner is responsible to plan, prioritize, schedule, and manage maintenance activities to maximize the uptime and efficiency of the equipment within the stream. Create and review the maintenance plan based on the  maintenance strategy that align with plant target including production delivery, maintenance cost, reliability of equipment, extension of equipment lifespan, MTBF, MTTR and so on. Improve the work performance and quality by anticipating or eliminating potential delays through planning and scheduling the manpower, spare parts, materials and equipment access.
About the job
Plan, prioritize, schedule, and manage maintenance activities (including planned maintenance programs, shut-downs, or emergency repairs) to minimize business disruptions.
  • Plan the work execution details with the aids of maintenance team. Prepare the work instruction and required documentation like manual, drawings and so on. Clearly mention coordination and connection with other works or stakesholders.
  • Ensure the availability of spare parts, materials and special tools needed for work execution
  • Advanced determination of labor resources needed and time required to complete each job, which aids the maintenance coordinator in measuring the performance of the team.
  • Coordinate the external services that required for work execution
  • Confirm the work condition requirement and coordinate with scheduling optimizer for the maintenance window.
  • Optimize the maintenance window opportunities.
  • Prepare an overall weekly plan for mainetnance activities.
  • Maintain a central source of information concerning maintenance work, equipment, and equipment repair.
  • Coordinate plant shutdowns to attain all essential schedules.
Evaluate equipment and maintenance history to determine, develop, and implement appropriate preventive maintenance requirements to ensure optimizing effectiveness of maintenance procedures and maximizing equipment reliability and runtime. Ensure preventive maintenance plan reviewed and updated timely regularly, at least annually
  • Manage factual data required for the evaluation of preventive maintenance plan.
  • Preventive maintenance plan review should based on overall plant operation strategy including sustainability of equipment, safety, qualitity requirement, food safety requirement, productivity plan, maintenance budget and so on.
  • Execute the modification and new equipment records. Ensure all documentation are well handover and organize. Review or develop maintenance plan accordingly.
  • Maintain close and constant liaison between operations and maintenance to optimize the maintenance opportunities window.
  • Update the Computerized Maintenance Management System (CMMS) accordingly.
Plan calibration and verification of all field instruments, especially CCP related.
  • Coordinate with quality department on the verification and calibration interval. Review it periodically.
  • Update the verification and calibration plan into Computerized Maintenance Management System (CMMS) accordingly.
  • Verification and calibration activities should be well plan according to agreed interval. Maintenance planner are fully accountable for any overdue, especially CCP related.
  • Follow-up required actions after verification and calibration.
  • Verification and calibration record should be well manage and organize according to company requirement.
  • Review and update the work instruction or requirement of verification or calibration regularly, at least annually.
Evaluate stock level for critical spare parts and materials. Ensure reasonable stock level that align with maintenance strategy and equipment criticality. Ensure stock level reviewed and updated timely regularly, at least annually
  • Manage facture date required for the stock level evaluation and review.
  • Stock level should reflect the actual need of preventive maintenance plan, maintenance strategy and equipment criticality.
  • Stock level review should based on overall plant operation strategy including sustainability of equipment, safety, qualitity requirement, food safety requirement, productivity plan, maintenance budget and so on.
  • In the case of modification or new equipment installation, stock level should be review accordingly. Obsolute spare part and material should laises with warehouse for future action to be taken.
  • Laises with warehouse personnel to ensure stock level are updated in Computerized Maintenance Management System (CMMS) and execute according to agreed stock level.
Align with scheduling optimizers of both streams to ensure maximum uptime of assets.
  • Coordinate monthly planning meeting to align the maintenance window to execute planned maintenance activities.
  • Weekly review meeting to finalize final details of the maintenance window.
Contributes in effective execution and coordination of maintenance activities, in cooperation with Maintenance coordinator.
  • Coordinate weekly meeting to finalize the weekly maintenance plan.
  • Daily update meeting to get feedback on asset conditions, planned work completion and execution status.
  • Revised and realign the weekly maintenance plan accordingly.
Solve technical non-compliances regarding safety and GMP.
  • Review then register all non-compliances into Computerized Maintenance Management System (CMMS).
  • Plan and schedule the rectification activities accordingly.
  • Review the maintenance plan and work instruction accordingly if necessary.
About you:
  • Diploma in a technical profession with minimum 5 years of industry maintenance experience (preferably food or process industry), or:
  • Bachelor degree in Engineering or similar.
  • Technical planning skills or Project management skills.
  • Proficient in MS-Office applications and Computerized Maintenance Management System (CMMS) Maximo is preferred.
  • Structured and analytical approach.
  • Understand planning and scheduling indicators such as plan compliance, planning ratio, backlog, stock-out, lead time, maintenance cost and so on.
  • Familiar with processing equipment such as presses, mills, packing line, chiller system, hydraulic & pneumatic system, steam system, blower, screw conveyor, rotary feeder and so on.
  • Electrical/PLC system knowledge is an asset.
  • English - Good.
  • Computerized Maintenance Management System (CMMS) - Maximo preferred.
  • Maintenance strategy.

companyOverview.html:
PT. Mitsui Leasing Capital Indonesia (Mitsui Leasing) was officially established as a company whose the majority share owned by JA Mitsui Leasing, Ltd. Japan, on October 26, 1992. The establishment virtue of Notary Deed No.173 year of 1992, approval of Ministry of Justice dated December 7, 1992 No.02-9937.HT.01.04 -TH.92 and business license from the Minister of Finance No.56/KMK.017/1993 dated January 12, 1993.
Currently, the company’s business focused on the automobile financing activities through the Investment financing, Working Capital Financing, Multi Purpose Financing, and/or Other Business activity of financing based on approval of the Financial Services Authority (OJK), and Operating lease and/or fee based activity with the provision that it does not violate the rules and regulations in the financial services sector.
From year on year, Mitsui Leasing performance has increased both in total revenue and net income. Mitsui Leasing asset also increased over time. Quite convincing business development of Mitsui Leasing can be seen on the annual report profile.
In line with the rapid development and progress of the company, as well as the widening of territory area for servicing the Customers, Mitsui Leasing has opened several branches in Jakarta : Warung Buncit, Mangga Dua, Pondok Indah, Central Park, Kelapa Gading and branches in various cities out side Jakarta such as : Serpong, Bekasi, Medan, Semarang, Surabaya, Bandung, Denpasar, Yogyakarta, Balikpapan and Palembang.
Pursuant to the Company’s vision to be a professional and reliable automotive finance company, in doing its business development Mitsui Leasing has a mission and a commitment to provide services and automotive financial solutions timely, accurate and creative to the customers and business partners, by developing the best services system with the technology development "on - line system" and "one day service".
Mitsui Leasing has its customers from various level and classes, both companies and individuals. In order to provide the best services and to fulfil the customers need, the Customer Care of Mitsui Leasing always continually handle the customers problems with  a professional, precise, fast and satisfying approach.

companyOverview.html:
PT Finansia Multi Finance (“FMF” or “the Company”) was founded in 1994. FMF received its multifinance licence in 1994 and is fully licenced to conduct a full range of multifinance activities including consumer finance, leasing, factoring and credit cards.
Today, FMF and its kreditplus brand are established as leading players within the multifinance sector with a focus on the used motorcycle financing, used car financing and white goods financing segments. As at 30 June 2014, FMF finances 772,234 customers through a proprietary distribution network of 313 branches / POS outlets and supported by a workforce of 13,682 employees.
On its establishment, FMF adopted a dual focus on both the retail and commercial segment largely in response to the opportunities available in the market. Following the Asian Financial Crisis (“AFC”), FMF, like many other financial institutions in Indonesia, adjusted its strategic business model and risk management framework to reflect lessons learnt over the period.
Over its 20 years of operation, FMF has weathered the course of a number of credit cycles and financial crises through a willingness and flexibility to adapt its business model and practices in response to shifting regulatory and operating environments. This adaptability has provided FMF with valuable operating experience within a number of different business segments and product groups across both the retail and commercial markets.

companyOverview.html: Dentsply Sirona was founded in 1899 as a company that made and sold dental equipment and materials, including artificial teeth, and for over a century it has offered innovative, high quality, economical dental products worthy of its motto "First in Dentistry." In recent years it absorbed Friadent and Degussa's dental division (DeguDent), and has also taken over AstraZeneca's local anesthetic business, making inroads into the field of pharmaceuticals, and has now become the world's largest manufactures and seller in the dental industry. Its wide variety of products, supplied from manufacturing bases in 22 countries, are distributed in more than 120 countries.

companyOverview.html:
HISTORY
A company that markets and sells machinery, digital devices, furniture, survey tools, stationery, and systems needed in business and offices.
Datascrip started out as a humble stationery store in 1969. The company continued to expand its product lines from stationery to office equipment, office machines, drafting machines, office furniture, computers and printers. In 1979, Office Systems was the company's core business. With its foray into information technology sector, Datascrip is now known as a One-Stop Business Solutions company.
VISSION
Our vision is to be the prominent distributor of business products in Indonesia.
MISSION
Our mission is to support customer's business through high quality product provision and excellent customer service, with strong company culture, competent employees, efficient technology and good financial health.

companyOverview.html:
PT Finansia Multi Finance (“FMF” or “the Company”) was founded in 1994. FMF received its multifinance licence in 1994 and is fully licenced to conduct a full range of multifinance activities including consumer finance, leasing, factoring and credit cards.
Today, FMF and its kreditplus brand are established as leading players within the multifinance sector with a focus on the used motorcycle financing, used car financing and white goods financing segments. As at 30 June 2014, FMF finances 772,234 customers through a proprietary distribution network of 313 branches / POS outlets and supported by a workforce of 13,682 employees.
On its establishment, FMF adopted a dual focus on both the retail and commercial segment largely in response to the opportunities available in the market. Following the Asian Financial Crisis (“AFC”), FMF, like many other financial institutions in Indonesia, adjusted its strategic business model and risk management framework to reflect lessons learnt over the period.
Over its 20 years of operation, FMF has weathered the course of a number of credit cycles and financial crises through a willingness and flexibility to adapt its business model and practices in response to shifting regulatory and operating environments. This adaptability has provided FMF with valuable operating experience within a number of different business segments and product groups across both the retail and commercial markets.

PENGUMUMAN :
  • PT. DGIT Systems Indonesia tidak pernah memungut biaya apapun dalam proses rekrutmen.
  • PT. DGIT Systems Indonesia tidak pernah bekerja sama dengan travel agent / biro perjalanan tertentu dalam proses rekrutmen.

  • Jangan memberikan data pribadi atau data keuangan Anda kepada siapapun.
  • Jika membutuhkan klarifikasi lebih lanjut dapat langsung menghubungi PT. DGIT Systems Indonesia
DGIT is a specialist supplier of software and services to digital and communications service providers, using cutting-edge technology to create intuitive, flexible and highly customisable solutions for the modern digital marketplace.
DGIT is the creator of Telflow, the multi-award winning quote-to-cash platform that provides CPQ, order capture, provisioning and inventory management for digital and communications service providers. DGIT is also home to Inomial, the innovative revenue management and billing platform that handles subscription management and billing solutions for telecommunications carriers, digital media distributors, utilities companies and cloud service providers. Together, Telflow and Inomial can be used to seamlessly automate and effortlessly manage the complete end-to-end opportunity-to-operate journey for digital and communications services.
DGIT plays a key role in contributing to the B2B and REST API standards advanced by the TM Forum, and has been consistently recognised by TM Forum awards for its role in transforming the operations of digital and communications service providers, and for its outstanding open architecture and API design. DGIT is also a significant contributor to the Metro Ethernet Forum (MEF) in the area of inter-provider wholesale B2B APIs.
Originally founded in Melbourne in 2005, DGIT now has offices in Melbourne, Auckland and Denpasar – with around 100 employees across these three locations – and is represented by partners in the Asia-Pacific, the UK, North America, Africa and the Middle East. DGIT has almost 80 customers including Tier 1 and Tier 2 telecommunications providers, digital service providers and enterprise organisations, and is rapidly expanding its customer base around the world.

jobDescription.html:
We are looking for a talented  Java  engineer to join an experienced team of engineers working on our flagship to work remotely for our products Telflow, a next-generation service delivery platform for telecommunications and cloud providers (http://telflow.com), and Inomial, a high-performance ecosystem of billing microservices (http://inomial.com).  
  • Get hands-on experience developing on a globally competitive software platform using the latest technology and a microservices architecture. 
  • Learn new technologies with support and coaching from senior developers in Indonesia and abroad. 
  • Work safely and comfortably remotely taking advantage of our teleworking experience to continue to learn and collaborate with peers from around the world.
  • Join a fun and casual office with like-minded, clever peers - when the pandemic clears!
If you are passionate about technology, working remotely, love helping customers achieve their goals, and are enthusiastic about learning new skills and applying them to real-world problems, we want to hear from you!  
What you will do 
  • Design, develop & continuously deploy solutions and new product features for our customers 
  • Contribute ideas to the product design and architecture 
  • Continuously improve technologies and processes with support from seniors and architects 
  • Work independently and collaboratively in a creative and agile team
  • Work with a global team on an award-winning software product 
Skills we are looking for: 
  • Software development experience in Java 
  • Desirable - Knowledge of common integration technologies (GraphQL, Kafka, REST, SOAP, JMS etc.) 
  • SQL experience (PostgreSQL, MySQL, Oracle etc) 
  • Desirable - Knowledge of Design Patterns and UML 
  • Ability to work well with others in a collaborative team environment
  • Excellent English communication
  • Flexible working hours as we work with international teams
  • For this position we will consider applicants of any experience level (as long as you meet the above criteria), and adjust pay accordingly
Our technology: We will train you in these frameworks! 
  • High performance PostgreSQL – SQL & PL/PGSQL 
  • Cutting-edge integration technologies – Kafka, GraphQL 
  • Business Process Management and Rules libraries (Activiti, Drools, etc) 
  • Docker microservices & Docker Swarm orchestration 
  • High performance & Highly available architectures, data structures and algorithms 
  • Training in Telecommunications and Service Provider Domain 
Benefits : 
  • We reward high achieving employees with pay above industry average  
  • BPJS
  • 12 days annual leave and other personal leave 
Your application  
Please include your academic  results, and  provide your CV in English only.

companyOverview.html:
The services that customers ask of a logistics company are becoming more and more varied and customized.  Whether you are sending goods or documents, you need the assurance that these will be sent quickly, safely and efficiently.  If your business involves  delivery of goods, you will need to contact various service providers for packaging, licensing, documentation services, and a courier or freight forwarder.  Each time you send a package, you will need to contact at least three different service providers.
RPX is here to facilitate and shorten this process. Whatever type of goods or documents you need to send, wherever you wish to send them, whether by air, land or sea, we have the infrastructure and network at your disposal. Even customs clearance and storage while your goods are in transit can be managed by RPX. RPX is supported by the latest state-of-the-art technology to answer your every needs. The comprehensive services offered by RPX along with our local and international network throughout the major cities in Indonesia and the world, will make everything easy for you.
For career development, RPX provides a various range of career opportunities at different levels throughout Indonesia. Here, you will be given chances to develop yourself, take responsibilities, master challenges, overcome problems, and improve your skills. We are committed to stimulate your improvement and development, and support your growth, to help you achieve your goals and succeed with us.

companyOverview.html:
PT Kewalram Indonesia had a modest beginning with the installation of a spinning mill in 1976 in Bandung, Indonesia. Since then, it has grown to become a large integrated textile facility covering spinning, embroidery and a dye house equipped with state-of-the-art machineries. Our customer oriented approach, coupled with exacting quality led to increased demand for our products and thereby enabling our growth over the years.
Our products are exported to over 60 countries across the globe in 4 Continents, reflecting company's strong commitment and emphasis on quality. The company also has a substancial presence in the domestic markets with a wide range of products offering.
Kewalram has achieved leadership position in its product range based on its unwavering commitment to highest quality standards and drive towards total consumer satisfaction.
We are the first integrated textile unit to receive the ISO (ISO 9001 & OEKOTEX) accreditation for quality management in Indonesia. Adding to our ever growing quality standards, We are now a memeber of Better Cotton Initiative (BCI) and bearer of Global Recycle Standard Certification.

Deskripsi Pekerjaan
Kami mencari Business Development Executive yang akan bertanggung jawab mengembangkan dan mendorong pertumbuhan Kitchen Hub. Anda akan memiliki dampak dalam mengembangkan dapur sebagai situs pilihan untuk Pemilik bisnis F&B dan bersama dengan peluang menarik untuk menumbuhkan & mengarahkan bisnis dapur Cloud kami, mengusulkan rencana dan pekerjaan ekspansi.
Kegiatan Sehari-hari
  • Bangun / Kelola hubungan dengan restoran untuk memenuhi kebutuhan mereka akan sukses sambil menutup kesepakatan dan menghasilkan prospek baru;
  • Secara aktif mencari prospek Penjualan baru melalui Telepon, email, Situs Web, dan SNS);
  • Bekerja dengan sejumlah jalur penjualan B2B dengan efisiensi tinggi (UKM, perusahaan, Pemerintah, dll.);
  • Mempresentasikan promosi penjualan yang disesuaikan kepada pelanggan termasuk pengetahuan pasar, pemahaman tinggi tentang RTB (alasan untuk percaya) dengan keterampilan persuasi tingkat lanjut;
  • Bepergian ke situs dalam wilayah penjualan untuk membangun hubungan dan menyampaikan promosi;
  • Berkomunikasi dan bekerja dengan tim dan departemen untuk meningkatkan efisiensi operasional, dan kinerja penjualan sehingga mitra dapat menerima layanan berkualitas tinggi;
Persyaratan
  • Minimal mempunyai gelar sarjana S1 di semua jurusan;
  • Memiliki pengalaman minimal 1 tahun di bidang terkait
  • Energetik dan mempunyai semangat dalam bisnis dan kemitraan;
  • Keterampilan komunikasi verbal dan tertulis yang sangat baik;
  • Pembelajar mandiri yang termotivasi dan pemula;
  • Terorganisir dan berorientasi pada detail;
  • Team Player yang percaya diri dan dapat berkolaborasi.
Nilai Pengalaman Tambahan
  • memiliki pengetahuan dan pengalaman dalam industri real estate, F&B atau teknologi;
  • Anda memiliki pengetahuan dan pengalaman dalam merencanakan strategi penjualan, pengembangan bisnis;
  • Pengalaman bekerja di lingkungan start-up yang serba cepat;
  • Pengalaman menggunakan Salesforce sebagai CRM.

companyOverview.html:
Through idealism and creativity, SHAFIRA has grown from a small muslim fashion studio into what it is now. Its name was inspired by the word “SHAF”, that does not only mean a line, but also indicates a properly structured organization.Pioneered by Feny Mustafa at Salman Mosque ITB on 8 January 1989, SHAFIRA has turned into a major company with 24 showrooms in 15 major cities across Indonesia.
With more than 30.000 active members spread across Indonesia and other countries, SHAFIRA has tried to build a good and healthy relationship with its members through activities such as health training, fashion consultation, jilbab classes and other regular member activities. In addition to the members of SHAFIRA, the company would not have been as succesful without the help and support of the mass media. SHAFIRA relatef publications have supported the company, and made it well known in public. Along with its development, Shafira’s consistency in one of the business mission that is giving benefits for others in Corporate Social Responsibility program is well managed by Shafira Foundations.
Through elegant and exclusive designs, SHAFIRA has tried its best to accommodate the needs of both men and women alike. now, at 24th years ols, SHAFIRA is trying to bring a new wave of style, with “total look” as the concept. SHAFIRA understands that attire is an important aspect of someone’s life, and tries to incorporate both design and comfort into its line of apparel. The combination of simple and elegant design in addition high quality fabric has allowed SHAFIRA to create something for every season, be it formal, or casual. Various accessories and jilbabs that are designed to harmonize with the chosen outfits are also available.

companyOverview.html:
PT Bank Nationalnobu Tbk (NobuBank) adalah bank yang telah berdiri lebih dari 20 tahun di industri perbankan Indonesia yang kini hadir dengan konsep dan tampilan yang baru sebagai wujud dari diperbaruinya visi, misi dan strategi Perseroan.
Dengan semangat untuk lebih mampu memberikan kontribusi riil pada perekonomian di tanah air, NobuBank berusaha menciptakan nilai tambah bagi masyarakat luas melalui jasa intermediasi perbankan yang menjadi kompetensi inti yang dimiliki Perseroan. Melalui langkah-langkah strategis yang dilakukan, Perseroan ingin mempertajam kompetensi tersebut khususnya dalam bidangcommercial dan consumer banking dengan memilih segmentasi pasar pada usaha kecil dan menengah yang terbukti telah menjadi fondasi yang kuat dalam perekonomian Indonesia.
Dengan integritas yang tinggi, Perseroan ingin memperkuat dan memperluas jaringan kemitraan melalui pelayanan yang prima dan pembukaan kantor cabang di berbagai lokasi strategis di seluruh wilayah Indonesia.
Di masa datang, kepercayaan dari nasabah dan mitra bisnis akan mampu membawa Perseroan pada posisi terhormat di dalam dunia perbankan khususnya dalam hal asset, pangsa pasar, dan keluasan jaringan, tidak hanya dalam perspektif lokal namun juga dari sudut pandang regional dan global. Dengan tujuan untuk memperkuat struktur permodalan, maka Perseroan telah melakukan Penawaran Umum Perdana Saham (IPO) dan pada tanggal 20 Mei 2013 secara resmi telah mencatatkan diri di Bursa efek Indonesia dengan kode saham “NOBU”. Hal ini sekaligus menjadi momentum bagi Perseroan untuk mengajak masyarakat luas turut berpartisipasi dalam pengembangan Perseroan di masa datang.

We are Geekhunter, Indonesia’s prominent IT Recruitment Consultant founded since 2013. We are Headhunter for Geek/IT Professionals. We help companies to find the right IT professional at the same time helping you to have a better and meaningful career.
Geekhunter has an extensive database of over 70k IT professionals and has been helping tech companies from Indonesia, Singapore, Malaysia, Australia and South Korea to hire the right talent faster.
Geekhunter is hiring on behalf of our clients, a rapidly growing startup company in Indonesia.

jobDescription.html:
Job Description
  • This is a combination of sales (80%) and client management (20%)
  • Achieve agreed upon sales targets and outcomes within schedule
  • You will present, promote and sell employment opportunities of our client to existing and prospective candidates
  • Everyday you will identify and approach prospective candidates, lead generation, and conversion through cold calling
  • You will work closely with our clients to deliver the right candidates for them and maintain positive business relationship

Job Requirement

  • Fresh graduate with proven track record of organization experience and achievements are welcome to apply.
  • Highly motivated and target driven with a proven track record in sales
  • Must have a “hunter mentality“, willing to work hard and work smart (sometimes late nights/on weekend if necessary)
  • Excellent selling, communication and negotiation skills
  • Prioritizing, time management and organizational skills
  • Relationship management skills and openness to feedback
  • Have a growth mindset
  • Agile and quick to adapt in a VUCA environment
  • Candidate must possess at least a Bachelor’s Degree, any field.

  • Work location: Jakarta/Bandung/Yogyakarta (will work remotely temporarily due to Covid19)
This is not for you, if you:
  • are #teamrebahan
  • are not ambitious and competitive
  • hate target/are not a number driven
  • Get stressed out/panic easily
  • generally dislike interacting with people (you will at least talk with 15 people per day on the phone)
  • are awkward when communicating with people
  • don’t have a strong work ethic and integrity
  • are not open-minded
  • are not good at business emailing and business messaging
  • are a fans of work life balance instead of work life integration

companyOverview.html:
Berawal dari sebuah usaha milik keluarga bernama PT. Bank Karman yang didirikan pada tahun 1969 dan berkedudukan di Surabaya, selanjutnya pada tahun 1992 berubah nama menjadi PT. Mega Bank dan melakukan relokasi Kantor Pusat ke Jakarta.

Seiring dengan perkembangannya PT. Mega Bank pada tahun 1996 diambil alih oleh PARA GROUP (PT. Para Global Investindo dan PT. Para Rekan Investama). Untuk lebih meningkatkan citra PT. Mega Bank, pada bulan Juni 1997 melakukan perubahan logo dengan tujuan bahwa sebagai lembaga keuangan kepercayaan masyarakat, akan lebih mudah dikenal melalui logo perusahaan yang baru tersebut. Pada tahun 2000 dilakukan perubahan nama dari PT. Mega Bank menjadi PT. Bank Mega.

Dalam rangka memperkuat struktur permodalan maka pada tahun yang sama PT. Bank Mega melaksanakan Initial Public Offering dan listed di BEJ maupun BES. Dengan demikian sebagian saham PT. Bank Mega dimiliki oleh publik dan berubah namanya menjadi PT. Bank Mega Tbk.

Pada saat krisis ekonomi, Bank Mega mencuat sebagai salah satu bank yang tidak terpengaruh oleh krisis dan tumbuh terus tanpa bantuan pemerintah bersama-sama dengan Citibank, Deutche Bank dan HSBC.
PT. Bank Mega Tbk. dengan semboyan "To Be Pride of The Nation" tumbuh dengan pesat dan terkendali serta menjadi lembaga keuangan ternama yang mampu disejajarkan dengan bank-bank terkemuka di Asia Pasifik dan telah mendapatkan berbagai penghargaan dan prestasi baik di tingkat nasional, regional maupun internasional. Dalam upaya mewujudkan kinerja sesuai dengan nama yang disandangnya, PT. Bank Mega Tbk. berpegang pada azas profesionalisme, keterbukaan dan kehati-hatian dengan struktur permodalan yang kuat serta produk dan fasilitas perbankan terkini.
Pada tahun 2013 Bank Mega memperkenalkan identitas baru yang terdiri dari logo dan simbol grafis huruf “M” yang merefleksikan positioning dan acuan pertumbuhan yang baru bagi perusahaan.
Warna-warna hangat merupakan luapan energi dari logo baru Bank Mega yang energik dan solusi keuangan yang kompherensif kepada pelanggan. Warna kuning menggambarkan kecerdasan dan harapan. Warna abu-abu menggambarkan sistem yang canggih. Warna orange menggambarkan semangat dan optimisme, menunjukkan setiap insan Bank Mega selalu melihat sudut pandang positif atas tiap kejadian dan selalu mengupayakan hasil akhir yang terbaik. Identitas baru ini juga merefleksikan ambisi Bank Mega untuk mewujudkan masyarakat dan bangsa Indonesia yang maju dan sejahtera, dengan menyediakan berbagai solusi keuangan yang spesifik, sesuai kebutuhan sesuai nasabah secara lengkap dan menyeluruh, dikelola secara profesional dengan technologi berkelas dunia dan kontrol kualitas yang terjaga baik, yang memungkinkan setiap individu, keluarga, dan bisnis nasabah berada pada jalur tercepat dalam mencapai keberhasilan di bidang keuangan.

About Geekseat
Geekseat is an Australian owned and managed IT Consultant company. Our software developers are all employees of Geekseat and are located in our development centres in Indonesia.
Our goal is to be the premier software company for both client and employee engagement. By providing fantastic customer service, on-time delivery, and smart and innovative solutions. Our smart and innovative solutions are provided by smart, keen, engaged employees, who have the opportunity to use their skills to their full capacity, and develop new skills in the process.
Geekseat is the perfect development partner for any organization looking to externally resource or extend their current development team, In particular:
- Software Houses
- IT Departments
- Digital Marketing Agencies
In Geekseat, in addition to your technical skills, your attitude will also determine your career. You not only need high individual skills, but you also need to be willing to help your fellow team members when they need it.

companyOverview.html:
Alif Iqra merupakan Platform aplikasi yang dikelola oleh PT. Sahabat Alif Indonesia bertujuan untuk mempertemukan murid dan guru mengaji yang kompeten dan berpengalaman. Berawal dari program home privat Alif School yang berjalan dengan sistem offline sejak 2016, permintaan privat di beberapa daerah semakin meningkat. Sehingga kami mulai merintis Alif Iqra di akhir tahun 2018 untuk memudahkan orang tua menemukan guru mengaji yang sesuai kebutuhannya dengan akses teknologi melalui sistem aplikasi.
Dengan keunggulan system pembayaran yang mudah serta laporan perkembangan anak setiap pertemuan secara langsung, Alif Iqra hadir untuk memudahkan pencarian guru mengaji dari mana pun dan kapan pun.
Hingga saat ini, Alif Iqra sudah hadir di kota-kota besar seluruh Indonesia antara lain: Jabodetabek, Bandung, Cirebon, Yogyakarta, Surabaya, Malang, Pontianak, Pekanbaru, Makassar, Medan, Denpasar, Palembang dan Balikpapan. ALIF (Alquran Learning and Islamic Foundation) sendiri merupakan lembaga pembelajaran Al-Quran dan Pembelajaran Islam (Islamic Studies) bagi anak-anak (3-9), Remaja (10-17), dan Dewasa (18+) dengan strategi pembelajaran Fun learning, Bilingual, dan Intensive.
Kami mengkombinasikan materi pembelajaran klasik dengan media kreatif yang akrab dengan anak-anak seperti tracing, colouring, painting, game-learning, video-learning, crafting, dan story telling. Materi tersebut kami sampaikan secara Bilingual (pembiasaan penggunaan Bahasa Inggris dan Arab dasar).
Follow our social media:
https://www.instagram.com/alifiqra/
https://www.facebook.com/alifiqraIndonesia

companyOverview.html:
PT. Multi Mayaka sebagai perusahaan pemegang merk dan distributor tunggal dari berbagai brand terkemuka dalam bidang komersial dan hardware dalam dunia industri. Kami merepresentasikan Bitec (Powertools), MultiPro (Hardware, Cleaning, Welding dan Handtools), Rogers (Car Audio),  Mayaka Premium (Home Appliences), dan Mayaka (Home Appliences). Kami bertanggung jawab untuk distribusi, penjualan dan layanan purna jual.
PT. Multi Mayaka menyediakan rangkaian lengkap komersial hardware untuk perdagangan dan industri. Dengan jaringan distribusi yang luas di seluruh Indonesia, kami berusaha selalu dekat dengan pelanggan dan klien kami. Layanan purna jual kami tersebar di 17 lokasi di Indonesia, dengan 17 service center di berbagai kota besar, menjadikan layanan purna jual kami yang paling lengkap di Indonesia. Kami siap untuk menyediakan layanan perbaikan ekspres dengan waktu sesingkat mungkin dengan biaya yang terjangkau untuk Anda.
Dan untuk customer PT.Multi Mayaka, akses yang diberikan untuk anda sangatlah mudah dikarenakan anda bisa menghubungi call center kami (0804 1000 999) atau dapat menghubungi kami di 17 kantor kami  yang tersebar di di seluruh Indonesia.
Oleh karena itu  PT.Multi Mayaka berkomitmen untuk memberikan pelayanan yang terbaik dan kemudahan akses untuk para customer PT.Multi Mayaka yang terdapat di seluruh indonesia.

companyOverview.html:
Prosa is a company with expertise in artificial intelligence especially for Processing Bahasa Indonesia. Prosa comes from the abbreviation of Pemrosesan Bahasa "language processing". On the other hand, Prosa means "prose" in English and also shares the same spelling with a word in Latin which means "frankly".
We are a team of people passionate about Text and Speech Processing, and eager to solve business problems utilizing the power of AI.

companyOverview.html: Mitrais is a world-class software company with offices in Indonesia, Singapore, and Vietnam.​ Software development and support is our core skill with offices in Jakarta, Bandung, Yogyakarta, and Bali.​ We also sell and support leading mining & hospital systems.​ In business since 1991 we have developed or implemented software for over 500 clients including some of Indonesia’s leading companies.​ Our proprietary competency system guarantees the quality of our staff.

jobDescription.html:
Build your Career with Mitrais!
We know that many C++ developers are stuck in jobs where they are supporting and enhancing legacy systems.  
Are you the C++ Developer we are looking for?
What will you be doing? 
  • Processing of analytics data 
  • Calling APIs to integrate with existing systems and hardware. 
  • Monitoring mission critical infrastructure.
  • Analyzing payment transactions 
  • Optimizing payment environment
What about you ? 
  • Very strong C++ experience including the latest language features from C++ 11 and above
  • Understanding of the C++ standard namespace std::  features such as std::vector, std::set and std::for_each
  • Processing of streams in C++   
  • API Integration in C++
  • Understanding of Object-Oriented Principles eg SOLID, polymorphism, inheritance
  • Understanding of the application of Design Patterns
  • Code Refactoring 
  • Test Driven Development 
  • Relevant Degree (Associate Degree and/or Bachelor Degree)
And if you have exposure to any of the following then that will be a big plus:
  • Comfortable with AOP
  • Git, GitHub, Jenkins
  • Agile / SCRUM
  • Front end development (HTML5, CSS3, SPA)
  • AWS or Azure deployments
  • MsSQL/PostgreSQL/ MySQL/ MongoDB
  • Service Automation
What can Mitrais offer you?
  • A CAREER, not a JOB!
  • Competitive salary
  • Excellent working environment, with the possibility to relocate to our regional offices and working remotely
  • Free English classes, English is our working language
  • Lots of opportunities to improve your competencies on our technical boot camps, certification programs and soft skills training courses?
  • Hackathons with big prizes!?
  • Take a break with Happy Hours, Billiard Tables, gaming rooms and free drinks and snacks to keep you 100% effective? 
Learn about life at Mitrais? from our current team by searching #mitraislife on Facebook or LinkedIn.
 
To Apply…? 
Simply click the apply button, complete the form and upload your latest CV in English! What are you waiting for?

companyOverview.html:
The Peak Connoisseurs
The Peak Connoisseurs's believes in bringing you the best quality wines and spirits from every corner of the globe. Our focus is to share outstanding products that we are passionate about with everyone who is willing to explore the flavors of the world with us.
The Peak Connoisseurs merupakan  bagian dari  The Peak Resort Dining  yang telah lebih dari  10 tahun  berkiprah  di bidang Boga yang berada dalam naungan PT Reka Kreasi Makmur Abadi. Dalam perjalanan eksploratifnya  di bidang Boga, The Peak  sangat menyadari bahwa wine telah menjadi bagian produk konsumsi yang terpaut erat dengan dunia kuliner.

Berbekal  pengalaman dan pengamatan pasar  dalam kurun waktu lebih dari satu dekade  The Peak Connoisseur kini telah siap untuk melayani berbagai kebutuhan para pelanggan terhormat di produk :  Wines, Spirits , Cigar, Tobacco , Pipe Smoking & Coffee. Kami telah meletakan titik-titik pelayanan yang tersebar di area strategis dalam jangkauan pendek bagi pelanggan kami  di kota Bandung dan kota-kota besar lainnya dalam konteks kerjasama dengan system konsinyasi dan direct purchase dengan hotel-hotel berbintang terpilih.

companyOverview.html:
PT Suparma Tbk was established in 1976 on a site of five (5) hectares land in Surabaya, Indonesia and employed approximately 100 people. The first paper was rolled out in 1978 using a 7,000 ton per year paper machine.
Responding to the growing paper demand in the country, in 1984 the company decided to roll out her first expansion program by adding there (3) units of Paper Machine and raised her total production capacity to 51,000 ton per year.
In 1992, the company further invested another two (2) units of Paper Machine with capacity of 99,000 tons p.a. to accommodate the strong increase of paper demand in the market in tandem with the Indonesian government industrialization program.
In line with globalization era, PT Suparma Tbk took a profound move in becoming a public company and listed in Jakarta Stock Exchange in 1994.
Today, located on a land of twenty one (21) hectares, PT Suparma Tbk operates 6 units of Paper Machine with a total combined capacity of 150,000 tons p.a. and supported by approximately 1,500 delegated employees.
Holding the motto of 'Continues Improvement', PT Suparma Tbk actively serves both domestic and international market with high quality products, services and meeting the customer expectations.

companyOverview.html:
PENGUMUMAN :
  • PT Wicaksana Overseas International, Tbk. tidak pernah memungut biaya apapun dalam proses rekrutmen.
  • PT Wicaksana Overseas International, Tbk. tidak pernah bekerja sama dengan travel agent / biro perjalanan tertentu dalam proses rekrutmen.
  • Apabila Anda diminta untuk membayar sejumlah uang dalam bentuk pembayaran tiket pesawat dan hotel atau akomodasi lainnya agar diabaikan.
  • Jangan memberikan data pribadi atau data keuangan Anda kepada siapapun.
  • Jika membutuhkan klarifikasi lebih lanjut dapat langsung menghubungi PT Wicaksana Overseas International, Tbk.
About PT. Wicaksana Overseas International, Tbk.
Wicaksana was established in 1973, distributing fast moving consumer goods such as instant noodles, snacks, beverages, personal care and also pharmaceutical products. As the underlying goal of any business is to drive growth, DKSH’s acquisition of the majority of PT Wicaksana’s shares in 2017 has provided the basis for the expansion of Wicaksana’s market position. Leveraging DKSH’s long-standing experience, PT Wicaksana successfully increased its distribution centers and channels as well as its marketing and sales capabilities. After being part of DKSH for two years, Wicaksana is delighted to introduce its new logo in line with DKSH’s look and feel, referencing the Fantree plant.
With a strategy for growth and in-depth knowledge gathered in specialized Business Units, Wicaksana and DKSH focus on consistently delivering results. Two years after the acquisition, Wicaksana has been growing rapidly ever since. Wicaksana operates across Indonesia’s major cities and has more than 1,000 employees. The acquisition has helped build trust and has secured big partnerships with both multinational and local companies. The client portfolio includes names, such as Mars, Unilever Asia or Coca Cola Distribution Indonesia and the STT company, but also Tokopedia, as a local giant in the e-commerce sector.
To distribute all its clients’ products, Wicaksana operates across all major cities in Indonesia. Wicaksana recorded net sales of IDR 1,85 Trillion in 2019.

What else we would like to see?

  • Knowledge or professional experience of Front-end development using HTML5, CSS, JavaScript frameworks

  • Technical skills in web-scale architecture patterns, solutions design, and application performance

What can Mitrais offer you?

companyOverview.html:
Belah Doeren adalah durian specialist dari Bandung yang menghadirkan berbagai macam menu olahan durian terbaik. Kami terus berinovasi untuk memenuhi keinginan para pecinta durian terhadap olahan durian berkualitas.
Berdiri di Bandung sejak Maret 2013, kami mengawali usaha dengan berbagai macam menu dessert durian seperti Pancake Durian, durio ice cream, durian sauce vanilla, durian sauce matcha, durian madness, durian goreng, durian bakar, durian crumble, dan menu lainnya.
Hingga akhirnya di tahun 2015, atas permintaan para pelanggan setia dan kecintaan kami terhadap durian, kami mulai membuat berbagai macam menu patisseries. Selain classic soes yang sudah ada sejak pertama kali berdiri, kami berinovasi membuat chewy soes, brownies durian (bakar), buttercake durian, mille crepe durian, dan nastar durian.  Produk patisseries kami banyak dijadikan oleh-oleh durian baru dari Bandung.
Terima kasih atas dukungan dari para pelanggan setia kami, semoga Belah Doeren bisa terus memberikan produk kualitas terbaik dan terus berinovasi menghadirkan berbagai macam olahan durian
Belah Doeren, take Durian to the next level!

companyOverview.html:
In brief, iFORTE is a data-communication company with a license from Ministry of Communication and Information to provide broadband connection and internet services using fiber-opticcable, broadband wireless access,VSAT technology, and the deployment of Micro BTS.  
For Broadband Internet connection,we have expanded fiber-opticcable network that we have primarily deployed in Jakarta Metropolitan.  Our fiber-optic backbone in Jakarta is located along the whole busway corridors which pass along the major and busiest streets in Jakarta. From Jakarta onward, we continue expanding our fiber-optic networks to other major cities across Indonesia. For last mile solution, as an alternative to fiber optic cable, we might use Broadband Wireless Access in order to provide services to our customers quickly and most cost-effectively.
iFORTE’s VSAT networks have been deployed all over Indonesia, especially in the remote areas where terrestrial services are not readily available. In late 2010, we have upgraded our VSAT equipments to the latest state-of-the-art technology in order to enable us to provide the highest quality solution with the most optimum bandwidth usages. The technology can be used  not only for Data and Voice communication but also for Video-Conference. 
In year 2010 also, Micro-BTS was added to the portfolio business of iForte. Currently, many sites have been built in within Jakarta metropolitan area.
History
iForte started in year 2002 as a company which offered VSAT services in addition to provide customs programming to a large diverse group of companies. Then, in year 2007, iForte started  building Jakarta metropolitan broadband network.  In year 2010, Micro-BTS was added to be the main business of iForte. 
Product & Services
iFORTE intends to provide Integrated Network Solution to our customers. Our Telecommunication business consist of three main lines of services, namely:
  • Broadband Internet Connection, with a brand name of M-WIFO. M-WIFO stands for Metropolitan Wireless and Fiber OpticNetwork—which describes our idea to provide broadband internet connection using fiber-optic and broadband  wireless technology
  • VSAT Communication, with a brand name I-VSAT. iFORTE VSAT (Very Small Aperture Terminal) offers a multi service platform that can be suited for data, telephony, and multimedia communications. VSATs are mostly set up in remote areas and placeswith less availability of broadband providers
  • Micro BTS - Micro BTS is a BTS, which a smaller version of Macro BTS. Micro BTS is to enhance the coverage and quality of services from Telecommunication Providers (Telcos) whereas they will be deployed in significant numbers.
Financial
iFORTE is supported by very strong shareholders and investorswho have excellent financial strengths and respectable business reputation in Indonesia and in the world community.

companyOverview.html:
WEALTHY didirikan pada tahun 2006 untuk memenuhi permintaan pasar dengan produk-produk berkualitas dan dapat diandalkan dibidang pemeliharaan aftermarket otomotif di Asia.
Dengan menggabungkan pengetahuan pendiri dan teknologi dari Eropa, kami telah menghasilkan banyak produk andalan dengan kualitas tinggi seperti Magic Spray 9 in 1, Wiper Blade, Wiper Blade Refill, Auto Bulbs, Automatic Transmission Conditioner, Power Steering Conditioner dan banyak produk lainnya dimana setiap orang dapat melakukan perawatan pada kendaraan atau aktifitas lainnya secara pribadi.
Kami menciptakan produk-produk ramah lingkungan. Hal ini telah menjadi komitmen kami sejak perusahaan ini didirikan. Seperti halnya produk berbahan dasar air yang kami buat diantaranya Karburator Foam Cleaner, produk untuk poles body kendaraan dll.
Perkembangan teknologi industri otomotif semakin meningkat. Begitu juga WEALTHY yang akan terus tumbuh dan berkembang melalui R&D Departemen untuk memenuhi industri otomotif.
Dengan berkembangnya usaha utama, Wealthy Group mengembangkan bisnisnya dibidang material bangunan diantaranya Microfiber Chamois Cloth, Cutting Disk, Granding Disk dll.
Jika suatu hari melihat pengembangan produk aftermarket untuk industri otomotif dan material bangunan, dapat dipastikan itu adalah WEALTHY.

companyOverview.html: Mitrais is a world-class software company with offices in Indonesia, Singapore, and Vietnam.​ Software development and support is our core skill with offices in Jakarta, Bandung, Yogyakarta, and Bali.​ We also sell and support leading mining & hospital systems.​ In business since 1991 we have developed or implemented software for over 500 clients including some of Indonesia’s leading companies.​ Our proprietary competency system guarantees the quality of our staff.

jobDescription.html:
Build your Career with Mitrais ! 
 
We're looking for experienced Software Engineers from any background to be part of our team. 
What will you be doing? 
  • Coding high-quality software using distributed computing, messaging, microservices, performance tuning and memory and resource management techniques
  • Developing data-driven solutions for a range of clients - frontend as well as backend. 
  • Collaborating within cross-functional and international agile teams.
  • Testing, debugging, re-testing, and coordinating with QA, validating software as ready for shipping
  • Reviewing code and acting as a subject matter expert for juniors in the team 
What about you ? 
  • You already have 2+ years of experience as an application developer. 
  • You can speak reasonable English 
  • You are well versed in best practices in OOP, design patterns, SOLID principles, and data driven design 
  • You are comfortable using git or TFS in a CI/CD environment
  •  You enjoy working on lean and agile development projects using Scrum & Kanban
  • You love clean and beautiful code, with an eye for simplicity and pragmatism. 
What can Mitrais offer you ?
  • A CAREER, not a JOB !
  • Competitive salary
  • Excellent working environment, with the possibility to relocate to our regional offices and working remotely 
  • Free English classes, English is our working language 
  • Lots of opportunities to improve your competencies on our technical bootcamps, certification programs and soft skills training courses
  • Hackathons with big prizes !
  • Office preference location in Bali, Jakarta, Bandung or Yogyakarta
  • Take a break with Happy Hours, Billiard Tables, gaming rooms and free drinks and snacks to keep you 100% effective 
Learn about life at Mitrais from our current team by searching #mitraislife on Facebook or LinkedIn.
To Apply… 
Simply click the apply button, complete the form and upload your latest CV in English ! What are you waiting for?

companyOverview.html:
PT INTAN PERTIWI INDUSTRI(INTIWI) didirikan pada tahun 1976 dan telah memproduksi kawat las pada tahun 1977. Sejak itu produksi INTIWI secara teknis telah bekerjasama dengan Kobe Stell, Ltd. Jepang.
Setelah lebih dari 25 tahun bekerjasama dengan Kobe Steel, saat ini INTIWI memproduksi dan memasok berbagai jenis kawat las Kobelco, mulai dari Mild Stell, High Tensile Stell, Stainless Stell, Hardfacing, dan Cast iron. Selain memproduksi, INTIWI juga menyimpan stock las siap pakai yang dibuat oleh Kobe Stell Jepang.
Untuk menjaga dan meningkatkan Kualitas kawat las KOBELCO yang diproduksi, INTIWI terus melakukan pengawasan yang tinggi dalam proses produksi melalui bagian Quality Control dengan standarisasi yang ditetapkan oleh Jepang dan dalam pengembangan produk INTIWI mendapatkan support dari Departemen Teknis Kobe Steel secara penuh, sehingga untuk kualitas kawat las sudah tidak diragukan lagi.
Jika anda adalah lulusan fresh graduated maupun profesional yang tertarik dan tertantang untuk mengoptimalkan kompetensi anda. Mari bergabunglah bersama kami.

companyOverview.html:
Kami menghimbau agar Anda berhati-hati saat melamar  pekerjaan dengan selalu memastikan iklan lowongan tersebut sesuai dengan profil perusahaannya.
Waspadalah jika Anda menemukan hal-hal di bawah ini :
  • PT Pintu Mas Mulia Kimia tidak pernah memungut biaya apapun dalam proses rekrutmen.
  • PT Pintu Mas Mulia Kimia tidak pernah bekerja sama dengan travel agent / biro perjalanan tertentu dalam proses  rekrutmen.
  • Apabila Anda diminta untuk membayar sejumlah uang dalam bentuk pembayaran tiket pesawat dan hotel atau  akomodasi lainnya agar diabaikan.
  • Apabila ada Panggilan wawancara di lokasi yang tidak sesuai dengan iklan yang tertera pada iklan lowongan.
  • Jangan memberikan data pribadi atau data keuangan Anda kepada siapapun.
==========================================================
PT Pintu Mas Mulia Kimia (PMMK) was established in 1981. It is a privately owned company, engaged in the business of chemicals, machinery & parts, and laboratory testing instruments supply to a number of industries. In 1985, with the remarkable growth and diversification, a strong marketing network was established in Jakarta, Bandung, Semarang, Solo, and Surabaya handling the distribution of products manufactured by many of the world's most renowned chemicals producers. By the year 2000, the company expanded the business area by establishing a branch operation in Pekan Baru.

Technological advancement and market conditions continue to dictate what manufacturers will produce to fulfil consumer demands. PMMK continues to sharpen its competitive edge through collaboration with leading manufacturers of specialty chemicals around the world.

To be able to serve our customers well, our sales team is made up of a group of talents that possess good market knowledge and relevant technical expertise. While serving our customers, our sales, technical, and support team members also believe in building long-term customer relationships and excel in applications knowledge. Timely response and polite attitude are our service spirit.

Our company is here to create values for our customers, principals, shareholders, and employees. We believe all parties are interdependent to cooperate together, to support one another in a respectful manner. This we believe is the foundation of establishing long-term relationships.

companyOverview.html:
Pada bulan Agustus tahun 1987, P.T. Sansan Saudaratex Jaya Garment membuka pabrik Garment pertamanya yang berlokasi di Jl. Cibaligo No. 33 Leuwigajah – Cimahi – Jawa Barat – Indonesia. Selama lebih dari dua puluh tahun, perusahaan kami telah berkembang pesat dan saat ini telah mempekerjakan lebih dari 8000 karyawan di 8 lokasi pabrik.
P.T. Sansan Saudaratex Jaya Garment merupakan perusahaan yang menghasilkan garment dengan kualitas tinggi untuk pasar dunia dengan harga yang sangat bersaing.
Perusahaan kami mampu menghasilkan berbagai jenis garment, dengan berbagai macam model, antara lain jenis pakaian Men, Ladies, Children, dan Babies dengan total kapasitas mencapai 2,550,000 pieces per bulan. Pelanggan kami di seluruh dunia mengakui produk kami dikarenakan kualitasnya, keseragaman produknya, dengan harganya yang bersaing dan mereka secara konsisten terus melakukan kerjasama dan berkembang bersama kami.
Dalam menghasilkan produk yang berkualitas tinggi, perusahaan kami didukung oleh teknologi yang canggih dan tentunya dibantu oleh tenaga kerja ahli yang kompeten di bidangnya. Selain itu kami juga didukung oleh kantor kami di Hongkong, untuk membantu kami dalam menyediakan semua kebutuhan kami, seperti halnya mesin-mesin, accessories, material, dan lain-lain yang dibutuhkan dalam memproduksi produk kami.
Perusahaan kami secara tegas mengikuti semua peraturan-peraturan Compliance (Persetujuan) dan juga Kode Etika BSCI (yang telah disepakati oleh PBB untuk penerapan Hak Asasi Manusia).
VISI : "Diakui sebagai perusahaan kelas dunia dan dipercaya atas komitmennya terhadap kepuasan pelanggan."
MISI : "Kami merupakan perusahaan yang menghasilkan produk-produk apparel yang berkualitas tinggi untuk masyarakat dunia yang ingin meningkatkan standar kehidupan mereka."
Produk yang kami hasilkan saat ini telah menembus pasar ekspor, karena produk kami dapat memenuhi standard quality requirement dari buyer yang sangat ketat, sehingga kami dipercaya oleh buyer untuk membuat produk-produk yang sesuai dengan keinginan mereka.
Adapun beberapa negara dan buyer yang telah menjadi tujuan export kami adalah sebagai berikut:
USA : GAP, OshKosh B'Gosh, Carter's, Disney, Target Corp, Austin, Aeropostale, etc.
Europe : H&M, C&A, etc.

B. Braun Melsungen AG is one of the world's leading providers and manufacturers of healthcare solutions today. Every service that B. Braun provides incorporates the entirety of our knowledge and skills, the company's deep understanding of users'​ needs, and more than 175 years of extensive expertise. Braun product range comprises 5,000 different products, 95 percent of which are manufactured by the company. By offering supplementary services and consulting, B. B.Braun Indonesia, a fast growing subsidiary of B. Braun Melsungen AG. What We Are
We are the internet of things (IoT) startup for fish/shrimp farming, purely local, based on Bandung, full of action, all passion, no drama, no bullshit 
What We Do
We build a smart feeding solution that can automatically feed the fish, sense the fish’s appetite, and connected to the internet 
Why We Do It
We want to solve the biggest problem from one of the most crucial and fastest-growing industry in the world: aquaculture. We strive to help hundreds of millions of farmers globally by delivering this breakthrough, especially for people at the bottom of the pyramid. eFishery is trying to disrupt aquaculture industry and tackles global challenge in food security, creating real impacts for our mankind.

companyOverview.html:
PT Sanbe Farma adalah perusahaan farmasi yang berkantor pusat di Bandung, saat ini Kami sedang membutuhkan karyawan baru yang professional, cekatan dan bertanggung jawab untuk dapat bergabung bersama kami
Sanbe Farma was founded in 1975. As of now after more than three decades since inception, we are the largest pharmaceutical manufacturers in Indonesia and according the recent IMS Report, we rank highest among all the Pharmaceutical Manufacturers in Indonesia including Multinational Companies. Out of top 10 products ethically prescribed, 4 products are from Sanbe. Our market coverage in Indonesia includes more than 37,000 Doctors served by 1,000 Medical Representatives, through our associate’s net-work of 1,100 Sales persons, 35 depots, 60 sub-depots and our corporate work force consisting 8,000 personnel. Our eight manufacturing facilities in Indonesia are cGMP approved plants as per the International Standards. Our sterile preparations unit (LVPs & SVPs) is the first in South East Asia with State-of-the-Art manufacturing equipment and technology from US and Europe and PIC(S) & TGA, Australia compliant.
Our international operations in 20 countries are set to make substantial contribution to the global healthcare. Our international operations cover not only export of our formulations to various developing and under developed countries, but also seek partnerships and alliances from and to developed and regulated markets such as North America and Europe with an aim to put Sanbe Farma on the global map to supply Generic and specialty formulations not only for Indonesia but also to the rest of the world. We are also looking for new acquisitions in potential markets to make our products globally available at affordable prices.
Our propinquity to invest in profitable and strategic ventures would encourage potential and strategic companies to partner with us for mutual benefit not only for generic formulations but also for New Drug Delivery Systems (NDDs), New Chemical Entities (NCEs) and Biosimilar products.
We are committed to strive for continued achievement to provide quality products for quality health through our sincere endeavor to become global generic pharmaceutical manufacturer from Indonesia in the days to come.

idemain.ku adalah sebuah usaha yang menyediakan berbagai mainan edukasi untuk anak usia dini (0-5 tahun). Jenis permainannya sangat beragam, baik handmade maupun non-handmade.
Kami memegang prinsip "Play is the work of children"- Maria Montessori, jadi kami ingin menyediakan mainan edukasi dengan berbagai jenis dan level atau tingkat kesulitan untuk memenuhi setiap minat dan kebutuhan anak-anak.

jobDescription.html:
idemain.ku merupakan industri kreatif rumahan yang bergerak di bidang mainan edukasi anak. Untuk saat ini, kami membutuhkan karyawan lepas sebagai asisten produksi, dengan kriteria:
  1. Menyukai keterampilan/kerajinan tangan yang berkaitan langsung dengan kertas,
  2. Menyukai aktivitas menggunting, memotong, melakukan sortir, menimbang. Mampu mengoperasikan mesin laminating dan alat potong kertas menjadi nilai plus.
  3. Domisili di sekitar Kota Cimahi,
  4. Mampu mengedepankan ketelitian, kerapian, dan kebersihan dalam pekerjaan kerajinan tangan, dan
  5. Bisa menyimpan dan menata hasil pekerjaan di tempat yang sudah disediakan.

companyOverview.html: Bank OCBC NISP was established in Bandung in 1941 under the name Nederlandsch Indische Spaar en Bank Deposit. As per September 30th, 2020, Bank OCBC NISP serves its customers through 236 office networks in 57 cities in Indonesia, equipped with 599 Bank OCBC NISP ATM units that can be accessed in more than 196,000 ATM networks in Indonesia, as well as connected with more than 740 OCBC ATM networks Groups in Singapore and Malaysia. Bank OCBC NISP also serves its customers through digital channels, including mobile banking and internet banking, both for individual and corporate. Bank OCBC NISP is one of many banks with the highest credit ratings in Indonesia, with idAAA (stable) rating from PT Pemeringkat Efek Indonesia (PEFINDO) and AAA(idn)/stable from PT Fitch Ratings Indonesia.

companyOverview.html: Mitrais is a world-class software company with offices in Indonesia, Singapore, and Vietnam.​ Software development and support is our core skill with offices in Jakarta, Bandung, Yogyakarta, and Bali.​ We also sell and support leading mining & hospital systems.​ In business since 1991 we have developed or implemented software for over 500 clients including some of Indonesia’s leading companies.​ Our proprietary competency system guarantees the quality of our staff.

jobDescription.html:
This advert is intended for Expert Software Engineers who are looking for full-time associate/ freelance/ contractor engagement. 
We're urgently looking for an Experienced Software Engineer to be part of our team for an immediate start.  
What will you be doing?
  • Coding high-quality software using distributed computing, messaging, microservices, performance tuning and memory and resource management techniques
  • Developing data-driven solutions for a range of clients - frontend as well as backend
  • Collaborating within cross-functional and international agile teams.
  • Testing, debugging, re-testing, and coordinating with QA, validating software as ready for shipping
  • Reviewing code and acting as a subject matter expert for juniors in the team 
What about you?
  • You have 2+ years of experience in Java development.
  • You have an excellent knowledge of : 
·       Spring or equivalent JEE frameworks, 
·       SQL and hands-on experience with ORM frameworks such as Hibernate 
·       Java Template engine technologies such as Thymeleaf, Freemarker, Pebble 
·       Java Build tools such as Maven, Gradle 
·       Java unit-test frameworks such as Junit, TestNG 
·       Data Structures
  • You have working knowledge and experience with: 
·       JQuery, Ajax, JSON, CSS, HTML 
·       Java 8 features such as: Time API, Lambda, Functional Programming Style, Stream API
  • You can speak reasonable English
  • You are well versed in best practices in OOP, design patterns, SOLID principles, and data driven design
  • You are comfortable using git or TFS in a CI/CD environment
  • You enjoy working on lean and agile development projects using Scrum & Kanban
  • You love clean and beautiful code, with an eye for simplicity and pragmatism.  
What else would we like to see?
  • You have an excellent knowledge of NoSQL databases
  • You have experience in Java reporting tools such as Jasper Report, Apache POI
  • You have working knowledge and experience with : 
·       Cloud Computing such as AWS, Azure, Google Cloud 
·       Message Driven applications 
Engagement and duration
  •  Full time engagement (Monday to Friday, 07:00-16:00 or as agreed by project)
  •  Entitled for Insurance, with 100% coverage and cashless payment
  •  6 -12 months duration
  •  Switching to permanent employment in the future is allowed
  •  Remote working
Learn about life at Mitrais from our current team by searching #mitraislife on Social Media
 
To Apply? 
Simply click the apply button, complete the form and upload your latest CV in English ! What are you waiting for ?

PENGUMUMAN :

DGIT is a specialist supplier of software and services to digital and communications service providers, using cutting-edge technology to create intuitive, flexible and highly customisable solutions for the modern digital marketplace.
DGIT is the creator of Telflow, the multi-award winning quote-to-cash platform that provides CPQ, order capture, provisioning and inventory management for digital and communications service providers. DGIT is also home to Inomial, the innovative revenue management and billing platform that handles subscription management and billing solutions for telecommunications carriers, digital media distributors, utilities companies and cloud service providers. Together, Telflow and Inomial can be used to seamlessly automate and effortlessly manage the complete end-to-end opportunity-to-operate journey for digital and communications services.
DGIT plays a key role in contributing to the B2B and REST API standards advanced by the TM Forum, and has been consistently recognised by TM Forum awards for its role in transforming the operations of digital and communications service providers, and for its outstanding open architecture and API design. DGIT is also a significant contributor to the Metro Ethernet Forum (MEF) in the area of inter-provider wholesale B2B APIs.
Originally founded in Melbourne in 2005, DGIT now has offices in Melbourne, Auckland and Denpasar – with around 100 employees across these three locations – and is represented by partners in the Asia-Pacific, the UK, North America, Africa and the Middle East. DGIT has almost 80 customers including Tier 1 and Tier 2 telecommunications providers, digital service providers and enterprise organisations, and is rapidly expanding its customer base around the world.

Qualifications:

companyOverview.html:
PENGUMUMAN :

PT Bali Hai Brewery Indonesia tidak pernah memungut biaya apapun dalam proses rekrutmen.
PT Bali Hai Brewery Indonesia tidak pernah bekerja sama dengan travel agent / biro perjalanan tertentu dalam proses rekrutmen.
Apabila Anda diminta untuk membayar sejumlah uang dalam bentuk pembayaran tiket pesawat dan hotel atau akomodasi lainnya agar diabaikan.
Jangan memberikan data pribadi atau data keuangan Anda kepada siapapun.
Jika membutuhkan klarifikasi lebih lanjut dapat langsung menghubungi PT Bali Hai Brewery Indonesia
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
• BALI HAI Brewing Co. adalah salah satu pabrik bir terkemuka di Indonesia yang memproduksi dan mendistribusikan beraneka jenis bir berkualitas di Indonesia dan mancanegara.
• BALI HAI Brewing Co. telah menetapkan standard kualitas terbaik dalam setiap proses pembuatan bir. Kami sangat antusias dalam menciptakan produk - produk bir yang inovatif dan berkualitas yang lain daripada yang lain sesuai dengan budaya  penikmat bir di Indonesia.
• Brand-brand kami saat ini unik dan inovatif, yang dimana setiap brandnya melambangkan aspirasi dari setiap konsumen di Indonesia dan mancanegara, pendistribusian produk tepat waktu yang menjamin “fresh beer” dan konsep yang inovatif dari setiap brand kepada setiap konsumen kami.
VISI
Untuk menjadi brewery terkemuka yang lain daripada yang lain di Indonesia. Dibanggakan di tanah air dan dikagumi dunia.
Progresif, giat dan berani berusaha sesuai dengan semangat budaya Indonesia.
Bertindak sebagai pemimpin yang berani dan melakukan terobosan-terobosan baru.
Menjadi brewery yang terkemuka dan dikagumi.
Berdedikasi tinggi dalam menciptakan dan memasarkan bir berkualitas serta dapat menginspirasi semua pihak termasuk karywan, mitra kerja, distributor dan tentunya konsumen kami.
MISI
Untuk mempersembahkan cerita, cita, dan pengalaman yang inspiratif melalui brand dan segenap insan BALI HAI.
Menciptakan brand-brand yang inovatif dan berkualitas yang dapat memikat loyalitas para konsumen.
Dengan kualitas bir terbaik dan pelayanan yang sempurna mampu menginspirasi bagi seluruh karyawan, mitra kerja dan tentunya para konsumen.

companyOverview.html:
Panca Budi adalah perusahaan swasta yang bergerak dibidang kantongan plastik. Dengan berbekal pengalaman lebih dari 30 tahun, Panca Budi telah dikenal baik oleh pelanggan, khususnya distributor, agen, grosir, toko dan pemakai akhir. Panca Budi dikenal karena kualitas produk yang tinggi, spesifikasi produk yang dapat ditentukan oleh para pelanggan sendiri, harga yang kompetitif dan pelayanan pengiriman yang cepat.
Sejarah Panca Budi dimulai dari sebuah kegiatan usaha distribusi skala kecil dalam jangkauan lokal yang dirintis oleh Djonny Taslim sejak tahun 1979 di Jakarta. Dengan konsistensi usaha dari waktu ke waktu, saat ini Panca Budi telah berkembang menjadi salah satu pemimpin pasar produk kantongan plastik dengan selalu memprioritaskan kepuasan pelanggan sebagai dorongan bisnis.
Untuk memberikan pelayanan yang maksimal, kini Panca Budi telah memiliki tenaga Pemasaran, Penjualan dan Pengiriman yang mampu melakukan distribusi ke seluruh wilayah pemasaran untuk merealisasikan tujuan bisnis sebagai perusahaan distribusi pilihan di seluruh nusantara, yang pada gilirannya mengglobal hingga ke manca negara.

companyOverview.html:
PT Finansia Multi Finance (“FMF” or “the Company”) was founded in 1994. FMF received its multifinance licence in 1994 and is fully licenced to conduct a full range of multifinance activities including consumer finance, leasing, factoring and credit cards.
Today, FMF and its kreditplus brand are established as leading players within the multifinance sector with a focus on the used motorcycle financing, used car financing and white goods financing segments. As at 30 June 2014, FMF finances 772,234 customers through a proprietary distribution network of 313 branches / POS outlets and supported by a workforce of 13,682 employees.
On its establishment, FMF adopted a dual focus on both the retail and commercial segment largely in response to the opportunities available in the market. Following the Asian Financial Crisis (“AFC”), FMF, like many other financial institutions in Indonesia, adjusted its strategic business model and risk management framework to reflect lessons learnt over the period.
Over its 20 years of operation, FMF has weathered the course of a number of credit cycles and financial crises through a willingness and flexibility to adapt its business model and practices in response to shifting regulatory and operating environments. This adaptability has provided FMF with valuable operating experience within a number of different business segments and product groups across both the retail and commercial markets.

companyOverview.html:
Bina Bangsa School is a young, growing and vibrant school. Established in 2001, Bina Bangsa School has quickly distinguished itself for its academic excellence. In BBS, students undergo a rigorous programme modelled after the Singapore curriculum. BBS provides quality education to students ranging from Pre-School to Junior College levels. Our students sit for the International General Certificate of Secondary Education (IGCSE) and the International 'A' Levels examination offered by Cambridge University. BBS aims to nurture leaders who strive to be the best that they can be through lifelong learning, and also grounded in the Word of God. The BBS family consists of 5 campuses located in Jakarta, Bandung, Semarang and Malang and has a total enrolment of more than 3000 students. Our teaching fraternity is staffed by 250 qualified and experienced teachers representing over 12 countries, bringing with them diverse cultures and experiences to enrich students' learning.
Besides, pursuing academic excellence, BBS also has a framework to develop our students holistically through the following programmes:
1. Music (Chinese or Western Instruments)
2. Performing Arts and Drama
3. Sports and Fitness
4. Community Service
5. Faith Builder
Within a short span of 10 years, BBS students have accomplished countless achievements, such as:
1. Cambridge Brilliance Awards (Best in Indonesia)
2. Cambridge CIE (Top of the World Awards)
3. University of New South Wales
4. ICAS (Numerous Gold Awards and High Distinctions)
5. Ranked 1 for ICAS performance by University of New South Wales, Sydney, Australia
In addition, many of our students have received full scholarships from prestigious schools in Singapore such as Hwa Chong International and Nanyang Girls School. Bina Bangsa's alumni have also gone on to further their studies in world renowned universities such as : Nanyang Technological University, Singapore Management University, Hong Kong University, University of Melbourne, University of New South Wales, University of California, University of Alberta and University of Toronto. Despite these achievements, Bina Bangsa School continues to strive for excellence and improvements because we believe every BBS student deserves our best. We invite you to make Bina Bangsa your school where you can learn and grow.
