companyOverview.html:
PT. Mitsui Leasing Capital Indonesia (Mitsui Leasing) was officially established as a company whose the majority share owned by JA Mitsui Leasing, Ltd. Japan, on October 26, 1992. The establishment virtue of Notary Deed No.173 year of 1992, approval of Ministry of Justice dated December 7, 1992 No.02-9937.HT.01.04 -TH.92 and business license from the Minister of Finance No.56/KMK.017/1993 dated January 12, 1993.
Currently, the company’s business focused on the automobile financing activities through the Investment financing, Working Capital Financing, Multi Purpose Financing, and/or Other Business activity of financing based on approval of the Financial Services Authority (OJK), and Operating lease and/or fee based activity with the provision that it does not violate the rules and regulations in the financial services sector.
From year on year, Mitsui Leasing performance has increased both in total revenue and net income. Mitsui Leasing asset also increased over time. Quite convincing business development of Mitsui Leasing can be seen on the annual report profile.
In line with the rapid development and progress of the company, as well as the widening of territory area for servicing the Customers, Mitsui Leasing has opened several branches in Jakarta : Warung Buncit, Mangga Dua, Pondok Indah, Central Park, Kelapa Gading and branches in various cities out side Jakarta such as : Serpong, Bekasi, Medan, Semarang, Surabaya, Bandung, Denpasar, Yogyakarta, Balikpapan and Palembang.
Pursuant to the Company’s vision to be a professional and reliable automotive finance company, in doing its business development Mitsui Leasing has a mission and a commitment to provide services and automotive financial solutions timely, accurate and creative to the customers and business partners, by developing the best services system with the technology development "on - line system" and "one day service".
Mitsui Leasing has its customers from various level and classes, both companies and individuals. In order to provide the best services and to fulfil the customers need, the Customer Care of Mitsui Leasing always continually handle the customers problems with  a professional, precise, fast and satisfying approach.

companyOverview.html:
Profil Universitas Informatika dan Bisnis Indonesia (UNIBI)
  • Sejarah UNIBI
Universitas Informatika dan Bisnis Indonesia (UNIBI) merupakan perguruan tinggi berbasis informatika dan bisnis yang berlokasi di Jalan Soekarno-Hatta No.643, Sukapura, Kec. Kiaracondong, Kota Bandung, Jawa Barat 40285. Didirikan sebagai penggabungan dari Politeknik Ganesha Bandung dengan Sekolah Tinggi Ilmu Ekonomi (STIE) Pelita Nusantara, berdasarkan Surat Keputusan Menteri Pendidikan Nasional Republik Indonesia Nomor 70/D/O/2007 tanggal 24 Mei 2007. UNIBI telah terakreditasi BAN-PT dengan Peringkat "B" (Baik Sekali) berdasarkan SK No. 255/SK/BAN-PT/Akred/PT/IV/2019.
UNIBI yang dipimpin oleh Dr. Ir. Bob Foster, M.M., didirikan dengan tujuan menghasilkan pengusaha-pengusaha muda (young entrepreneurs) serta memenuhi tuntutan akan tenaga ahli madya dan sarjana profesional yang berjiwa entrepreneur di bidang teknologi, komunikasi, seni, psikologi, dan bisnis. Sebagai universitas pertama yang berwawasan entrepreneur di Indonesia, UNIBI telah merancang kurikulum dan metode perkuliahan secara khusus berupa kuliah entrepreneurship, wawasan IT mutakhir, peluang bisnis, dan sejak dini menanamkan semangat entrepreneurship.
UNIBI memfasilitasi pemberian sertifikasi IT yang bertaraf internasional untuk menjamin lulusannya menjadi profesional yang berjiwa entrepreneur atau menjadi pengusaha-pengusaha muda (young entrepreneurs) yang sukses.

companyOverview.html:
PENGUMUMAN :

PT Bali Hai Brewery Indonesia tidak pernah memungut biaya apapun dalam proses rekrutmen.
PT Bali Hai Brewery Indonesia tidak pernah bekerja sama dengan travel agent / biro perjalanan tertentu dalam proses rekrutmen.
Apabila Anda diminta untuk membayar sejumlah uang dalam bentuk pembayaran tiket pesawat dan hotel atau akomodasi lainnya agar diabaikan.
Jangan memberikan data pribadi atau data keuangan Anda kepada siapapun.
Jika membutuhkan klarifikasi lebih lanjut dapat langsung menghubungi PT Bali Hai Brewery Indonesia
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
• BALI HAI Brewing Co. adalah salah satu pabrik bir terkemuka di Indonesia yang memproduksi dan mendistribusikan beraneka jenis bir berkualitas di Indonesia dan mancanegara.
• BALI HAI Brewing Co. telah menetapkan standard kualitas terbaik dalam setiap proses pembuatan bir. Kami sangat antusias dalam menciptakan produk - produk bir yang inovatif dan berkualitas yang lain daripada yang lain sesuai dengan budaya  penikmat bir di Indonesia.
• Brand-brand kami saat ini unik dan inovatif, yang dimana setiap brandnya melambangkan aspirasi dari setiap konsumen di Indonesia dan mancanegara, pendistribusian produk tepat waktu yang menjamin “fresh beer” dan konsep yang inovatif dari setiap brand kepada setiap konsumen kami.
VISI
Untuk menjadi brewery terkemuka yang lain daripada yang lain di Indonesia. Dibanggakan di tanah air dan dikagumi dunia.
Progresif, giat dan berani berusaha sesuai dengan semangat budaya Indonesia.
Bertindak sebagai pemimpin yang berani dan melakukan terobosan-terobosan baru.
Menjadi brewery yang terkemuka dan dikagumi.
Berdedikasi tinggi dalam menciptakan dan memasarkan bir berkualitas serta dapat menginspirasi semua pihak termasuk karywan, mitra kerja, distributor dan tentunya konsumen kami.
MISI
Untuk mempersembahkan cerita, cita, dan pengalaman yang inspiratif melalui brand dan segenap insan BALI HAI.
Menciptakan brand-brand yang inovatif dan berkualitas yang dapat memikat loyalitas para konsumen.
Dengan kualitas bir terbaik dan pelayanan yang sempurna mampu menginspirasi bagi seluruh karyawan, mitra kerja dan tentunya para konsumen.

companyOverview.html:
Profil Universitas Informatika dan Bisnis Indonesia (UNIBI)
  • Sejarah UNIBI
Universitas Informatika dan Bisnis Indonesia (UNIBI) merupakan perguruan tinggi berbasis informatika dan bisnis yang berlokasi di Jalan Soekarno-Hatta No.643, Sukapura, Kec. Kiaracondong, Kota Bandung, Jawa Barat 40285. Didirikan sebagai penggabungan dari Politeknik Ganesha Bandung dengan Sekolah Tinggi Ilmu Ekonomi (STIE) Pelita Nusantara, berdasarkan Surat Keputusan Menteri Pendidikan Nasional Republik Indonesia Nomor 70/D/O/2007 tanggal 24 Mei 2007. UNIBI telah terakreditasi BAN-PT dengan Peringkat "B" (Baik Sekali) berdasarkan SK No. 255/SK/BAN-PT/Akred/PT/IV/2019.
UNIBI yang dipimpin oleh Dr. Ir. Bob Foster, M.M., didirikan dengan tujuan menghasilkan pengusaha-pengusaha muda (young entrepreneurs) serta memenuhi tuntutan akan tenaga ahli madya dan sarjana profesional yang berjiwa entrepreneur di bidang teknologi, komunikasi, seni, psikologi, dan bisnis. Sebagai universitas pertama yang berwawasan entrepreneur di Indonesia, UNIBI telah merancang kurikulum dan metode perkuliahan secara khusus berupa kuliah entrepreneurship, wawasan IT mutakhir, peluang bisnis, dan sejak dini menanamkan semangat entrepreneurship.
UNIBI memfasilitasi pemberian sertifikasi IT yang bertaraf internasional untuk menjamin lulusannya menjadi profesional yang berjiwa entrepreneur atau menjadi pengusaha-pengusaha muda (young entrepreneurs) yang sukses.

companyOverview.html:
PT KCIC is a joint venture company that was established on October, 16th 2015 and has been approved by the Ministry of Law and Human Rights of Republic Indonesia on October, 20th 2015. PT KCIC was established to build a high-speed railway that will extend for 142.3 kilometers long between Jakarta and Bandung in West Java. The company consists of a consortium of State-Owned enterprises (SOEs) named PT Pilar Sinergi BUMN Indonesia, led by a construction company, PT Wijaya Karya (Persero) Tbk. and a consortium of Chinese companies named Beijing Yawan HSR Co.Ltd.
The High-Speed Railway corridor is known as a pioneer in one of the developments of Indonesia's modernization vision. There are 4 stations planned to be located along the route namely Halim, Karawang, Walini, and Tegalluar, where the depot position for maintenance and store railway carriage will be in Tegalluar station. The Jakarta-Bandung High-Speed rail trace will pass through various areas including DKI Jakarta, Bekasi City, Bekasi District, Karawang District, Purwakarta District, West Bandung District, Cimahi City, Bandung City, and Bandung District.

PT Yontomo Sukses Abadi has expanded and diversification plans, which develop on welding reclamation services for hard surfacing, repairing and maintenance Our company focus in welding industry, i.e.welding consumables supply, welding machine and automation, etc.
OUR SERVICE
Our welding materials for workshop service are used in wide range of applications, from hard surfacing of steel and non ferrous rolling mill applications, quarry plant for coal, to cladding of crushing and breaking equipment, reclamation of forging dies and general engineering application.

Our welding technology is a specialist of weldclad and forgeweld business. Years of experience and expertise have developed highly specialized materials, machines and welding techniques for combating the hostile environment in which these components are needed to operate.

We are committed to provide welding service solutions to our customer, excellent delivery time that satisfies the needs and expectations of the customer.

companyOverview.html:
Established in 1994, the group is one of the largest importer and distributor for mobile phones in Indonesia. The group, through their flagship company, Parastar Echorindo, is one of three authorized major distributor for Nokia in Indonesia with distribution area of Greater Jakarta and Kalimantan, holding 35% of national market share of Nokia products.
Overall, the Group has an integrated business model which includes sub-distributorship, retail and logistics of mobile phones.
As a group company, Parastar growing to be the one of the leading telecommunication group company which significantly contributed for Indonesian Telecommunication Industry.
Parastar Echorindo is a telecommunication importer company in Indonesia with four main distributors : Parastar Distrindo, Parastar Sukses Jaya, Sentra Makmur Sakti, and Sentra Sukses Solusindo.
Parastar keep expanding ranging from telecommunication business concept importers, distributors, through own retails chain known as “Sentra Ponsel”. By carrying the motto “Always Original”, Sentra Ponsel has become a pioneer for the choice and confidence of customers.
With supported by professional logistic and integrated system, Parastar provide professional business concept to be the most valuable corporate in providing sustainable prosperity to the stakeholder through excellence and integrated business units.

ABOUT US
YOUR ONLINE BEAUTY DESTINATION
Sociolla is Indonesia's trusted and most complete online shopping destination offering authentic beauty products e.g. make up, skin care, hair care, fragrance and beauty tools in collaboration with brand owners and authorized distributors serving women across Indonesia.

ONLY THE AUTHENTIC AND BPOM CERTIFIED
Quality and authenticity of beauty product is akin to the importance of taking care of your own skin, a necessity to all women and Sociolla takes it very seriously. Usage of non-original or fraudulent beauty products could lead to permanent skin damage.
This has prompted Sociolla to collaborate directly with authorized national distributors and brand owners in Indonesia to ensure that every product you purchase from Sociolla are original and authentic, with the certification from Badan Pengawas Obat dan Makanan (‘BPOM’).
Quality assurance of product storage is performed directly by Sociolla's own operations management with compliance to international standards and storage guideline by the brand owners.

YOUR DAILY READ OF ALL THINGS BEAUTY
Inspired to be your trusted beauty advisor, Sociolla presents you the Beauty Journal, an online beauty media portal dedicated for women to explore and develop their own unique beauty style, while receiving the latest information on trend and brand developments.

WE ARE HIRING
We are at forefront of a rapidly expanding industry and growing really fast, and now looking for someone that hungry, enthusiastic, energetic and ambitious to be part of Sociolla team.

companyOverview.html:
Dexa Group has evolved from a small company established in 1969 to one of Indonesia’s largest ethical pharmaceutical companies at the beginning of the 21st century and has become a prominent, well-respected player in the domestic pharmaceutical market.
Providing better health care by applying expertise was the foundation on which its founders built this Company. Honesty, trust, dedication and commitment to providing patients with the highest quality of ethical pharmaceutical products and OTC are preserved as the guiding principles, based upon which the highly professional management team and the motivated, competent staff of Dexa have developed the Company in the spirit of mutual respect, teamwork and innovation over more than four decades.
Serving as a good corporate citizen is one of our responsibilities and being a strategic asset of Indonesia is one of our foremost desires. For along time Dexa has worked together with governing institutions and the Indonesian Pharmaceutical Association – championing compliance and improving the industry standards.

companyOverview.html:
PT Finansia Multi Finance (“FMF” or “the Company”) was founded in 1994. FMF received its multifinance licence in 1994 and is fully licenced to conduct a full range of multifinance activities including consumer finance, leasing, factoring and credit cards.
Today, FMF and its kreditplus brand are established as leading players within the multifinance sector with a focus on the used motorcycle financing, used car financing and white goods financing segments. As at 30 June 2014, FMF finances 772,234 customers through a proprietary distribution network of 313 branches / POS outlets and supported by a workforce of 13,682 employees.
On its establishment, FMF adopted a dual focus on both the retail and commercial segment largely in response to the opportunities available in the market. Following the Asian Financial Crisis (“AFC”), FMF, like many other financial institutions in Indonesia, adjusted its strategic business model and risk management framework to reflect lessons learnt over the period.
Over its 20 years of operation, FMF has weathered the course of a number of credit cycles and financial crises through a willingness and flexibility to adapt its business model and practices in response to shifting regulatory and operating environments. This adaptability has provided FMF with valuable operating experience within a number of different business segments and product groups across both the retail and commercial markets.

companyOverview.html:
Axiata Digital Service Indonesia (ADSI) is a startup company whereas also a subsidiary of Axiata Digital Services Sdn. Bhd, Malaysia. Indonesia, being a digital economy epicentrum and the key market in ASEAN Economy Community, definitely provides a huge digital innovation opportunity for Axiata Digital Service to utilize its assets and collaborate and co-create with existing industry, especially in the area of:

1. Digital Marketing
2. Digital Financial Services
3. Platform as market place API (B2B/Short tail/Long tail)
Boost is a new innovation of Axiata digital Services which is a platform to deliver financial services inclusion built as micro services. We believe that financial service is a hygiene factor in any economy required by subjects who are in involved in the ecosystem. Over Boost Platform, Merchants and Consumers could digitize their interaction in order to improve their experience, as well as value. As a micro service, Boost as Financial Service can easily be embedded in to relevant digital application use cases to facilitate economic transaction between merchant & consumers (B2C), Merchant & Suppliers (B2B) and/or Consumer and Consumer (C2C). Boost as a business improvement tools to merchants and life improvement tools to consumer provides the natural digital journey to both merchants and consumers with the following experience: More to Discover, Empowered to succeed, and Boost your life.
#ngeBOOSTbentar

BoostPreneur merupakan profesi konsultan untuk UMKM yang mampu membangun jiwa wirausaha sekaligus memberikan pendapatan berkala dengan memanfaatkan teknologi digital sebagai mitra dari Boost.
Boost adalah sebuah aplikasi yang menghubungkan UMKM dengan layanan keuangan dengan memberikan kemudahan kepada pelaku UMKM dalam mengembangkan bisnisnya secara digital.
Syarat menjadi BoostPreneur:
  • Memiliki jiwa dan semangat wirausaha
  • Memiliki komitmen untuk sukses
  • Memiliki ponsel Android 6 (Marshmellow)
  • Memiliki kendaraan roda dua
Penghasilan BoostPreneur terdiri dari 3 parameter:
1. Aktivitas dasar harian
Registrasi merchant baru
Memberikan layanan Top Up / pengisian Saldo Boost Penjual.
2. Aktivitas edukasi pengelolaan merchant
Bagi hasil dari nominal transaksi merchant, semakin banyak merchant yang bertransaksi, hasil yang didapat juga semakin banyak.
3. Aktivitas advokasi pengelolaan merchant
Bonus pertumbuhan dari meningkatnya angka transaksi merchant di area yang dikelola BoostPreneur
Semakin banyak merchant melakukan bertransaksi dan areanya bertumbuh maka bonus pengembangan semakin besar.
Cara Kerja BoostPreneur:
- Registrasi Merchant
Registrasi adalah mendaftarkan merchant ke dalam ekosistem Boost
- Edukasi & Advokasi
Memberikan pemahaman dan pengetahuan kepada merchant agar mampu mengembangkan usahanya
Membina dan mengelola merchant untuk memaksimalkan potensi usahanya
- Waktu kerja tidak mengikat
BoostPreneur sebagai mitra dapat mengatur dan menentukan sendiri waktu kerjanya
Syarat Pengalaman :
Memiliki jiwa dan semangat wirausaha dan Memiliki komitmen untuk sukses
Menguasai dan memahami penggunaan HP Android

Vision

Moving toward excellence as an admired ICT solution provider, preferred place to build career and contributor of good values to stakeholders</div>
About
Over the years (more than 20 years) Intikom has become a reliable IT resources for the clients in keeping them ahead in the industry and makes Intikom a partner to lead. It's reputation is gained through the long process and the commitment of it's management to be focused in IT business.
PT. Intikom Berlian Mustika was incorporated in April 1990. In April 1990 Intikom has signed Enterprise Standing Order (ESO) with USI-IBM , and become IBM Business Partner since 1993. Since then, Intikom also become a business partner for other world leading IT companies such as Cisco Systems Inc., Hewlett-Packard, Wincor Nixdorf and Microsoft.
Intikom works in partnerships with the world leading companies to provide a comprehensive range of IT services and products for a broad client base. Its main services and products are consultancy, software customization & implementation assistance, education & training, software and hardware, system integration, e-commerce, networking and maintenance.

PT MULTI PRIMA MANDIRI PRATAMA
Multi Prima Mandiri Pratama also known as MPMP is an Indonesian architectural and contractor company founded by Adi Wirawan. Established in 1996 as a construction service and construction consultant which is specialize in interior design, gas, mechanical and ventilation consultant, architect, electrical engineer and structural engineering. Have gained communal recognition for it integration of environmental and social principles at every stage of the design process.
Our objective is to build a successful buildings that capture the spirit of their surroundings, even as they assert their own identity. They’re visually appealing, healthy, comfortable, flexible, secure and efficient, a pleasure to be in. And they pay their way, adding real value for their owners and users.
 
The structure and characteristic of MPMP’s architecture is always guided by the local content and culture as well as awareness of local content and tradition along with ongoing movement and above all by the local climatic condition, which determine every energy-saving strategy. In order to revitalize our urban environment, designed with consistency and incorporate natural resources.
We are interested in creative solution to solving the issues that face all of us that involving to create diversity and delightful environments and enhance a sense of community. We also believe that good design came from a thoughtful process of study and research, which is combined with technical knowledge, social and environmental understanding and executed through creative skill and our experience.

companyOverview.html:
PT Finansia Multi Finance (“FMF” or “the Company”) was founded in 1994. FMF received its multifinance licence in 1994 and is fully licenced to conduct a full range of multifinance activities including consumer finance, leasing, factoring and credit cards.
Today, FMF and its kreditplus brand are established as leading players within the multifinance sector with a focus on the used motorcycle financing, used car financing and white goods financing segments. As at 30 June 2014, FMF finances 772,234 customers through a proprietary distribution network of 313 branches / POS outlets and supported by a workforce of 13,682 employees.
On its establishment, FMF adopted a dual focus on both the retail and commercial segment largely in response to the opportunities available in the market. Following the Asian Financial Crisis (“AFC”), FMF, like many other financial institutions in Indonesia, adjusted its strategic business model and risk management framework to reflect lessons learnt over the period.
Over its 20 years of operation, FMF has weathered the course of a number of credit cycles and financial crises through a willingness and flexibility to adapt its business model and practices in response to shifting regulatory and operating environments. This adaptability has provided FMF with valuable operating experience within a number of different business segments and product groups across both the retail and commercial markets.

companyOverview.html:
History
It all began in 1985 when a home industry was set up in Bandung under the brand name 'Mulyana Plastik'. With a handful of workers, it started making polypropylene woven bags which was started to replace jute bags in Indonesia. After struggling through turmoil for more than a decade, we managed to survive, until the year 2000 the company was officially registered as SINAR MULIA PLASINDO LESTARI Co., Ltd. As time passes, the once traditionally managed company was transformed gradually towards a better and more professional company by introducing modern business management system to accommodates the needs of ever growing and demanding market. Our aspiration is to expand our marketing networks worldwide by focusing on making good quality products with competitive prices and gaining trust from satisfied customers. In achieving this objective, we believe that only best resources, can leads to best results, this is why we put our focuses on four aspects:

1. Putting only good quality materials into production process.
2. Manufacture with up to date equipment and harness new technologies.
3. Operate and maintain the process by skilled and dedicated manpower
4. Produce and deliver with standardized procedures Equipped with committed management, manufacturing excellence and the best resources available, we are confident that we can fulfill our aspiration and deliver satisfactory goods and services.

companyOverview.html:
Established at Surabaya, 2001, CV. INDO JAYA PUTRA, which known as IJP, was a trading company for food chemical. At the first time,IJP was trading food color from local manufacture, and for then, as the growth, Mr. Sugijanto as the owner of CV. Indo Jaya Putra who has been committing to provide and serve food industries with Premium Quality food colour for healthy public has an idea to build his own color blending which named UNICOL. With well certificate (MD) from BPOM and Halal certificate from MUI, IJP as a customer oriented company which has objective to achieving maximum customer satisfaction and a specialist in color blending, will try our best to fulfill whatever your specification and quantity desire. As well as a specialist in color blending, we also trade other chemical like Sodium Bicarbonate, Capsicum, Acetic Acid,etc. from local and abroad such as China, India, Taiwan, Norway and other country.
And now, by embracing small to large business companies, we trade more food chemicals, and establish representative offices at Semarang to serve Central Java and at Jakarta to serve the western part of Indonesia. We furnish our representative offices with well-maintained premises, effective warehouse design for chemical, own delivery fleet and online database system to ensure our supply in timely manner. Even though Java is our major market, if your location is out of Java, don't be mind to contact us. Due to our vision, to be a leader of regional trading company, wherever your location is, we will try our best to get connected with you.
On the top of everything else, our friendly, knowledgeable, technically skilled, experienced and capable crews will take care of your requirements in good order. We believe that being a trust-worthy company is to build a great and close relationship as trust is earned from a long relationship. For us, three things build a great and close relationship, i.e. communication, respect and trust. There is no relationship without communication, there is no affection without respect and there is no continuous relationship without trust. With a good system, decentralized operation and prudent business philosophy, the company can expand its operation not just only trading food chemical but also other chemicals.
We believe that we are blessed with the opportunity to be your partner.
.

companyOverview.html:
Logo De Corps is one of  leading fashion retail company group in Indonesia,  Logo De Corps has several brands of fashion products which is growing rapidly in the business of fashion and controlled most of casual fashion products market share in Indonesia. Our brand consist of LOGO, BOMBBOOGIE, NINETY DEGREES, BODY TALK, 10PM and FOD.
The Successful of Logo De Corps was developed by the persistence and focus to provide quality and best design. Supported by powerful teams and retail partners, Logo De Corps expect to be able to deliver excellence in every brand management.
History
Starting from the aspiration to develop the fashion business in 1980, Logo De Corps strive to make the formulation of business and started with launch the casual fashion products under the brand of LOGO for female adolescent and woman. As time goes by, LOGO became one of the fashion trend center in Indonesia. Logo De Corps seeing the considerable oppoturnities for developing the retail business in Indonesia and tried to launch others fashion products to reach different target markets. Continues with launching several barands such as BOMBBOOGIE which is casual fashion products for young men and men. In the next year, Logo De Corps launched NINETY DEGREES which is the next casual fashion products for female adolescent. Logo De Corps is also launched fashion products for woman under BODY TALK brand. Further, the development in retailing business still continued by giving new colors for consumers and also preparing all new products and brands. With the increasing number of brands and the development of retailing business, Logo De Corps very optimistic about the development of this fashion business. At this time, Logo De Corps owned 4 brands of fashion and will grow over the time. LOGO, BOMBBOOGIE, NINETY DEGREES, and BODYTALK will continue to evolve along with the development of fashion, and fashion’s trends in Indonesia and also all over the world.

companyOverview.html:
Didirikan pada tahun 2018 untuk menyikapi perkembangan Era Digital.
Semakin tumbuh dan berkembang dimasa PANDEMI. Sementara situasi ekonomi menurun, S-Gala.com terus berinovasi untuk menyikapi perubahan perilaku konsumen yang semakin familiar dengan kegiatan "BELANJA ONLINE".
S-Gala.com berkembang dan tumbuh dengan VISI :
"MENJADI TERBAIK,TERKEMUKA, PENDIDIK DAN PENOLONG"
Kami membangun bisnis ini dengan semangat partnership dan menjadikan semangat millennial sebagai budaya kerja di keseharian kami.
Tempat kerja yang nyaman, homies, tanpa drama, dan kompetitif menjadi salah satu kunci pertumbuhan kami. Setiap individu diberikan kesempatan untuk berkembang-berkarir dengan cepat, sesuai dengan kompetensi dan pencapaian harian, terhitung dari hari pertama bekerja.
Kami menjadikan seluruh karyawan kami sebagai partner dan kunci sukses perkembangan bisnis ini. Keterbukaan aturan-informasi, Akses Mendetail Perhitungn Insentif, Penggajian Tepat Waktu membangun rasa percaya antara kami dengan seluruh partner yang turut serta membangun bisnis ini.
Kami menjadikan PENDIDIK dan PENOLONG sebagai bagian dari VISI kami. Dengan memberikan pendidikan kepada para Reseller dan niatan tulus untuk mengembangkan kehidupan dari keluarga Reseller kami, membuat kami yakin bahwa bisnis ini akan membantu banyak sekali keluarga di Indonesia.

Mencapai visi tersebut dengan cara mengirimkan barang sesuai pesanan dan tepat waktu dan memastikan proses bisnis internal berjalan sesuai SOP. Senin-Sabtu

Shift kerja akan bergantian dengan staff lainnya setiap minggunya

Untuk anda yang muda dan bersemangat, yang ingin serius berkarir di lingkungan yang menyenangkan. Mari bergabung bersama kami menjadi bagian dari perusahaan RASA MILLENNIAL yang sedang tumbuh dan berkembang ini. Selamat datang di S-Gala.com

companyOverview.html:
PT Importa Jaya Abadi is a company engaged in import, distribute and trade of furniture. Established on July 20, 2011. Ratified by a Akte Pendirian and has licenses for SIUP, TDP, HO and several other legality. Until now, it has several offices and main distribution warehouses in Jakarta, Surabaya, Yogyakarta and Bandung.
As furniture importer and main distributor, IMPORTA has supplied high quality products to more than 1000 DEALERS or furniture stores throughout Indonesia. IMPORTA provides a variety of the latest styles and designs to meet the needs of the desired dream furniture. One of the important elements in market competition is innovation and product design creation. Therefore IMPORTA as one of the biggest furniture importers in Indonesia always puts our products forward with today's global trends. 
Visit us at www.importafurniture.com
In the recruitment process for PT Importa Jaya Abadi candidates, we never collect any fees, including administration or other document production costs. In particular, we also never ask prospective workers to purchase airplane tickets at certain travel agents. Information and the official recruitment process for PT Importa Jaya Abadi can be seen through the only third party website that we use, Jobstreet.
Official communication regarding the stages and the results of the selection is only delivered through an email address that has the domain importafurniture.com (for example: hrd@importafurniture.com). If job seekers have questions about the recruitment process, they can contact us via the email address listed on the official Unilever Indonesia recruitment website, hrd@importafurniture.com.
We urge job seekers to be careful not to provide detailed information about personal data, especially those related to financial information, to unknown parties. PT Importa Jaya Abadi and or its subsidiaries are not responsible for any form of recruitment process that is carried out beyond our knowledge.

companyOverview.html:
PT. Sumber Energi Pangan is a fast growing company and one of the subsidiary company of Triputra Group. We aim to become the preeminent producer of Indonesian food commodities and product. Our mission is to feed the world through excellence people and process. We manage some major food commodity business in Indonesia, such as rice business, corn business, coffee business and poultry business which located in Sumatera, Kalimantan, Jawa, Sulawesi, and Nusa Tenggara. 
PT Sumber Energi Pangan’s culture is characterized within the “Triputra DNA'​: Integrity & Ethics, Excellence, Compassion and Humility. Integrity & Ethics is denoted by a green square. The square shape represents the uncompromising firmness and the green colour gives meaning of life and grows - a hope that this value will continue to exist and grow in the life of Triputra Group. Excellence is denoted by golden stellar that represent extraordinary, high and proud achievements, the golden colour gives meaning triumphant and glorious. Compassion is represented by red heart, a symbol of sincere, earnest, and pure. Compassion is expected to be the cornerstone of act by Triputra Group in everyday life. Humility is represented by a black circle, which mean perfection, fullness and complete state. The black color represents a solid and strenght character. Insan Triputra is encouraged to constantly try to defeat the ego completely and perfectly.
Our objective is to deliver high quality foodstuff products to Indonesian citizen, provide competitive benefit and good working conditions for employees, build strong relationships with business partners; and give back to society at large.

companyOverview.html:
Didirikan pada tahun 2018 untuk menyikapi perkembangan Era Digital.
Semakin tumbuh dan berkembang dimasa PANDEMI. Sementara situasi ekonomi menurun, S-Gala.com terus berinovasi untuk menyikapi perubahan perilaku konsumen yang semakin familiar dengan kegiatan "BELANJA ONLINE".
S-Gala.com berkembang dan tumbuh dengan VISI :
"MENJADI TERBAIK,TERKEMUKA, PENDIDIK DAN PENOLONG"
Kami membangun bisnis ini dengan semangat partnership dan menjadikan semangat millennial sebagai budaya kerja di keseharian kami.
Tempat kerja yang nyaman, homies, tanpa drama, dan kompetitif menjadi salah satu kunci pertumbuhan kami. Setiap individu diberikan kesempatan untuk berkembang-berkarir dengan cepat, sesuai dengan kompetensi dan pencapaian harian, terhitung dari hari pertama bekerja.
Kami menjadikan seluruh karyawan kami sebagai partner dan kunci sukses perkembangan bisnis ini. Keterbukaan aturan-informasi, Akses Mendetail Perhitungn Insentif, Penggajian Tepat Waktu membangun rasa percaya antara kami dengan seluruh partner yang turut serta membangun bisnis ini.
Kami menjadikan PENDIDIK dan PENOLONG sebagai bagian dari VISI kami. Dengan memberikan pendidikan kepada para Reseller dan niatan tulus untuk mengembangkan kehidupan dari keluarga Reseller kami, membuat kami yakin bahwa bisnis ini akan membantu banyak sekali keluarga di Indonesia.

companyOverview.html:
PT. Ayo Media Network
Merupakan perusahaan multimedia yang berkantor pusat di Bandung. PT. Ayo Media Network memiliki beberapa news portal yaitu ayobandung.com, ayobekasi.net, ayobogor.com, ayocirebon.com, ayopurwakarta.com, ayotasik.com, ayosemarang.com, dan ayohotel.co.
AyoBandung.com
Mengakses berita melalui internet sudah menjadi gaya hidup yang tak terelakkan. Seiring dengan arus itulah, kami mencoba hadir untuk melengkapi pilihan dan kebutuhan pembaca, berharap membuat hidup Anda makin berwarna.
Mengapa AyoBandung.com?
Tak dipungkiri lokalitas dan kecintaan pada tempat berpijak atau berasal sejatinya ada di setiap diri manusia. Karena itu segenap peristiwa, kabar atau kehebohan akan selalu menarik bagi mereka yang terlibat di dalamnya.
Mencoba memenuhi kebutuhan dan kerinduan akan kabar dan cerita-cerita tempat bernaung inilah AyoBandung.com hadir dengan menawarkan konten situs berita yang bisa anda akses kapanpun dan di manapun.
Namun sejalan dengan semangat untuk memberikan yang terbaik bagi Bandung tercinta tentu saja kami tak cuma menawarkan berita.
Kami juga mencoba menawarkan persaudaraan dan kebersamaan, karena kami juga memberikan ruang yang sangat luas untuk informasi kegiatan masyarakat dan komunitas di Kota Bandung.
Ekspansi PT. Ayo Media Network
Saat ini, Ayo Media Network sedang bersiap untuk ekspansi ke level nasional dengan membuka dan mengembangkan produk baru di sejumlah daerah.
Jadi, mimpi besar kami semoga AyoBandung.com dan produk situs web lainnya, khususnya news portal tak hanya menjadi tempat mencari berita, tetapi juga "rumah besar bagi interaksi dan informasi komunitas secara nasional".

companyOverview.html:
Di kawasan utara Kota Bandung, ada sebuah kawasan hunian eksklusif dan prospektif yang strategis dan prestisius yang bisa mewujudkan citra Anda sebagai penghuni istimewa.
Adalah Dago, sebuah kawasan perbukitan berhawa sejuk dengan panorama alam nan menawan, serta aneka wisatanya. Di areal inilah PT. Bandung Pakar, pengembang Resor Dago Pakar mengembangkan hunian dan kavling siap bangun yang di kelilingi hamparan padang hijau yang di lengkapi fasilitas bertaraf Internasional.
Tak hanya itu, sebagai hunian tinggal sekaligus citra prestisius yang berada di kawasan elite, kawasan Resor Dago Pakar di rancang eksklusif untuk memberi kenyamanan penghuninya. Kelebihan yang tidak dimiliki oleh kawasan lain yang menawarkan beberapa kluster yang masing – masing memiliki keunggulan view yang berbeda, anda bisa memilih view Kota Bandung, Golf, Perbukitan. Kemudian, lingkungan perumahannya pun di tata rapi dengan dihiasi banyak taman serta seluruh jaringan listrik, telepon dan air dirancang tertutup dan berada dibawah tanah.
Dago memang terkenal sebagai kawasan prestisius di daerah Bandung karena dikenal sebagai kawasan elite. Ini terbukti dengan kenaikan harga tanah yang signifikan di wilayah ini, dimana hingga saat ini telah banyak rumah dan kavling yang terjual di kawasan Resor Dago Pakar telah ditempati oleh para penghuninya. Ditambah lagi hunianpun dikembangkan tanpa memakai pagar. Tentunya, ini ditujukan memberikan keleluasaan bagi para penghuni dalam menikmati alam Dago yang asri dan sejuk dengan suhu berkisar 16 – 22 derajat celcius.
Dengan, berbagai konsep, serta fasilitas yang ada tak salah jika anda menjadi bagian dari warga Resor Dago Pakar sebagai hunian yang mampu menunjang kehidupan menjadi lebih baik dan sehat serta citra gaya hidup penghuninya. Dan, jelas lokasi yang premium di kawasan Dago ini akan mengangkat nilai investasi di kawasan Resor Dago Pakar.

companyOverview.html:
PT Suparma Tbk was established in 1976 on a site of five (5) hectares land in Surabaya, Indonesia and employed approximately 100 people. The first paper was rolled out in 1978 using a 7,000 ton per year paper machine.
Responding to the growing paper demand in the country, in 1984 the company decided to roll out her first expansion program by adding there (3) units of Paper Machine and raised her total production capacity to 51,000 ton per year.
In 1992, the company further invested another two (2) units of Paper Machine with capacity of 99,000 tons p.a. to accommodate the strong increase of paper demand in the market in tandem with the Indonesian government industrialization program.
In line with globalization era, PT Suparma Tbk took a profound move in becoming a public company and listed in Jakarta Stock Exchange in 1994.
Today, located on a land of twenty one (21) hectares, PT Suparma Tbk operates 6 units of Paper Machine with a total combined capacity of 150,000 tons p.a. and supported by approximately 1,500 delegated employees.
Holding the motto of 'Continues Improvement', PT Suparma Tbk actively serves both domestic and international market with high quality products, services and meeting the customer expectations.

companyOverview.html:
PT Kewalram Indonesia had a modest beginning with the installation of a spinning mill in 1976 in Bandung, Indonesia. Since then, it has grown to become a large integrated textile facility covering spinning, embroidery and a dye house equipped with state-of-the-art machineries. Our customer oriented approach, coupled with exacting quality led to increased demand for our products and thereby enabling our growth over the years.
Our products are exported to over 60 countries across the globe in 4 Continents, reflecting company's strong commitment and emphasis on quality. The company also has a substancial presence in the domestic markets with a wide range of products offering.
Kewalram has achieved leadership position in its product range based on its unwavering commitment to highest quality standards and drive towards total consumer satisfaction.
We are the first integrated textile unit to receive the ISO (ISO 9001 & OEKOTEX) accreditation for quality management in Indonesia. Adding to our ever growing quality standards, We are now a memeber of Better Cotton Initiative (BCI) and bearer of Global Recycle Standard Certification.

companyOverview.html:
History
It all began in 1985 when a home industry was set up in Bandung under the brand name 'Mulyana Plastik'. With a handful of workers, it started making polypropylene woven bags which was started to replace jute bags in Indonesia. After struggling through turmoil for more than a decade, we managed to survive, until the year 2000 the company was officially registered as SINAR MULIA PLASINDO LESTARI Co., Ltd. As time passes, the once traditionally managed company was transformed gradually towards a better and more professional company by introducing modern business management system to accommodates the needs of ever growing and demanding market. Our aspiration is to expand our marketing networks worldwide by focusing on making good quality products with competitive prices and gaining trust from satisfied customers. In achieving this objective, we believe that only best resources, can leads to best results, this is why we put our focuses on four aspects:

1. Putting only good quality materials into production process.
2. Manufacture with up to date equipment and harness new technologies.
3. Operate and maintain the process by skilled and dedicated manpower
4. Produce and deliver with standardized procedures Equipped with committed management, manufacturing excellence and the best resources available, we are confident that we can fulfill our aspiration and deliver satisfactory goods and services.

  • Excellent verbal communication skills;

Here you can:

Leave your mark within an international working environment to scale up your professional journey and discover the best version of yourself. Step Up Your Game and be a PRO!

__________________________________________________________________________________
RGF is stands for RECRUIT GLOBAL  FAMILY, a global brand of Japan’s largest recruiting and information service company, Recruit Holdings co., Ltd.
We created this brand of our commitment to take on a new challenge to leverage on Recruit Group’s more over 50 years of industry experience and business network in Japan, to provide new opportunities to our clients across the region.
RGF HR AGENT takes charge of RGF’s business entity in general recruitment services. We provide total human resource services to clients at every stage of staff placement, such as evaluation, remuneration, and staff training. At the same time, we assist job-seekers in various ways to find the right job according to their individual preferences and experiences. Besides our services to assist full time staff recruitment, we also offer a range of support services for RPO (Recruitment Process Outsourcing) and contract base/temporary recruitment needs.
Our Company’s status as the Japan #1 market share holder in human resource, temporary staffing, and job advertisement field makes it possible for us to provide high quality total human resource management services not only in Japan but across the region.
We just open our RGF HR AGENT Brand in Indonesia on 1st May, 2013 and will continue and expand the business for the future.

PT Transpacific Finance was established in 1994 with the first name as PT Transpacific Mutual Finance Corporation. After changing the company names for several times, the company changed its name into PT Transpacific Finance in 2006 which has been approved by the Ministry of Finance through the Letter of Decision KEP-032/KM.5/2006.
PT Transpacific Finance is an Independent Finance Company which its primary activity is to provide financial solutions to the customers in the form of leasing financing, factoring financing, and consumer financing for new and used vehicle ownership.
With the support of the new management and a reliable resource, PT Transpacific Finance is always committed to provide financial solutions according to the customer needs by providing a quick process, flexible and professional services.
It is proven from the awards received by the company from Infobank Multifinance Awards for 2013, 2014, and 2017 successively. In addition, an award from Indonesian Financial Services Association (IFSA) as the Best Finance Company 2013 for Total Assets Under Rp 500 Billion Category.
Currently, PT Transpacific Finance focuses in developing business in Jabotabek and Bandung through the office outlets located in Jakarta, Tangerang, Depok, and Bandung. The management is committed to provide the best financial solutions for the customers, but keep prioritizing the principles of prudence and compliance with the regulations. PT Transpacific Finance has been registered and supervised by the Financial Services Authority (OJK).

companyOverview.html:
Di kawasan utara Kota Bandung, ada sebuah kawasan hunian eksklusif dan prospektif yang strategis dan prestisius yang bisa mewujudkan citra Anda sebagai penghuni istimewa.
Adalah Dago, sebuah kawasan perbukitan berhawa sejuk dengan panorama alam nan menawan, serta aneka wisatanya. Di areal inilah PT. Bandung Pakar, pengembang Resor Dago Pakar mengembangkan hunian dan kavling siap bangun yang di kelilingi hamparan padang hijau yang di lengkapi fasilitas bertaraf Internasional.
Tak hanya itu, sebagai hunian tinggal sekaligus citra prestisius yang berada di kawasan elite, kawasan Resor Dago Pakar di rancang eksklusif untuk memberi kenyamanan penghuninya. Kelebihan yang tidak dimiliki oleh kawasan lain yang menawarkan beberapa kluster yang masing – masing memiliki keunggulan view yang berbeda, anda bisa memilih view Kota Bandung, Golf, Perbukitan. Kemudian, lingkungan perumahannya pun di tata rapi dengan dihiasi banyak taman serta seluruh jaringan listrik, telepon dan air dirancang tertutup dan berada dibawah tanah.
Dago memang terkenal sebagai kawasan prestisius di daerah Bandung karena dikenal sebagai kawasan elite. Ini terbukti dengan kenaikan harga tanah yang signifikan di wilayah ini, dimana hingga saat ini telah banyak rumah dan kavling yang terjual di kawasan Resor Dago Pakar telah ditempati oleh para penghuninya. Ditambah lagi hunianpun dikembangkan tanpa memakai pagar. Tentunya, ini ditujukan memberikan keleluasaan bagi para penghuni dalam menikmati alam Dago yang asri dan sejuk dengan suhu berkisar 16 – 22 derajat celcius.
Dengan, berbagai konsep, serta fasilitas yang ada tak salah jika anda menjadi bagian dari warga Resor Dago Pakar sebagai hunian yang mampu menunjang kehidupan menjadi lebih baik dan sehat serta citra gaya hidup penghuninya. Dan, jelas lokasi yang premium di kawasan Dago ini akan mengangkat nilai investasi di kawasan Resor Dago Pakar.

companyOverview.html:
Didirikan dengan nama PT Sanghiang Perkasa, selama ini kami dikenal masyarakat sebagai Kalbe Health Foods Division dari PT Kalbe Farma Tbk., perusahaan farmasi terkemuka di Indonesia. Guna meningkatkan kinerja perusahaan dan lebih mendekatkan diri kepada konsumen, pada tahun 2007 kami melakukan perubahan brand identity perusahaan. Melalui proses seksama, nama Kalbe Farma Health Foods Division akhirnya diubah menjadi Kalbe Nutritionals. Corporate brand identity baru yang membawa nama Kalbe ini mempertegas kepercayaan kami sebagai perusahaan yang sudah memiliki reputasi tinggi. Wajah baru tersebut sekaligus mempertajam komitmen kami dalam bidang bisnis makanan kesehatan dan komitmen akan pentingnya kehidupan.
Nurturing Life Through Science (Memelihara Kehidupan Melalui Ilmu Pengetahuan) adalah pernyataan tegas semangat kami untuk tiada henti mendayagunakan kemajuan ilmu pengetahuan demi lebih baiknya kehidupan manusia. Semangat itu akan menjadi sumber motivasi dan inspirasi kami untuk mengembangkan brand-brand yang terpercaya, pengembangan produk yang intensif dan layanan pelanggan yang unggul.
Karena sadar akan pentingnya mempromosikan bahwa hidup ini adalah anugerah yang harus dijaga kemuliaan dan keindahannya, kami meluncurkan produk-produk makanan kesehatan di setiap titik kritis tahap pertumbuhan dan perkembangan manusia. Mulai sejak dalam kandungan, masa pertumbuhan dan perkembangan, masa puncak karir, sampai pada tahap usia emas mereka saat kinerja tubuh mulai berkurang. Kami ingin memastikan bahwa di sepanjang titik kritis kehidupan manusia itu, produk Kalbe Nutritionals dapat hadir menemani konsumen agar bisa menikmati hidup sebagai perjalanan yang penuh berkat.
Live the Best of Your Life.
More information and any question please visit :
Website : www.kalbenutritionals.com
FB Fan Page : Jobs at Kalbe Nutritionals
Twitter : @Lowker_KALBE
Instagram : kalbenutritionalscareer

companyOverview.html:
PT Finansia Multi Finance (“FMF” or “the Company”) was founded in 1994. FMF received its multifinance licence in 1994 and is fully licenced to conduct a full range of multifinance activities including consumer finance, leasing, factoring and credit cards.
Today, FMF and its kreditplus brand are established as leading players within the multifinance sector with a focus on the used motorcycle financing, used car financing and white goods financing segments. As at 30 June 2014, FMF finances 772,234 customers through a proprietary distribution network of 313 branches / POS outlets and supported by a workforce of 13,682 employees.
On its establishment, FMF adopted a dual focus on both the retail and commercial segment largely in response to the opportunities available in the market. Following the Asian Financial Crisis (“AFC”), FMF, like many other financial institutions in Indonesia, adjusted its strategic business model and risk management framework to reflect lessons learnt over the period.
Over its 20 years of operation, FMF has weathered the course of a number of credit cycles and financial crises through a willingness and flexibility to adapt its business model and practices in response to shifting regulatory and operating environments. This adaptability has provided FMF with valuable operating experience within a number of different business segments and product groups across both the retail and commercial markets.

companyOverview.html:
Founded in 2005, the Bandung based jeans label takes inspiration in its name from their 16 process to make the perfect jeans from the family traditional recipes.
Originally starting as a denim brand, Sixteen Denim Scale married modern silhouettes and finishing techniques to authenticity and high-fidelity construction. Inspired by the heritage, skills & craftmanship of old work wear but with modern outlook, strong personality & a tailored twist.
Fusing clean lines, relaxed tailoring and quality fabrications to realise considered and coherent collections, Sixteen Denim Scale’s expertise in denim compliments the brand’s smart/casual juxtaposition, where understated design is paramount. In keeping with the continual evolution of the label all branding has been stripped back to allow for an uncompromising product always with the modern, quality-conscious man in mind.

The Most Established Property Agent in Indonesia

Century 21 Indonesia adalah salah satu flagship dari Ciputra Group (www.ciputra.com),  merupakan perusahaan pengembang yang didirikan oleh Begawan properti di Indonesia, Ir. Ciputra. Ciputra Group merupakan pioneer dalam dunia pengembangan properti di Indonesia serta sukses dalam merencanakan dan mengembangkan beberapa kota satelit di Indonesia dan mancanegara.

Dengan berbagai megaproyek yang dimiliki oleh Ciputra Group dan tersebar di seluruh Indonesia, Century 21 Indonesia menjadi yang terdepan dibandingkan property agent lainnya dalam membantu sales activity.

companyOverview.html: PT Tepat Industri is a full-service sheet metal fabrication company. We offer customers a combination of design, engineering, and manufacturing services using advanced technology. Our engineers, CAD designers, and manufacturing professionals collaborate to create an environment for rapid response manufacturing across a broad range of product and industry. We produce many kinds of interactive kiosk both of standard and customs kiosk models, telecommunication product support, perforated product and interior/ exterior product from conceptual design to full production. Capabilities feature fully-automated CNC laser cutting, CNC punching, CNC panel bending along with conventional fabricating process. We process various grades, thicknesses and finishes of all metals including mild steel, aluminum and stainless steel. Small and large production runs available. With years of fabrication and machining experience combined with the aid of today's technology, our quality and reliability have never been stronger. PT Tepat Industri has made it a priority in the past several years to acquire the latest fabricating technology.

Following the Asian Financial Crisis (“AFC”), FMF, like many other financial institutions in Indonesia, adjusted its strategic business model and risk management framework to reflect lessons learnt over the period.
Over its 20 years of operation, FMF has weathered the course of a number of credit cycles and financial crises through a willingness and flexibility to adapt its business model and practices in response to shifting regulatory and operating environments. This adaptability has provided FMF with valuable operating experience within a number of different business segments and product groups across both the retail and commercial markets.

companyOverview.html:
PT BRI Multifinance Indonesia
Merupakan anak perusahaan dari Bank Rakyat Indonesia, yang didirikan sejak tahun 1983. Sebagai salah satu perintis industri pembiayaan di Indonesia, PT BRI Multifinance Indonesia memfokuskan kegiatan bisnisnya dalam pembiayaan investasi, modal kerja dan multiguna untuk beragam jenis industri dan aset. Secara geografis, perusahaan menyediakan jasa keuangan ke seluruh Indonesia tanpa ada batasan pada merk produk, tipe, area atau industri tertentu.
Didukung oleh para staf yang kompeten dan profesional, PT BRI Multifinance Indonesia berkomitmen untuk terus meningkatkan pelayanannya kepada nasabah dan menjadi perusahaan pembiayaan terkemuka dengan standar pelayanan internasional. Dengan dukungan jaringan BRI sebagai pemegang saham dan salah satu bank terbesar di Indonesia, pertumbuhan usaha PT BRI Multifinance Indonesia di masa mendatang diharapkan dapat semakin signifikan dengan tingkat kesehatan yang baik.

companyOverview.html:
PT KCIC is a joint venture company that was established on October, 16th 2015 and has been approved by the Ministry of Law and Human Rights of Republic Indonesia on October, 20th 2015. PT KCIC was established to build a high-speed railway that will extend for 142.3 kilometers long between Jakarta and Bandung in West Java. The company consists of a consortium of State-Owned enterprises (SOEs) named PT Pilar Sinergi BUMN Indonesia, led by a construction company, PT Wijaya Karya (Persero) Tbk. and a consortium of Chinese companies named Beijing Yawan HSR Co.Ltd.
The High-Speed Railway corridor is known as a pioneer in one of the developments of Indonesia's modernization vision. There are 4 stations planned to be located along the route namely Halim, Karawang, Walini, and Tegalluar, where the depot position for maintenance and store railway carriage will be in Tegalluar station. The Jakarta-Bandung High-Speed rail trace will pass through various areas including DKI Jakarta, Bekasi City, Bekasi District, Karawang District, Purwakarta District, West Bandung District, Cimahi City, Bandung City, and Bandung District.

companyOverview.html:
Kami menghimbau agar Anda berhati-hati saat melamar  pekerjaan dengan selalu memastikan iklan lowongan tersebut sesuai dengan profil perusahaannya.

Waspadalah jika Anda menemukan hal-hal di bawah ini :
  • PT Maha Kreasi Indonesia tidak pernah memungut biaya apapun dalam proses rekrutmen.
  • PT Maha Kreasi Indonesia tidak pernah bekerja sama dengan travel agent / biro perjalanan tertentu dalam proses  rekrutmen.
  • Apabila Anda diminta untuk membayar sejumlah uang dalam bentuk pembayaran tiket pesawat dan hotel atau  akomodasi lainnya agar diabaikan.
  • Apabila ada Panggilan wawancara di lokasi yang tidak sesuai dengan iklan yang tertera pada iklan lowongan.

We need you, Creative people !

companySnapshot.nearbyLocations: Resor Dago Pakar Jl. Permai II no. 52 Kav 62

companyOverview.html:
Di kawasan utara Kota Bandung, ada sebuah kawasan hunian eksklusif dan prospektif yang strategis dan prestisius yang bisa mewujudkan citra Anda sebagai penghuni istimewa.
Adalah Dago, sebuah kawasan perbukitan berhawa sejuk dengan panorama alam nan menawan, serta aneka wisatanya. Di areal inilah PT. Bandung Pakar, pengembang Resor Dago Pakar mengembangkan hunian dan kavling siap bangun yang di kelilingi hamparan padang hijau yang di lengkapi fasilitas bertaraf Internasional.
Tak hanya itu, sebagai hunian tinggal sekaligus citra prestisius yang berada di kawasan elite, kawasan Resor Dago Pakar di rancang eksklusif untuk memberi kenyamanan penghuninya. Kelebihan yang tidak dimiliki oleh kawasan lain yang menawarkan beberapa kluster yang masing – masing memiliki keunggulan view yang berbeda, anda bisa memilih view Kota Bandung, Golf, Perbukitan. Kemudian, lingkungan perumahannya pun di tata rapi dengan dihiasi banyak taman serta seluruh jaringan listrik, telepon dan air dirancang tertutup dan berada dibawah tanah.
Dago memang terkenal sebagai kawasan prestisius di daerah Bandung karena dikenal sebagai kawasan elite. Ini terbukti dengan kenaikan harga tanah yang signifikan di wilayah ini, dimana hingga saat ini telah banyak rumah dan kavling yang terjual di kawasan Resor Dago Pakar telah ditempati oleh para penghuninya. Ditambah lagi hunianpun dikembangkan tanpa memakai pagar. Tentunya, ini ditujukan memberikan keleluasaan bagi para penghuni dalam menikmati alam Dago yang asri dan sejuk dengan suhu berkisar 16 – 22 derajat celcius.
Dengan, berbagai konsep, serta fasilitas yang ada tak salah jika anda menjadi bagian dari warga Resor Dago Pakar sebagai hunian yang mampu menunjang kehidupan menjadi lebih baik dan sehat serta citra gaya hidup penghuninya. Dan, jelas lokasi yang premium di kawasan Dago ini akan mengangkat nilai investasi di kawasan Resor Dago Pakar.

companyOverview.html: Koperasi SEJAHTERA BERSAMA yang bergerak dalam bidang usaha simpan pinjam yang beroperasional berdasarkan Surat Izin Usaha Simpan Pinjam dari Kementerian Negara Koperasi dan Usaha Kecil dan Menengah Republik Indonesia Nomor: 44/SISP/Dep.1/II/2010. SB Simpan Pinjam melaksanakan kegiatan usaha menghimpun dana dalam bentuk tabungan koperasi dan simpanan berjangka koperasi, serta memberikan pinjaman dari dan untuk anggota/calon anggota, koperasi lain dan atau anggotanya sebagaimana yang diatur dalam Undang-Undangan Republik Indonesia tentang Perkoperasian dan Peraturan Pemerintah tentang Pelaksanaan Kegiatan Usaha Simpan Pinjam oleh Koperasi. Sebagai salah satu institusi keuangan non bank, SB Simpan Pinjam berperan sebagai lembaga intermediasi antara potensi yang dimiliki masyarakat Indonesia dengan tujuan yang akan dicapai yaitu menjadi masyarakat yang sejahtera.

With over 17,000 islands, 2,500 logistics providers, and a fast growing e-commerce market, Indonesia is one of the most challenging markets to build a great online shipping experience and we are primed to be a part of the solution. We are privileged to have some of the best global investors including Lightspeed, Y Combinator, and others. We are looking for passionate and outstanding individuals to join our team.
What will you do
  • Lead, plan, and oversee all Mitra Hub operations 
  • Coordinate all operational activities required for timely and efficient distribution of products to customers
  • Maintains Mitra Hub current volume of packages and relationship
  • Ensure maximum return on investment through effective operational performance and the successful completion of assigned projects
  • Evaluate and recommend training resources to support employee development
What are the requirements
  • Minimum of 5 years of relative operations supervision/management experience within a 3PL, vendor, and/or distribution environment is required
  • Highly motivated and target driven with a proven track record.
  • Experience leading a team and developing strategic plans
  • Relationship management skills and openness to feedback
  • Able to work comfortably in a fast paced environment.

companyOverview.html:
Yayasan Konservasi Alam Nusantara (YKAN) is a local affiliate of The Nature Conservancy. We seeks to improve welfare in Indonesia without compromising the sustainability of natural resources for present and future generations by promoting the value of nature, accelerating the transformation in conservation and utilization of natural resources in a sustainable manner through a series of protected area management, conservation of important species, and community empowerment.
Our Mission
Our mission is to conserve the lands and waters on which all life depends. Together, we promote the value of nature and catalyze transformational change in conservation and sustainable use of natural resources for the benefit of people and nature.
Our Vision
Our vision is to leave a sustainable world for future generations. A prosperous Indonesia where the needs of people and the sustainability of nature are in balance for today’s and future generations.

companyOverview.html:
PT KCIC is a joint venture company that was established on October, 16th 2015 and has been approved by the Ministry of Law and Human Rights of Republic Indonesia on October, 20th 2015. PT KCIC was established to build a high-speed railway that will extend for 142.3 kilometers long between Jakarta and Bandung in West Java. The company consists of a consortium of State-Owned enterprises (SOEs) named PT Pilar Sinergi BUMN Indonesia, led by a construction company, PT Wijaya Karya (Persero) Tbk. and a consortium of Chinese companies named Beijing Yawan HSR Co.Ltd.
The High-Speed Railway corridor is known as a pioneer in one of the developments of Indonesia's modernization vision. There are 4 stations planned to be located along the route namely Halim, Karawang, Walini, and Tegalluar, where the depot position for maintenance and store railway carriage will be in Tegalluar station. The Jakarta-Bandung High-Speed rail trace will pass through various areas including DKI Jakarta, Bekasi City, Bekasi District, Karawang District, Purwakarta District, West Bandung District, Cimahi City, Bandung City, and Bandung District.

companyOverview.html:
About Ninja Van
Ninja Van is a tech-enabled logistics company on a mission to provide hassle-free delivery services for businesses of all sizes across Southeast Asia. Launched in 2014, we started operations in Singapore and have become the region's largest and fastest growing last-mile logistics company, partnering with over 35,000 merchants and delivering more than 1,000 parcels every minute across six countries. 
At our core, we are a technology company that is disrupting a massive industry with cutting-edge software and operational concepts. Powered by algorithm-based optimisation, dynamic routing, end-to-end tracking and a data-driven approach, we provide best-of-class delivery services that delight both the shippers and end customers. But we are just getting started! We have much room for improvement and many ideas that will further shape the industry.

Ninja Van is on a mission to dominate e-commerce logistics in Southeast Asia. We are one of the fastest growing startups in the region - founded in mid-2014, we have already won over 6,000 merchants and deliver more than 2 million parcels a month across six countries. In Jan 2018, we raised one of the largest Series C rounds ever in Southeast Asia and are well-positioned for our next phase of rapid growth.
At our core we are a technology company that is disrupting a massive industry with cutting edge software and operational concepts. Powered by algorithm-based optimization, dynamic routing, end-to-end tracking and a data-driven approach, we provide best-of-class delivery services that delight both the shippers and end customers.
But we are just getting started! We have much room for improvement and many ideas that will further shape the industry.

Kami menghimbau agar Anda berhati-hati saat melamar  pekerjaan dengan selalu memastikan iklan lowongan tersebut sesuai dengan profil perusahaannya. 
Waspadalah jika Anda menemukan hal-hal di bawah ini :
• PT Combiphar tidak pernah memungut biaya apapun dalam proses rekrutmen.
• PT Combiphar tidak pernah bekerja sama dengan travel agent / biro perjalanan tertentu dalam proses  rekrutmen.
• Apabila Anda diminta untuk membayar sejumlah uang dalam bentuk pembayaran tiket pesawat dan hotel atau  akomodasi lainnya agar diabaikan.
• Apabila ada Panggilan wawancara di lokasi yang tidak sesuai dengan iklan yang tertera pada iklan lowongan.
• Jangan memberikan data pribadi atau data keuangan Anda kepada siapapun.
Combiphar was founded in 1971 as a home industry in Bandung, West Java producing antibiotics, analgesics and the legendary OBH Combi cough syrup. In 1983, a larger manufacturing facility was established in Padalarang, West Java to support its growth. 
In 1985, two important figures in the development of the pharmaceutical industry in Indonesia, DR. Biantoro Wanandi - Doctor of Natural Sciences from Swiss Federal Institute of Technology in Zurich Switzerland who also served as Chief, Drug Policies and Management Unit at the World Health Organization (WHO) and Bapak Hamadi Widjaja - a graduate from INSEAD Fountainebleau in France, started a new era in Combiphar with one huge vision: to provide better access to the public through quality medicine. Through their leadership, Combiphar continued to grow and expand through a focused strategy and keen ability to take advantage of the opportunities even during the economic turbulence, a period which marked a significant turning point particularly in the history of OBH Combi’s nation-wide growth.
In response to Company’s increasingly rapid growth potential, Combiphar’s new vision “Championing a Healthy Tomorrow” has given birth to numerous business expansion opportunities outside of its main focus in prescription and over-the-counter categories, allowing the company to enter new business growth opportunities in nutrition and bio-research. 
Through the years, Combiphar has successfully established cooperation with international pharmaceutical companies from 18 countries across the globe, and today, is a trusted partner for these multi-national companies through licensing agreement and joint-venture. Through these partnerships, Combiphar undergoes regular quality control audits and is routinely equipped with the newest training and skills from its international counterparts, further strengthening its foundation in prioritizing the highest in quality.

companyOverview.html:
Kami menghimbau agar Anda berhati-hati saat melamar  pekerjaan dengan selalu memastikan iklan lowongan tersebut sesuai dengan profil perusahaannya.
Waspadalah jika Anda menemukan hal-hal di bawah ini :
  • PT Gadingmas Wirajaya tidak pernah memungut biaya apapun dalam proses rekrutmen.
  • PT Gadingmas Wirajaya tidak pernah bekerja sama dengan travel agent / biro perjalanan tertentu dalam proses  rekrutmen.
  • Apabila Anda diminta untuk membayar sejumlah uang dalam bentuk pembayaran tiket pesawat dan hotel atau  akomodasi lainnya agar diabaikan.
  • Apabila ada Panggilan wawancara di lokasi yang tidak sesuai dengan iklan yang tertera pada iklan lowongan.
  • Jangan memberikan data pribadi atau data keuangan Anda kepada siapapun.
Sejarah Perusahaan
PT. Gadingmas Wirajaya memulai awal kiprahnya pada tahun 1996 di Kota Bandung dengan memproduksi flexible polyurethane (Busa centian / spon) untuk mebel dan kasur busa dengan skala industri rumahan dengan merk GMW FOAM. Berkat kegigihan dan kerja keras bersama yang bertahun-tahun, PT. Gadingmas Wirajaya secara perlahan mampu memperluas jaringan pemasaran ke luar Kota Bandung. Pada tahun 2001 PT. Gadingmas Wirajaya berhasil membangun pabrik pertamanya di Cimincrang Kota Bandung yang menjadi basisnya dalam berkembang. PT. Gadingmas Wirajaya memulai pengembangan produksi spring bed (kasur pegas) berkualitas tinggi dengan harga terjangkau dengan merk Javaland Spring bed pada tahun 2004. Pada tahun 2017 siap diluncurkan merk spring bed (kasur pegas) dengan teknologi pocket spring dengan nama Ausi Spring dari PT. Gadingmas Wirajaya yang memiliki kualitas tidak kalah dengan merk-merk spring bed (kasur pegas) internasional.
Saat ini, PT. Gadingmas Wirajaya berfokus memproduksi busa / spon centian untuk mebel dan industri, kasur busa, dan kasur pegas. PT. Gadingmas Wirajaya berkembang pesat hingga mampu mengoperasikan empat buah pabrik produksi yang berlokasi di Bandung sebagai pusat dan tiga buah lokasi pabrik berstatus cabang di Cibubur, Semarang, dan Sidoarjo. PT. Gadingmas Wirajaya yang sekarang ini lebih dikenal dengan GMW menjadi salah satu perusahaan flexible polyurethane (busa / spon) yang diperhitungkan. Produk busa, kasur busa GMW FOAM yang bergaransi, dan produk spring bed (kasur pegas) Javaland Spring Bed berkembang pesat hingga mudah ditemukan di toko-toko furniture di Pulau Jawa dan Bali.
Visi Perusahaan:
- Menjadi pemimpin pasar flexible polyurthane, kasur busa, dan kasur pegas di Indonesia yang mengedepankan kualitas dan pelayanan  serta kepuasan kepada konsumen dengan harga yang terjangkau
Misi Perusahaan
-  Meningkatkan kualitas dan menambah produk-produk yang dihasilkan dengan harga terjangkau
-  Meningkatkan  pelayanan yang memuaskan kepada  konsumen
-  Meningkatkan jaringan distribusi hingga terjangkau ke pelosok

__________________________________________________________________________________
RGF is stands for RECRUIT GLOBAL  FAMILY, a global brand of Japan’s largest recruiting and information service company, Recruit Holdings co., Ltd.
We created this brand of our commitment to take on a new challenge to leverage on Recruit Group’s more over 50 years of industry experience and business network in Japan, to provide new opportunities to our clients across the region.
RGF HR AGENT takes charge of RGF’s business entity in general recruitment services. We provide total human resource services to clients at every stage of staff placement, such as evaluation, remuneration, and staff training. At the same time, we assist job-seekers in various ways to find the right job according to their individual preferences and experiences. Besides our services to assist full time staff recruitment, we also offer a range of support services for RPO (Recruitment Process Outsourcing) and contract base/temporary recruitment needs.
Our Company’s status as the Japan #1 market share holder in human resource, temporary staffing, and job advertisement field makes it possible for us to provide high quality total human resource management services not only in Japan but across the region.
We just open our RGF HR AGENT Brand in Indonesia on 1st May, 2013 and will continue and expand the business for the future.

companyOverview.html:
PT Sanbe Farma adalah perusahaan farmasi yang berkantor pusat di Bandung, saat ini Kami sedang membutuhkan karyawan baru yang professional, cekatan dan bertanggung jawab untuk dapat bergabung bersama kami
Sanbe Farma was founded in 1975. As of now after more than three decades since inception, we are the largest pharmaceutical manufacturers in Indonesia and according the recent IMS Report, we rank highest among all the Pharmaceutical Manufacturers in Indonesia including Multinational Companies. Out of top 10 products ethically prescribed, 4 products are from Sanbe. Our market coverage in Indonesia includes more than 37,000 Doctors served by 1,000 Medical Representatives, through our associate’s net-work of 1,100 Sales persons, 35 depots, 60 sub-depots and our corporate work force consisting 8,000 personnel. Our eight manufacturing facilities in Indonesia are cGMP approved plants as per the International Standards. Our sterile preparations unit (LVPs & SVPs) is the first in South East Asia with State-of-the-Art manufacturing equipment and technology from US and Europe and PIC(S) & TGA, Australia compliant.
Our international operations in 20 countries are set to make substantial contribution to the global healthcare. Our international operations cover not only export of our formulations to various developing and under developed countries, but also seek partnerships and alliances from and to developed and regulated markets such as North America and Europe with an aim to put Sanbe Farma on the global map to supply Generic and specialty formulations not only for Indonesia but also to the rest of the world. We are also looking for new acquisitions in potential markets to make our products globally available at affordable prices.
Our propinquity to invest in profitable and strategic ventures would encourage potential and strategic companies to partner with us for mutual benefit not only for generic formulations but also for New Drug Delivery Systems (NDDs), New Chemical Entities (NCEs) and Biosimilar products.
We are committed to strive for continued achievement to provide quality products for quality health through our sincere endeavor to become global generic pharmaceutical manufacturer from Indonesia in the days to come.

companyOverview.html:
PENGUMUMAN :
  • Asuransi Raksa Pratikara tidak pernah memungut biaya apapun dalam proses rekrutmen.
  • Asuransi Raksa Pratikara tidak pernah bekerja sama dengan travel agent / biro perjalanan tertentu dalam proses rekrutmen.
  • Apabila Anda diminta untuk membayar sejumlah uang dalam bentuk pembayaran tiket pesawat dan hotel atau akomodasi lainnya agar diabaikan.
  • Jangan memberikan data pribadi atau data keuangan Anda kepada siapapun.
  • Jika membutuhkan klarifikasi lebih lanjut dapat langsung menghubungi Asuransi Raksa Pratikara
Asuransi Raksa Pratikara was established in 1975 and conducts business operation based on the motto “Prudent and Trusted”. Our service qualities are enshrined in our professional, reliable, experienced and conscientious staff. Armed with the latest innovative insurance knowledge, we are constantly prepared to deliver high quality insurance services to our clientele. Our services comprise 19 offices nation-wide in Indonesia supported by the latest information technology. Communications among branches are performed through on-line network.
Product & Services
Driven by the customers trust built up over the years, we never stop endeavoring to improve the quality of our services. As a testimony to our commitment to quality service, we implemented 24-hour customer service and free car-towing service within the Jakarta-Bogor-Depok-Tangerang-Bekasi area in 2003. Having gained wide acclaim from customers, the free car-towing service was expanded to the area of Bandung and Surabaya. In 2004, we once again materialized our commitment to the enhancement of customer satisfaction by launching Raksa Gold Club (RGC), which provides dedicated services to motor-car policy holders with sum-insured of and above US$ 70,000. No efforts have been spared to ensure our best services to our customers. In 2005, we created Raksa Emergency Quick Service (REQS) rendering quick assistance to customers encountering emergency on the road, such as flat tires and car engine failure. Following the success of Raksa Gold Club, we achieved another milestone in upgrading our claim service by launching Raksa Silver Club (RSC) which is specifically aimed at pampering customers with motor insurance coverage below US$ 70,000. The advent of RSC brings in a new touch in insurance world which distinguishes Asuransi Raksa Pratikara from other insurers. Under our claim service motto “MUCAK” (Mudah, Cepat, Akrab which is translated as Easy, Fast, Friendly) all customers visiting RSC will enjoy relaxing ambience and affable claim service.

companyOverview.html:
Profil CIMB Niaga Auto Finance
CIMB Niaga Auto Finance adalah perusahaan pembiayaan otomotif terkemuka yang merupakan anak perusahaan dari Bank CIMB Niaga Tbk.
CIMB Niaga Auto Finance, dahulu dikenal sebagai Saseka Gelora Finance, telah berpengalaman dalam pembiayaan selama lebih dari 30 tahun. Sebagai anak perusahaan Bank CIMB Niaga Tbk, bank peringakat lima besar dalam asset di Indonesia, CIMB Niaga Auto Finance berhasil meningkatkan kinerja perusahaan dengan sangat signifikan di tahun 2011 dibanding tahun 2010, antara lain: pertumbuhan penyaluran kredit otomotif mencapai 165%, peningkatan profit perusahaan sampai dengan 169%, pertumbuhan total asset hingga 271%, dengan tetap menjaga NPL dilevel 0,55%.
Sebagai perusahaan pembiayaan yang memfokuskan pada transaksi otomotif, CNAF mendiversifikasikan produknya menjadi 3 besar yakni: Pembiayaan Mobil, Pembiayaan Sepeda Motor, dan Pembiayaan Fleet.
Sejarah Perusahaan.
1981
Saseka Gelora Leasing pertama kali didirikan, dengan fokus bisnis sewa guna usaha.
1993
Saseka mengganti namanya menjadi PT Saseka Gelora Finance dan mengembangkan usahanya dalam industri pembiayaan, dimana Bank Niaga  merupakan pemegang saham urutan ketiga terbesar dengan 18% kepemilikan saham  di Saseka setelah Bank Uppindo (38%) dan Indover (19%).
1996
Bank Niaga menjadi pemegang saham mayoritas dengan 79.65% kepemilikan saham.
2002
Bank Niaga Tbk meningkatkan kepemilikannya atas Saseka Gelora Finance menjadi 81.96%.
2007
Keseriusan Bank Niaga Tbk untuk menggarap pasar industri pembiayaan Indonesia secara fokus dibuktikan dengan menambah porsi kepemilikan saham di Saseka menjadi 95.91%.
2008
Penandatanganan perjanjian merger antara Bank Niaga Tbk dan LippoBank pada bulan Juni 2008, dan secara resmi menjadi Bank CIMB Niaga pada November 2008 untuk memenuhi kebijakan SPP (Single Presence Policy) yang ditetapkan oleh Bank Indonesia. (Dengan kata lain, Saseka pun kini berada dalam naungan Bank CIMB Niaga Tbk).
2009
Proyek Transformasi di Saseka dimulai pada tanggal 6 Oktober 2009 dalam rangka melanjutkan rencana Bank CIMB Niaga Tbk untuk terus menggarap industri pembiayaan di Indonesia. Transformasi ini meliputi perubahan fokus bisnis Saseka (business focus) dari leasing menjadi consumer finance, serta transformasi model bisnis (business model) Saseka.
2010
Bank CIMB Niaga Tbk menambah kepemilikan sahamnya atas Saseka menjadi 99.9%, sedangkan 0.1% saham dipegang oleh NMC. (PT Niaga Manajemen Citra). Agustus 2010, PT Saseka Gelora Finance secara resmi berubah namanya menjadi PT CIMB Niaga Auto Finance diikuti dengan perubahan logo.
