companyOverview.html:
PT. DAYA ANUGRAH MANDIRI 
DAYA MOTOR
PERUSAHAAN RETAIL SEPEDA MOTOR HONDA BERSKALA NASIONAL MEMILIKI JARINGAN YANG MENYEBAR DI SELURUH INDONESIA. DAYA MOTOR MERUPAKAN MEMBER TRIPUTRA GROUP.
History
Pada tanggal 10 Agustus 1948 Bpk.Raphael Adi Rachmat mendirikan  perusahaan jasa kurir, yang bernama "PEKALIPAN".
1972 dibangun "PD. DAYA "sebagai distributor sepeda motor Honda.
1984 berubah menjadi Perseroan Terbatas (PT), bernama PT. Daya Adira Mustika, yang terbagi menjadi 3 divisi:
-Divisi Sales
-Divisi Service
-Divisi Sparepart
6 Mei 2002 didirikan PT. DAYA  ANUGRAH MANDIRI dengan Branding DAYA MOTOR dan bisnis utamanya adalah Ritel Sepeda Motor Honda,yang merupakan bagian dari PT. Daya Adira Mustika.
Januari 2004 Daya Motor dipisahkan secara resmi dari PT. Daya Adira Mustika.

Tahun 2007 Branding DAYA MOTOR berubah menjadi ADIRA MOTOR.
Tahun 2011 Bersamaan pendirian Daya Group, PT. DAYA ANUGRAH MANDIRI kembali menggunakan bendera DAYA MOTOR dan telah memiliki lebih dari 89 Cabang dan 112 Bengkel yang tersebar di Indonesia.

H3, Penjualan Suku Cadang Sepeda Motor HONDA

companyOverview.html:
PT. Bank Commonwealth (Commonwealth Bank) with more than 20 years of presence in Indonesia is a subsidiary of Bank Commonwealth of Australia (CBA), the largest service provider listed on the Australian Securities Exchange and is included the Morgan Stanley Capital Global Index. Commonwealth Bank today offers customers a variety of banking products in 25 cities across Indonesia such as savings, deposits, mortgage, various investment products and bancassurance, working capital credit for Small and Medium Enterprises (SME) and Safe Deposit Box (SDB), 24-hours Call Centre, as well as internet banking with special features that offer transaction flexibility.
In line with its Mission “to be the market leader in providing digital financial solutions for our Retail & SME target customers”, Commonwealth Bank has broken three records of Indonesian Record Museum (MURI) through Tyme Digital – the first end-to-end digital onboarding platform that allows customers to open bank account in less than 10 minutes –, KTA Tyme Digital – the first unsecured loan with its digital submission process and instant decision making –, and Commonwealth Bank’s Mobile Banking, as the first mobile banking application with investment features. Besides Tyme Digital, Commonwealth Bank also offers best in class customer experience through branch with digital capability that has been present in Kensington – Kelapa Gading, PIK, and WTC 6.
Visit www.commbank.co.id for further information on Commonwealth Bank.

companyOverview.html:
A dream was started in March 1970, a dream to create a high quality Decorative Paint product. A dream which transformed into an ambition to create paint and coating products that can stand on the international stage. As a local brand, we have been continually striving to improve and push ourselves to the limit of creating products that caters to the needs of our customers and to keep up with the ever evolving technological advancement. Our commitment to quality is the one thing that defines our company. Consistently using the best manufacturing practices with the best material available, we deliver products that will satisfy and even exceed the expectations of our customers.
We're proud to announce that our products has been used in many premium class housing projects, premium commercial blocks, and various hotels and apartments throughout the country. Our values makes us work with all our hearts to create a product that can touch all aspects of our customer's life, including but not limited to their family, their workplace, their house, and their immediate surroundings.
We aim to be the market leader of paint and coating industry in Indonesia, and afterwards, the world.

companyOverview.html:
PT. Rumah Cahaya Utama berdiri pada tahun 2019, yang merupakan perubahan restruktur dari perusahaan Arga group (PT. Arga Arta Utama) memulai bisnis sejak tahun 1995, dimana bidang  distribusi peralatan rumah tangga secara direct selling untuk area pulau jawa.
PT. Arga Arta Utama yang Usaha dimulai di sebuah garasi rumah dengan karyawan lebih kurang 10 orang , perusahaan terus berkembang pada tahun 2005 membangun pabrik Kompor Minyak Tanah dan Pada tahun 2007 dengan dimulainya program Pemerintah yaitu konversi energi dari penggunaan minyak tanah ke gas. Maka pada tahun 2010 PT. Arga Arta Utama memproduksi kompor gas 2 tungku untuk mengikuti perkembangan industry dan kebutuhan masyarakat.
Dengan berkembangnya perusahaan, maka dibentuklah unit bisnis baru perusahaan distribusi pada tahun 2011-2013 PT. Kunci sukses Sejahtera, PT. Arga Arta Kencana, dan pada tahun 2018 berdiri unit bisnis industry stamping plat, powder coating dan injection plastic PT Dena Pres metal serta akuisi perusahaan distribusi di Yogyakarta PT. Usaha Putra Hamdan.
Dengan Perkembangan perusahaan tersebut, maka ditahun 2019 dilakukan restruktur perusahaan Arga Group diganti kepemilikannya menjadi PT. Rizki Lima Cahaya (RLC) yang mendirikan 3 Perusahaan Holding dengan bisnis baru yang berbeda, dan menunjuk PT. Rumah Cahaya Utama (RCU) sebagai Holding yang mengatur 5 perusahaan Arga Group.

Anak Perusahaan PT Rumah Cahaya Utama :
• PT Arga Arta Utama (Est. 1995) : Manufaktur peralatan rumah tangga
• PT. Dena Pres Metal (Est. 2018) : manufaktur Stamping, powder couting dan injection plastic
• PT. Kunci Sukses Sejahtera (Est. 2011) : Distributor peralatan rumah tangga
• PT. Arga Arta Kencana (Est. 2012) : Distributor peralatan rumah tangga
• PT. Usaha Putra Hamdan (Est. 2019) : Distributor peralatan rumah tangga

Sebagai bagian dari Group PMPS (Pancamas Pipasakti), kami berdiri sejak Tahun 2005 dan kami hadir di tengah masyarakat Indonesia sebagai salah satu produsen yang bergerak dalam bidang plastik khususnya pipa uPVC  dan HDPE dengan merek dagang PiPAMAS
Sadar akan pertumbuhan industri konstruksi dan infrastruktur di Indonesia yang semakin hari semakin berkembang, sesuai dengan visi PiPAMAS yaitu menjadi produsen pipe plastik pilihan pertama di Indonesia, kami berkomitmen untuk selalu mengutamakan kepuasan pelanggan dan senantiasa menghasilkan produk berkualitas tinggi yang memenuhi standar (JIS K-6742 dan SNI), kami pun senantiasa melakukan evaluasi dan perbaikan terhadap produk, proses, sistem, dan manajemen untuk menunjang pelayanan kami kepada Anda.
Kami telah menangani prcyek dari beragam sektor seperti irigasi rumah tangga, permukiman, gedung perkantoran, water plant, dan Iain-Iain Kami selalu siap memberikan penjelasan untuk membantu masalah yang dihadapi konsumen seat pemasangan di lapangan dan layanan purna jual kami dapat selalu diandalkan untuk mengatasi masalah yang timbul setelah pipa terpasang
PiPAMAS adalah pilihan yang tepat untuk sistem pipa yang berkualitas karena PiPAMAS adalah sarana kehidupan berkualitas begi masyarakat.

companyOverview.html:
Through idealism and creativity, SHAFIRA has grown from a small muslim fashion studio into what it is now. Its name was inspired by the word “SHAF”, that does not only mean a line, but also indicates a properly structured organization.Pioneered by Feny Mustafa at Salman Mosque ITB on 8 January 1989, SHAFIRA has turned into a major company with 24 showrooms in 15 major cities across Indonesia.
With more than 30.000 active members spread across Indonesia and other countries, SHAFIRA has tried to build a good and healthy relationship with its members through activities such as health training, fashion consultation, jilbab classes and other regular member activities. In addition to the members of SHAFIRA, the company would not have been as succesful without the help and support of the mass media. SHAFIRA relatef publications have supported the company, and made it well known in public. Along with its development, Shafira’s consistency in one of the business mission that is giving benefits for others in Corporate Social Responsibility program is well managed by Shafira Foundations.
Through elegant and exclusive designs, SHAFIRA has tried its best to accommodate the needs of both men and women alike. now, at 24th years ols, SHAFIRA is trying to bring a new wave of style, with “total look” as the concept. SHAFIRA understands that attire is an important aspect of someone’s life, and tries to incorporate both design and comfort into its line of apparel. The combination of simple and elegant design in addition high quality fabric has allowed SHAFIRA to create something for every season, be it formal, or casual. Various accessories and jilbabs that are designed to harmonize with the chosen outfits are also available.

companyOverview.html:
PT. SYAPRIL JANIZAR adalah perusahaan swasta di bidang jasa konsultan yang berkedudukan di Bandung, dimiliki dan dikelola sepenuhnya oleh tenaga ahli Indonesia.
PT. SYAPRIL JANIZAR didirikan pada tanggal 12 Juli 2013 oleh tenaga-tenaga profesional yang tergerak nuraninya untuk lebih memberikan sumbangsih pemikiran, kemampuan dan kompetensinya di dalam merancang bangun, meneliti dan mengembangkan potensi sumber daya guna kepentingan pembangunan wilayah/daerah dan kesejahteraan masyarakat.
Diawali dengan beberapa tenaga ahli muda, saat ini PT. SYAPRIL JANIZAR telah memiliki tenaga ahli yang kompeten dan berpengalaman luas dalam bidang keahliannya masing-masing, agar selalu dapat mengikuti perkembangan teknologi yang senantiasa terbaharui dan untuk mempertinggi kualitas layanan kami, para tenaga ahli secara aktif ikut serta dalam program-program pengembangan sumber daya manusia, pelatihan dan seminar-seminar. Disamping itu kami juga mengundang para spesialis lokal maupun asing yang sudah diakui kepakarannya untuk dilibatkan dalam proyek-proyek yang kami laksanakan sebagai penasihat teknis apabila dibutuhkan. Dalam menangani proyek-proyek yang membutuhkan pengetahuan sangat spesifik, kami menjalin kerjasama dengan perusahaan perusahaan konsultan nasional yang berkualitas maupun konsultan asing ternama.
PT. SYAPRIL JANIZAR dalam memberikan bantuan teknis dan layanan konsultansi engineering berkualitas tinggi, perusahaan telah memiliki beberapa keunggulan sebagai berikut :
  • Tenaga inti yang terdiri dari para doktor, master dan insinyur dan spesialis profesional lainnya yang qualified sehingga dapat menjamin terlaksananya suatu pekerjaan dengan mutu terbaik.
  • Suatu database dan jaringan Tenaga Ahli berpengalaman, yang dapat menghasilkan kualitas kerja yang baik pada berbagai macam proyek.
  • Pengalaman yang cukup dalam manajemen bisnis untuk menjamin terlaksananya proyek secara ekonomis dan efisien, serta ketepatan waktu dalam pelaporan kemajuan pekerjaan.

HISTORY
PT. Mitsindo Visual Pratama (MVP) adalah perusahaan yang menyediakan solusi Audio Visual dan Teknologi Informasi (IT) yang didirikan pada bulan Januari 2005, berawal sebagai distributor resmi untuk produk Visual Imaging dari Mitsubishi Electric. Selanjutnya di tahun 2006, MVP kembali mendapatkan kepercayaan untuk menjadi distributor resmi produk dengan merek Kramer untuk wilayah Asia Pasifik. Melihat kebutuhan Audio Visual dan IT yang tersebar di Indonesia, maka PT. Mitsindo Visual Pratama (MVP) pun membuka jaringan layanan kantor cabang di kota Bandung, Sleman, Surabaya, dan Makassar. Kiprah PT. Mitsindo Visual Pratama (MVP) terus melaju di tengah pandemi 2020 dengan meluncurkan platform digital di situs www.eling.co.id untuk B2B Marketplace. Menyongsong tahun 2021,
PT. Mitsindo Visual Pratama (MVP) membuka kesempatan bagi Anda yang menyukai tantangan memasuki era teknologi digital.
Visi
Menjadi ONE STOP SOLUTION bagi kebutuhan bisnis dan perkantoran lewat peningkatan teknologi dan layanan dengan menerapkan inovasi, kreativitas, dan integritas untuk semua aspek bisnis.

companyOverview.html:
PT Bank China Construction Bank Indonesia Tbk (“CCB Indonesia”) is a Commercial Foreign Exchange Bank listed in the Indonesian Stock Exchange (IDX), and was the result of a merger between PT Bank Windu Kentjana International Tbk (“Bank Windu”) and PT Bank Antardaerah (“Bank Anda”) on November 30, 2016, which has a network consisting of 112 offices spread out in cities across Indonesia such as Jakarta, Bandung, Semarang, Yogyakarta, Surabaya, Denpasar Bali, Mataram Lombok, Palembang, Bandar Lampung, Batam, Pekanbaru, Pontianak, Makassar and Pangkal Pinang. CCB Indonesia will soon be having nationwide coverage.
While previously focused on small and medium enterprises, CCB Indonesia will also develop Corporate Banking business with large local Indonesia corporations, Chinese enterprises, Financial Institution, Mortgage loan and will become the market maker of RMB business in Indonesia.

companyOverview.html:
Our company is a leading, vertically integrated shoe manufacturing company in Indonesia that operates in the mass manufacturing space. Incorporated in 1974, our company was the first shoe manufacturing plant incorporated in Bandung. Our company has since grown to 5 manufacturing sites in Bandung, a cosmopolitan city that is home to most shoe and textile manufacturing companies and the capital of West Java.
We have distributors in every city in Indonesia, which comprises approximately 105 cities. We have enjoyed continuous expansion due to strong credibility, customer relationships, reputation and branding, which is anchored by the quality of our products and cost-effective prices as well as our competency and reliability.
Our clients include factories and companies in a range of industries such as electronics, pharmaceutical, health care, F&B, oil & gas, FMCG in the domestic and multinational spheres, as well as schools, hospitals, distributors and retailers. 
Our company is optimally integrated from the manufacturing of chemicals into rubber soles and the production of shoes. We invest in the most up-to-date machineries and technology to produce innovative and high quality products.
Our product portfolio includes, but is not limited to, sports, safety and casual footwear and apparels.  
  • Our Vision
Our vision is to be a market leader in every market and country we serve and provide for, as we are in Indonesia.
  • Our Mission
Our mission is to produce quality, innovative products at cost effective prices through our efficiency, capabilities and strong supplier network and to provide unwavering dedication to our clients’ satisfaction.

Geekseat is an Australian owned and managed IT Consultant company. Our software developers are all employees of Geekseat and are located in our development centres in Indonesia.
Our goal is to be the premier software company for both client and employee engagement. By providing fantastic customer service, on-time delivery, and smart and innovative solutions. Our smart and innovative solutions are provided by smart, keen, engaged employees, who have the opportunity to use their skills to their full capacity, and develop new skills in the process.
Geekseat is the perfect development partner for any organization looking to externally resource or extend their current development team, In particular:
- Software Houses
- IT Departments
- Digital Marketing Agencies
In Geekseat, in addition to your technical skills, your attitude will also determine your career. You not only need high individual skills, but you also need to be willing to help your fellow team members when they need it.

Sebagai bagian dari Group PMPS (Pancamas Pipasakti), kami berdiri sejak Tahun 2005 dan kami hadir di tengah masyarakat Indonesia sebagai salah satu produsen yang bergerak dalam bidang plastik khususnya pipa uPVC  dan HDPE dengan merek dagang PiPAMAS
Sadar akan pertumbuhan industri konstruksi dan infrastruktur di Indonesia yang semakin hari semakin berkembang, sesuai dengan visi PiPAMAS yaitu menjadi produsen pipe plastik pilihan pertama di Indonesia, kami berkomitmen untuk selalu mengutamakan kepuasan pelanggan dan senantiasa menghasilkan produk berkualitas tinggi yang memenuhi standar (JIS K-6742 dan SNI), kami pun senantiasa melakukan evaluasi dan perbaikan terhadap produk, proses, sistem, dan manajemen untuk menunjang pelayanan kami kepada Anda.
Kami telah menangani prcyek dari beragam sektor seperti irigasi rumah tangga, permukiman, gedung perkantoran, water plant, dan Iain-Iain Kami selalu siap memberikan penjelasan untuk membantu masalah yang dihadapi konsumen seat pemasangan di lapangan dan layanan purna jual kami dapat selalu diandalkan untuk mengatasi masalah yang timbul setelah pipa terpasang
PiPAMAS adalah pilihan yang tepat untuk sistem pipa yang berkualitas karena PiPAMAS adalah sarana kehidupan berkualitas begi masyarakat.

Pengumuman :
Belakangan ini telah beredar beberapa selebaran yang isinya seolah-olah pengumuman tentang rekrutmen pegawai baru PT Verena Multi Finance, Tbk dan bekerja sama dengan pihak ketiga (biro perjalanan) untuk biaya transportasi dan akomodasi ke tempat perekrutan.
Sehubungan dengan hal tersebut, melalui forum ini, kami beritahukan bahwa PT Verena Multi Finance, Tbk tidak pernah melakukan pungutan biaya apapun termasuk biaya akomodasi dan transportasi dalam setiap proses seleksi dan rekrutmennya baik itu di Jakarta maupun kota lainnya.
Kami himbau agar para pembaca dapat waspada apabila menerima informasi serupa. Apabila memerlukan konfirmasi tentang rekrutmen PT Verena Multi Finance, Tbk, dapat menghubungi Bagian Rekrutmen Kantor Pusat PT Verena Multi Finance, Tbk, 021- 3504890 atau di akses melalui www.verena.co.id Demikian informasi ini kami sampaikan.
=====================================================================

companyOverview.html: Shipper is on a mission to invent a new standard for online shipping in Indonesia. We have assembled the largest asset-light delivery network to make shipping simple, reliable, and cost competitive. With over 17,000 islands, 2,500 logistics providers, and a fast growing e-commerce market, Indonesia is one of the most challenging markets to build a great online shipping experience and we are primed to be a part of the solution. jobDescription.html:
Who we are looking for
We are looking for a high performing Sales Manager to help us meet our customer acquisition and revenue targets. The Sales Manager will be responsible for maximizing our sales team potential and crafting sales plans to hit company sales target.
A Bachelor Degree in Business or related filed is required. In order to succeed in this role, you will need excellent communication skills and the ability to lead a sales team. Previous experience in sales-related role is a must.
What will you do
  • Develop sales strategies to acquire new customers or clients.
  • Analyse sales data on sales results and develop plans to address performance gaps.
  • Collaborate with marketing team to develop lead generation plans.
  • Designing and implementing a strategic sales plan that expands Shipper’s customer base and ensure its strong presence
  • Achieving growth and hitting sales targets by successfully managing the sales team
  • Managing objectives setting, coaching and performance monitoring of sales representatives
  • Build and promote strong, long-lasting customer relationships by partnering with them and understanding their needs
  • Present sales, revenue and expenses reports and realistic forecasts to the management team
  • Maintain a deep understanding of customer needs and monitor their preferences.
  • Resolve escalated customer issues and customer complaints regarding sales and service.
  • Provide advanced negotiation expertise.
What are the requirements
  • Bachelor’s degree in business or related field.
  • Successful previous experience as a sales representative or sales manager who consistently meeting or exceeding targets
  • Demonstrated ability to communicate, present and influence credibly and effectively at all levels of the organization
  • Proven experience to drive the sales process from plan to close
  • Strong business sense and industry expertise
  • Excellent mentoring, coaching and people management skills
  • Experience in customer relationship management.
  • Experience managing and directing a sales team.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
  • Successful experience building a territory from scratch is a plus

companyOverview.html:
WE ARE RADYA LABS
We enable digital transformation through innovative solution and service excellence!
Misi kami adalah PIC - People, Innovation, and Creation - Manusia, Inovasi, dan Karya. Kami berkarya membangun solusi yang meningkatkan produktivitas dan kepuasan pelanggan, serta membangun lingkungan kerja yang inovatif dan kreatif untuk para kru.
Radya Labs berdiri tahun 2011, dan sudah membantu puluhan perusahaan dalam membuat aplikasi yang membantu bisnisnya. Dari perusahaan transportasi, media, bisnis, hingga teknologi berskala nasional maupun internasional telah menjadi customer yang setia dan puas menggunakan layanan yang kami berikan. Microsoft Indonesia, Pertamina Hulu Energi, Bank MNC, Zurich, MPM, and Kompas Gramedia adalah contoh klien-klien kami yang puas dengan hasil kerja kami.
Setelah 6 tahun berjalan, prinsip kami dalam menjalankan perusahaan tidak pernah berubah. Kami selalu menjadi perusahaan yang jujur pada customer, selalu memberikan ide kreatif, flexibel, dan komunikatif. Kami adalah perusahaan muda yang dinamis, kreatif, dan penuh integritas dalam menjalankan semua kebutuhan customer kami.

jobDescription.html:
Radya Labs saat ini mencari Project Manager yang mampu memimpin tim dalam mengeksekusi project sesuai perencanaan untuk menghasilkan project yang tepat waktu, tepat budget, dan tepat scope. Dibantu tim project  management di Radya Labs, project manager diharapkan dapat melaksanakan tanggung jawab berikut:
Responsibilities:
  • Membuat perencanaan eksekusi project secara budget, timeline, dan scope
  • Melakukan analisis teknis bersama analyst, developer, dan designer saat project berjalan
  • Memimpin tim internal yang akan melaksanakan project
  • Melakukan supervisi project berjalan terhadap tim (Analyst, TW, Developer, Designer, Tester) agar sesuai dengan perencanaan
  • Menjadi poin of contact terhadap klien selama keberjalanan project
  • Melakukan manajemen dan penanganan masalah dalam project, baik internal maupun eksternal
  • Secara berkala bertemu dengan klien untuk update project, mayoritas di Jakarta
 
Fasilitas Tambahan:
Radya Labs juga menawarkan BPJS dan makan siang. Semua perjalanan ke luar Bandung akan ditanggung kantor bersama dengan kebutuhan akomodasi

Kami bekerja 8 jam sehari dan menghindari overtime, karena mencintai keseimbangan kerja. Namun, pada waktu tertentu tetap dibutuhkan, jadi kamu harus tetap bersiap (misal end of project, kebutuhan UAT onsite di client).

History Akademik yang dicari:
  • Minimal Sarjana (S1) dari jurusan Sistem Informasi, Teknik Informatika, Computer Science, Teknik Industri atau yang sejenis
  • Mempunyai pengalaman sebagai asisten mata kuliah, asisten lab, atau pengalaman organisasi lebih diutamakan
 
Kualifikasi yang dicari
  • Memiliki skill analitikal yang baik, dapat memahami bagaimana flow sebuah sistem IT bekerja
  • Memiliki skill interpersonal yang baik (Key : Komunikasi, empati, jujur, dan mau belajar)
  • Memiliki pengetahuan tentang project management, waterfall maupun agile. Pengalaman pernah mengaplikasikan menjadi lebih diutamakan.
  • Mampu melakukan manajemen waktu dan bekerja dibawah tekanan dari orang lain
  • Memiliki ketelitian, atensi pada detail, dan melakukan sesuatu secara data oriented
  • Memiliki kemampuan dalam mengelola dan menentukan kebutuhan SDM dalam tim project
  • Memiliki pengalaman min. 2-3 tahun di posisi dan bidang yang sama
  • Bersedia untuk melakukan traveling antara Jakarta-Bandung

companyOverview.html:
Kami menghimbau agar Anda berhati-hati saat melamar  pekerjaan dengan selalu memastikan iklan lowongan tersebut sesuai dengan profil perusahaannya.
Waspadalah jika Anda menemukan hal-hal di bawah ini :
  • PT Quipper Edukasi Indonesia tidak pernah memungut biaya apapun dalam proses rekrutmen.
  • PT Quipper Edukasi Indonesia tidak pernah bekerja sama dengan travel agent / biro perjalanan tertentu dalam proses  rekrutmen.
  • Apabila Anda diminta untuk membayar sejumlah uang dalam bentuk pembayaran tiket pesawat dan hotel atau  akomodasi lainnya agar diabaikan.
  • Apabila ada Panggilan wawancara di lokasi yang tidak sesuai dengan iklan yang tertera pada iklan lowongan.
  • Jangan memberikan data pribadi atau data keuangan Anda kepada siapapun.
=======================================
Quipper merupakan perusahaan teknologi pendidikan dengan Misi - Memberikan pendidikan terbaik hingga ke daerah terpencil. Berdiri pertama kali pada tahun 2010 di London - Inggris, Layanan Quipper saat ini telah dapat dinikmati di beberapa negara seperti Jepang, Mexico, Filipina dan Indonesia.
Sejak tahun 2015, Quipper telah menjadi bagian dari ekosistem pendidikan Indonesia dengan turut menyediakan, memperbaiki, dan mendistribusikan pendidikan berkualitas untuk guru dan siswa. 
Dengan Visi - Distributors of Wisdom - Bring the best education to all corners of the world, kami percaya bahwa akses pendidikan berkualitas adalah hak mendasar bagi setiap anak Indonesia.
Selama 3 tahun Quipper di Indonesia, kami terus bertumbuh untuk mendukung peningkatan kualitas pendidikan ke seluruh wilayan di Indonesia.
  • 34 Provinsi di Indonesia telat dijangkau 
  • 8.500+ Sekolah sudah dikunjungi 
  • 96.000 Ruang kelas sudah dikunjungi
  • 350.000+ Jumlah guru terdaftar 
  • 950.000+ Jumlah pengikut di sosial media Quipper Indonesia 
  • 5jt+ Jumlah siswa yang terdaftar 
Dengan peningkatan pertumbuhan Quipper di Indonesia, kami mencari seorang yang Smart, Creative and Willing to grow untuk menjadi bagian dari kontributor kemajuan pendidikan di Indonesia.

Bank Prima Ekspress pada tahun 2002, dan saat ini telah berkembang menjadi sebuah bank swasta Utama yang menawarkan produk dan jasa inovatif serta komprehensif terutama di sisi delivery channel-nya termasuk Internet Banking dan Mobile Banking. PermataBank memiliki aspirasi untuk menjadi penyedia jasa keuangan terkemuka di Indonesia, dengan fokus di segmen Konsumer dan Komersial.

DI tahun 2004, Standard Chartered Bank dan PT. Astra Internasional Tbk mengambil alih PermataBank dan memulai proses transformasi secara besar-besaran di dalam organisasi. Selanjutnya, terhadap wujud komitmennya terhadap PermataBank, kepemilikan gabungan saham utama ini meningkat menjadi 89.01% pada tahun 2006.
Kombinasi unik dari kedua pemegang saham strategis merupakan salah satu kekuatan Utama PermataBank. PT. Astra Internasional Tbk merupakan perusahaan Indonesia yang besar dan memiliki pengalaman kuat di pasar domestik. Standard Chartered Bank dengan keahlian dan pengalaman global terkemuka yang dimilikinya menjadikan PermataBank berada dalam posisi yang unik.

Dan saat ini PermataBank telah berkembang menjadi sebuah bank swasta utama yang menawarkan produk dan jasa inovatif serta komprehensif terutama di sisi delivery channel-nya termasuk Internet Banking dan Mobile Banking. PermataBank memiliki aspirasi untuk menjadi penyedia jasa keuangan terkemuka di Indonesia dengan fokus di segmen Konsumer dan Komersial.
VISI
Menjadi Bank pilihan dengan terus membina kemitraan dan menciptakan nilai bermakna bagi stakeholders
MISI
  • Berperan aktif sebagai mitra di bidang keuangan dan agen pembangunan yang efisien bagi nasabah dan mayarakat.
  • Memberikan layanan keuangan menyeluruh secara sederhana, cepat, andal dan inovatif.
  • Berkomitmen untuk memberikan pengalaman unggul bagi pemangku kepentingan dan membangun nilai positif bagi pemegang saham.

companyOverview.html:
In today’s global markets, competition, regional and domestic issues have resulted in unprecedented levels of regulation, all of which companies need to be aware of. Taxation and business laws and regulations now are the number one regulatory concern of the CEO, and are driving demand for proper internal controls and robust financial reporting processes to satisfy regulators and stakeholders.
Clients engage INATAX because we understand the business and economic environment, and we combine this with specialist knowledge. We help you navigate this complexity so that you can achieve your business objectives by reducing task risk and meeting your compliance obligations and improve business and operating performance in a tax-efficient way.
INATAX owns 5 different subsidiaries also moving in tax service industry spread across big cities in Indonesia, in Jakarta, Batam, Bandung & Semarang.

companyOverview.html:
Sebagai bagian dari Group PMPS (Pancamas Pipasakti), kami berdiri sejak Tahun 2005 dan kami hadir di tengah masyarakat Indonesia sebagai salah satu produsen yang bergerak dalam bidang plastik khususnya pipa uPVC  dan HDPE dengan merek dagang PiPAMAS
Sadar akan pertumbuhan industri konstruksi dan infrastruktur di Indonesia yang semakin hari semakin berkembang, sesuai dengan visi PiPAMAS yaitu menjadi produsen pipe plastik pilihan pertama di Indonesia, kami berkomitmen untuk selalu mengutamakan kepuasan pelanggan dan senantiasa menghasilkan produk berkualitas tinggi yang memenuhi standar (JIS K-6742 dan SNI), kami pun senantiasa melakukan evaluasi dan perbaikan terhadap produk, proses, sistem, dan manajemen untuk menunjang pelayanan kami kepada Anda.
Kami telah menangani prcyek dari beragam sektor seperti irigasi rumah tangga, permukiman, gedung perkantoran, water plant, dan Iain-Iain Kami selalu siap memberikan penjelasan untuk membantu masalah yang dihadapi konsumen seat pemasangan di lapangan dan layanan purna jual kami dapat selalu diandalkan untuk mengatasi masalah yang timbul setelah pipa terpasang
PiPAMAS adalah pilihan yang tepat untuk sistem pipa yang berkualitas karena PiPAMAS adalah sarana kehidupan berkualitas begi masyarakat.

companyOverview.html:
Through idealism and creativity, SHAFIRA has grown from a small muslim fashion studio into what it is now. Its name was inspired by the word “SHAF”, that does not only mean a line, but also indicates a properly structured organization.Pioneered by Feny Mustafa at Salman Mosque ITB on 8 January 1989, SHAFIRA has turned into a major company with 24 showrooms in 15 major cities across Indonesia.
With more than 30.000 active members spread across Indonesia and other countries, SHAFIRA has tried to build a good and healthy relationship with its members through activities such as health training, fashion consultation, jilbab classes and other regular member activities. In addition to the members of SHAFIRA, the company would not have been as succesful without the help and support of the mass media. SHAFIRA relatef publications have supported the company, and made it well known in public. Along with its development, Shafira’s consistency in one of the business mission that is giving benefits for others in Corporate Social Responsibility program is well managed by Shafira Foundations.
Through elegant and exclusive designs, SHAFIRA has tried its best to accommodate the needs of both men and women alike. now, at 24th years ols, SHAFIRA is trying to bring a new wave of style, with “total look” as the concept. SHAFIRA understands that attire is an important aspect of someone’s life, and tries to incorporate both design and comfort into its line of apparel. The combination of simple and elegant design in addition high quality fabric has allowed SHAFIRA to create something for every season, be it formal, or casual. Various accessories and jilbabs that are designed to harmonize with the chosen outfits are also available.

jobDescription.html:
Job Summary
The Supply Chain Supervisor ensures the availability of the right product in the right quantity at the right time by collaborating with all functions on site and in the region to prepare and achieve the supply plan. The Supply Chain Supervisor also provides visibility on stock availability and supply constraints, risks including inventory management.
About the job: 
  • Master Production Scheduling (supply planning)
    • Determine the net monthly requirements for the next 3 months based on contract demand and call-offs and available FG, RM inventory, and provide input for the site scheduler for the detail weekly, daily production plan.
    • Ensure all supply chain units (warehouse, shipping) are fully aware of the production status, and all work planning and execution are integrated and communicated.
    • Resolves problems expeditiously to ensure customer requirements are met.
    • Escalates unresolved issues to regional SC team
  • Material Requirements Planning
    • Schedules expedite and coordinate the delivery of all raw and packaging materials, including inter-company transfers
    • Maintains inventory above safety stock level at all times
  • Daily tracking and monitoring
    • Monitoring the daily production and QA stock releases
    • Maintaining accurate loading date in the shipping system
    • Keeping track of priority orders and shipments
  • Monitors, analyzes & reports performance utilizing information derived from each supply chain units
    • Work closely with all the supply chain units to meet the shipping dates according to sales forecast or customer requirements.
    • Constantly monitoring and analyzing the production output to meet changing customer demand and aligned with business goals
  • Define and ensure stock targets (Inventory overview, Stock level, Qualitative aspect, Coverage, stock parameters)
  • Facilitate and drive system driven planning in the site
About you: 
  • Diploma/Degree in any technical discipline &/or post graduation in supply chain/operation
  • 3+ years experience in supply chain (including but not limited to creating MRP, MPS, arrange delivery schedule, etc) IS A MUST
  • Working experience in SAP/Oracle and APO is an advantage.
  • Attention to details and ability to dealing with data by spreadsheet.
  • Strong analytical and mathematical abilities.
  • Good communication skill
  • Advance English is a MUST
  • Willing to work at Rancaekek, Sumedang

companyOverview.html:
WEALTHY didirikan pada tahun 2006 untuk memenuhi permintaan pasar dengan produk-produk berkualitas dan dapat diandalkan dibidang pemeliharaan aftermarket otomotif di Asia.
Dengan menggabungkan pengetahuan pendiri dan teknologi dari Eropa, kami telah menghasilkan banyak produk andalan dengan kualitas tinggi seperti Magic Spray 9 in 1, Wiper Blade, Wiper Blade Refill, Auto Bulbs, Automatic Transmission Conditioner, Power Steering Conditioner dan banyak produk lainnya dimana setiap orang dapat melakukan perawatan pada kendaraan atau aktifitas lainnya secara pribadi.
Kami menciptakan produk-produk ramah lingkungan. Hal ini telah menjadi komitmen kami sejak perusahaan ini didirikan. Seperti halnya produk berbahan dasar air yang kami buat diantaranya Karburator Foam Cleaner, produk untuk poles body kendaraan dll.
Perkembangan teknologi industri otomotif semakin meningkat. Begitu juga WEALTHY yang akan terus tumbuh dan berkembang melalui R&D Departemen untuk memenuhi industri otomotif.
Dengan berkembangnya usaha utama, Wealthy Group mengembangkan bisnisnya dibidang material bangunan diantaranya Microfiber Chamois Cloth, Cutting Disk, Granding Disk dll.
Jika suatu hari melihat pengembangan produk aftermarket untuk industri otomotif dan material bangunan, dapat dipastikan itu adalah WEALTHY.

companyOverview.html:
PT. SYAPRIL JANIZAR adalah perusahaan swasta di bidang jasa konsultan yang berkedudukan di Bandung, dimiliki dan dikelola sepenuhnya oleh tenaga ahli Indonesia.
PT. SYAPRIL JANIZAR didirikan pada tanggal 12 Juli 2013 oleh tenaga-tenaga profesional yang tergerak nuraninya untuk lebih memberikan sumbangsih pemikiran, kemampuan dan kompetensinya di dalam merancang bangun, meneliti dan mengembangkan potensi sumber daya guna kepentingan pembangunan wilayah/daerah dan kesejahteraan masyarakat.
Diawali dengan beberapa tenaga ahli muda, saat ini PT. SYAPRIL JANIZAR telah memiliki tenaga ahli yang kompeten dan berpengalaman luas dalam bidang keahliannya masing-masing, agar selalu dapat mengikuti perkembangan teknologi yang senantiasa terbaharui dan untuk mempertinggi kualitas layanan kami, para tenaga ahli secara aktif ikut serta dalam program-program pengembangan sumber daya manusia, pelatihan dan seminar-seminar. Disamping itu kami juga mengundang para spesialis lokal maupun asing yang sudah diakui kepakarannya untuk dilibatkan dalam proyek-proyek yang kami laksanakan sebagai penasihat teknis apabila dibutuhkan. Dalam menangani proyek-proyek yang membutuhkan pengetahuan sangat spesifik, kami menjalin kerjasama dengan perusahaan perusahaan konsultan nasional yang berkualitas maupun konsultan asing ternama.
PT. SYAPRIL JANIZAR dalam memberikan bantuan teknis dan layanan konsultansi engineering berkualitas tinggi, perusahaan telah memiliki beberapa keunggulan sebagai berikut :
  • Tenaga inti yang terdiri dari para doktor, master dan insinyur dan spesialis profesional lainnya yang qualified sehingga dapat menjamin terlaksananya suatu pekerjaan dengan mutu terbaik.
  • Suatu database dan jaringan Tenaga Ahli berpengalaman, yang dapat menghasilkan kualitas kerja yang baik pada berbagai macam proyek.
  • Pengalaman yang cukup dalam manajemen bisnis untuk menjamin terlaksananya proyek secara ekonomis dan efisien, serta ketepatan waktu dalam pelaporan kemajuan pekerjaan.

companyOverview.html:
Logo De Corps is one of  leading fashion retail company group in Indonesia,  Logo De Corps has several brands of fashion products which is growing rapidly in the business of fashion and controlled most of casual fashion products market share in Indonesia. Our brand consist of LOGO, BOMBBOOGIE, NINETY DEGREES, BODY TALK, 10PM and FOD.
The Successful of Logo De Corps was developed by the persistence and focus to provide quality and best design. Supported by powerful teams and retail partners, Logo De Corps expect to be able to deliver excellence in every brand management.
History
Starting from the aspiration to develop the fashion business in 1980, Logo De Corps strive to make the formulation of business and started with launch the casual fashion products under the brand of LOGO for female adolescent and woman. As time goes by, LOGO became one of the fashion trend center in Indonesia. Logo De Corps seeing the considerable oppoturnities for developing the retail business in Indonesia and tried to launch others fashion products to reach different target markets. Continues with launching several barands such as BOMBBOOGIE which is casual fashion products for young men and men. In the next year, Logo De Corps launched NINETY DEGREES which is the next casual fashion products for female adolescent. Logo De Corps is also launched fashion products for woman under BODY TALK brand. Further, the development in retailing business still continued by giving new colors for consumers and also preparing all new products and brands. With the increasing number of brands and the development of retailing business, Logo De Corps very optimistic about the development of this fashion business. At this time, Logo De Corps owned 4 brands of fashion and will grow over the time. LOGO, BOMBBOOGIE, NINETY DEGREES, and BODYTALK will continue to evolve along with the development of fashion, and fashion’s trends in Indonesia and also all over the world.

companyOverview.html:
Through idealism and creativity, SHAFIRA has grown from a small muslim fashion studio into what it is now. Its name was inspired by the word “SHAF”, that does not only mean a line, but also indicates a properly structured organization.Pioneered by Feny Mustafa at Salman Mosque ITB on 8 January 1989, SHAFIRA has turned into a major company with 24 showrooms in 15 major cities across Indonesia.
With more than 30.000 active members spread across Indonesia and other countries, SHAFIRA has tried to build a good and healthy relationship with its members through activities such as health training, fashion consultation, jilbab classes and other regular member activities. In addition to the members of SHAFIRA, the company would not have been as succesful without the help and support of the mass media. SHAFIRA relatef publications have supported the company, and made it well known in public. Along with its development, Shafira’s consistency in one of the business mission that is giving benefits for others in Corporate Social Responsibility program is well managed by Shafira Foundations.
Through elegant and exclusive designs, SHAFIRA has tried its best to accommodate the needs of both men and women alike. now, at 24th years ols, SHAFIRA is trying to bring a new wave of style, with “total look” as the concept. SHAFIRA understands that attire is an important aspect of someone’s life, and tries to incorporate both design and comfort into its line of apparel. The combination of simple and elegant design in addition high quality fabric has allowed SHAFIRA to create something for every season, be it formal, or casual. Various accessories and jilbabs that are designed to harmonize with the chosen outfits are also available.

Waspadalah jika Anda menemukan hal-hal di bawah ini :
  • PT Maha Kreasi Indonesia tidak pernah memungut biaya apapun dalam proses rekrutmen.
  • PT Maha Kreasi Indonesia tidak pernah bekerja sama dengan travel agent / biro perjalanan tertentu dalam proses  rekrutmen.
  • Apabila Anda diminta untuk membayar sejumlah uang dalam bentuk pembayaran tiket pesawat dan hotel atau  akomodasi lainnya agar diabaikan.

  • Jangan memberikan data pribadi atau data keuangan Anda kepada siapapun.
We need you, Creative people !

We are Creative Squad (creative agency) based in Bandung Indonesia. We're not just agency. We actually think, create and produce our ideas. That approaces each project with passion , excitement and curiosity with method and precision.
 
We hade worked in new ways of communicating and new digital solutions since 2004, always trying to invent something new and different. We mix creativity, usability and millions idea to delivering awesome experiences for your event and your business
 
Everyone knows what to do. Like a family, we gather together and work with skill, care and method.
And like every family, we discuss, laugh, argue, decide and even hug sometimes. we Like each other and work well together.
Because of you , we make it happen.

companyOverview.html:
Profil Perusahaan
Dimulai pada tahun 2000 dimana menyuguhkan hidangan dalam peralatan plastik merupakan pemandangan yang kian akrab dengan keunggulan praktis, anti pecah, desain yang menawan dan nuansa warna yang kaya. Semua dimulai dari satu kantor dan satu pabrik di kota kembang, Bandung, Jawa Barat.
Sampai saat ini, kami berkembang memasarkan produk-produk yang inovatif dan fungsional terintegrasi melalui dua divisi usaha: Divisi Twin Tulipware dengan produk penyimpanan makanan dan peralatan masak yang ramah lingkungan dan Divisi Lady Tulip dengan produk kecantikan dan kesehatan.
Dengan filosofi Care & Grow, kami akan terus peduli dan berkembang bersama Indonesia melalui mitra kerja dan salesforce tersebar diseluruh Indonesia.
Visi dan Misi Kita
Setiap orang dan setiap rumah di Indonesia memiliki dan memakai produk Tulipware adalah visi kami dan berlandaskan bahwa kita sebagai orang Indonesia harus bangga dan menggunakan produk buatan Indonesia.
Misi kami untuk mewujudkan visi tersebut adalah sebagai berikut:
  • Kualitas (Quality and Affordable) - Menciptakan produk-produk kebutuhan rumah tangga yang berkualitas tinggi dan ramah lingkungan dengan harga terjangkau.
  • Kepuasan (Customer Satisfaction) - Mengutamakan dan meningkatkan kepuasan konsumen.
  • Karakter (Build and Empower) - Membangun institusi yang unggul di bidang pemasaran langsung dan pelatihan sumber daya manusia yang handal dibidangnya masing-masing.
  • Kesempatan (Business Opportunity) - Menjadikan peluang usaha yang menguntungkan dan berkesinambungan.

companyOverview.html:
School and Community

The Bandung Independent School is a private, independent, non-profit, co-ed school located in Bandung, Indonesia. It (formerly named Bandung International School) was established in 1972 and now serves the needs of expatriate and local community in Bandung. The student population is approximately 200 and represents 21 nationalities. The language of instruction is English. The interactive, inquiry-based program is designed to offer high academic standards through innovative teaching and learning practices.

Accreditation

The school is fully accredited by the Council of International School (CIS) based in UK; the New England Associations of School and Colleges (NEASC) based in USA, and authorized by the International Baccalaureate Organization in Geneva, Switzerland.

companyOverview.html:
KELEZATAN "CITA RASA KHAS HAKKA" WARISAN DARI NEGERI TIONGKOK Restoran Angke menyajikan masakan Cina khas Hakka, Food, masakan khas propinsi Kwang Tung. Ada rahasia dibalik kelezatan dan kekhasan masakan di restoran Angke, yaitu : Resep orisinil yang langsung dibawa dari Tiongkok oleh "Koh Po Hon" yang telah diwariskan kepada anak-anaknya, diantaranya seperti menu andalannya yaitu : ayam garam, lindung cah fumak, mun saklon, ikan tahu taosi, mun haisom. Bahan-bahan untuk makanan tidak memakai jasa pemasok, tetapi turun langsung sendiri ke pasar, sehingga bisa memilih bahan bagus dan berkwalitas yang sangat berpengaruh nantinya kepada cita rasa masakan yang disajikan
Product & Services
RESTORAN ANGKE MEMBUKA CABANG BARU DI KELAPA GADING, MENJAWAB KEBUTUHAN PENGANTIN "Menjelang ulang tahunnya yang ke 40, kami akan membuka cabang baru di Kelapa Gading Square, yang sepenuhnya dikelola dan dimiliki oleh keluarga besar restoran Angke," demikian penuturan dari Peter Leeansyah mewakili pihak keluarga restoran Angke. Bangunan ini terdiri dari 4 lantai dan akan segera beroperasi dan melakukan grand opening pada pertengahan September 2005. Restoran Angke Kelapa Gading merupakan cabang baru yang memiliki konsep perpaduan resto dan function hall/banquet dimana sangat cocok untuk acara pernikahan, ulang tahun, seminar, pameran karena ditunjang dengan fasilitas dan prasarana yang nyaman, Restoran Angke memiliki luas total 6.000 m², dibangun dengan biaya diatas 50 milyar.

companyOverview.html: The Kino Group is a fast growing and fully diversified consumer goods manufacturing company with four main lines of business, as follows: Snacks & Confectionery, Personal Care & Household products, Pharmaceutical / Over The Counter Products, and Food & Beverages. The Kino Group started the first manufacturing venture in 1997 by establishing Kino Sentra Industrindo, a confectionery manufacturing company with its factory located in Semarang, Central Java. The instant success of Kino Coffee Candy paved the way for further expansion. In 1999 Kinocare Era Kosmetindo was founded by Kino Group to compete in the highly competitive personal care market with the launch of Ovale facial cleansers. After four years the company has produced more than ten major brands in skin care, mass cologne, feminine hygiene, kids grooming and household products. In early 2003, the Kino Group expanded into the pharmaceutical market by establishing KinoAid Indonesia, which manufactures K-100 Cold Flu Medicine and Panther Energy Drink.

companyOverview.html:
Travel is not only about coming to a city, visiting places, and going home. The real journey is when you get to be a part of the locals, taste local foods, and experience the local culture. Since 2017, Bobobox exists to offer a different experience for travelers to enjoy the perfect journey. Bobobox connects travelers, from pods to the city.
Bobobox is Indonesia's hottest capsule hotel franchise startup in Bandung, the accomodation service combined with technology and IoT for smart travelers and millenial adventurers.

jobDescription.html:
Assistant Manager Working Capital and Treasury
Bandung, Full-time
Assistant Working Capital and Treasury Manager has responsibilities for cash and treasury operations, short-term borrowing and investments, as well as payments, working capital management and cash flow management. Together with Cash management specialist monitors compliance with Treasury department goals.
Things you will do
  • Lead cash management team
  • Direct, monitor project portfolios including working capital, inventory, receivable, and payable.
  • Responsible for overall Cash Management for business units within Bobobox Group
  • Manage Account Receivable and Cash Collection towards achieving timely and end to end AR ownership in terms of outstanding and overdue for each cluster
  • Participate in Supply Chain and/or Finance Performance Improvement engagements, which involve looking at inventory and project management
  • Manage relationships with key banking institutions
  • Monitor compliance activities associated with the usage of bank accounts
  • Ensure minimum cash holding and maximization of available cash
  • Provide liquidity reports for business units within the Bobobox Group
  • Monitor and coordinate cash flow forecasting for business units within Bobobox Group
  • Review weekly and monthly reporting of Bobobox performance against pre-set working capital targets
  • Present net working capital report including inventory on hand report, inventory aging, receivable aging payable aging and cash balance report to Treasury and Internal Control Manager and Head of Finance
You’ll fit in this job if you
  • Financial/Business/Accounting degree
  • At least 4 years experience of Treasury Management Systems, cash flow management techniques and working capital management
  • Proven leadership experience of multinational company, culturally diverse teams
  • Strong numerical and analytical skills, problem solver
  • Advanced skills in Excel and Powerpoint.
  • Ability to multi-task and work within tight timelines
  • High standards of Integrity and Reliability
  • Collaborative approach with the ability to work effectively in a matrix environment and across multiple teams
  • Ability to take the Initiative to make decisions and problems solve
  • Able to communicate effectively across internal & external parties
  • Excellent interpersonal and communication skills
  • Enjoys operating with a sleeves rolled up approach and can balance operational execution with leading a team
  • Specialization in Treasury is added advantage
  • Required Languages - English

PENGUMUMAN :
  • Asuransi Raksa Pratikara tidak pernah memungut biaya apapun dalam proses rekrutmen.

Asuransi Raksa Pratikara was established in 1975 and conducts business operation based on the motto “Prudent and Trusted”. Our service qualities are enshrined in our professional, reliable, experienced and conscientious staff. Armed with the latest innovative insurance knowledge, we are constantly prepared to deliver high quality insurance services to our clientele. Our services comprise 19 offices nation-wide in Indonesia supported by the latest information technology. Communications among branches are performed through on-line network.
Product & Services
Driven by the customers trust built up over the years, we never stop endeavoring to improve the quality of our services. As a testimony to our commitment to quality service, we implemented 24-hour customer service and free car-towing service within the Jakarta-Bogor-Depok-Tangerang-Bekasi area in 2003. Having gained wide acclaim from customers, the free car-towing service was expanded to the area of Bandung and Surabaya. In 2004, we once again materialized our commitment to the enhancement of customer satisfaction by launching Raksa Gold Club (RGC), which provides dedicated services to motor-car policy holders with sum-insured of and above US$ 70,000. No efforts have been spared to ensure our best services to our customers. In 2005, we created Raksa Emergency Quick Service (REQS) rendering quick assistance to customers encountering emergency on the road, such as flat tires and car engine failure. Following the success of Raksa Gold Club, we achieved another milestone in upgrading our claim service by launching Raksa Silver Club (RSC) which is specifically aimed at pampering customers with motor insurance coverage below US$ 70,000. The advent of RSC brings in a new touch in insurance world which distinguishes Asuransi Raksa Pratikara from other insurers. Under our claim service motto “MUCAK” (Mudah, Cepat, Akrab which is translated as Easy, Fast, Friendly) all customers visiting RSC will enjoy relaxing ambience and affable claim service.

companyOverview.html:
PT Finansia Multi Finance (“FMF” or “the Company”) was founded in 1994. FMF received its multifinance licence in 1994 and is fully licenced to conduct a full range of multifinance activities including consumer finance, leasing, factoring and credit cards.
Today, FMF and its kreditplus brand are established as leading players within the multifinance sector with a focus on the used motorcycle financing, used car financing and white goods financing segments. As at 30 June 2014, FMF finances 772,234 customers through a proprietary distribution network of 313 branches / POS outlets and supported by a workforce of 13,682 employees.
On its establishment, FMF adopted a dual focus on both the retail and commercial segment largely in response to the opportunities available in the market. Following the Asian Financial Crisis (“AFC”), FMF, like many other financial institutions in Indonesia, adjusted its strategic business model and risk management framework to reflect lessons learnt over the period.
Over its 20 years of operation, FMF has weathered the course of a number of credit cycles and financial crises through a willingness and flexibility to adapt its business model and practices in response to shifting regulatory and operating environments. This adaptability has provided FMF with valuable operating experience within a number of different business segments and product groups across both the retail and commercial markets.

This adaptability has provided FMF with valuable operating experience within a number of different business segments and product groups across both the retail and commercial markets.

companyOverview.html:
PT Finansia Multi Finance (“FMF” or “the Company”) was founded in 1994. FMF received its multifinance licence in 1994 and is fully licenced to conduct a full range of multifinance activities including consumer finance, leasing, factoring and credit cards.
Today, FMF and its kreditplus brand are established as leading players within the multifinance sector with a focus on the used motorcycle financing, used car financing and white goods financing segments. As at 30 June 2014, FMF finances 772,234 customers through a proprietary distribution network of 313 branches / POS outlets and supported by a workforce of 13,682 employees.
On its establishment, FMF adopted a dual focus on both the retail and commercial segment largely in response to the opportunities available in the market. Following the Asian Financial Crisis (“AFC”), FMF, like many other financial institutions in Indonesia, adjusted its strategic business model and risk management framework to reflect lessons learnt over the period.
Over its 20 years of operation, FMF has weathered the course of a number of credit cycles and financial crises through a willingness and flexibility to adapt its business model and practices in response to shifting regulatory and operating environments. This adaptability has provided FMF with valuable operating experience within a number of different business segments and product groups across both the retail and commercial markets.

companyOverview.html:
Through idealism and creativity, SHAFIRA has grown from a small muslim fashion studio into what it is now. Its name was inspired by the word “SHAF”, that does not only mean a line, but also indicates a properly structured organization.Pioneered by Feny Mustafa at Salman Mosque ITB on 8 January 1989, SHAFIRA has turned into a major company with 24 showrooms in 15 major cities across Indonesia.
With more than 30.000 active members spread across Indonesia and other countries, SHAFIRA has tried to build a good and healthy relationship with its members through activities such as health training, fashion consultation, jilbab classes and other regular member activities. In addition to the members of SHAFIRA, the company would not have been as succesful without the help and support of the mass media. SHAFIRA relatef publications have supported the company, and made it well known in public. Along with its development, Shafira’s consistency in one of the business mission that is giving benefits for others in Corporate Social Responsibility program is well managed by Shafira Foundations.
Through elegant and exclusive designs, SHAFIRA has tried its best to accommodate the needs of both men and women alike. now, at 24th years ols, SHAFIRA is trying to bring a new wave of style, with “total look” as the concept. SHAFIRA understands that attire is an important aspect of someone’s life, and tries to incorporate both design and comfort into its line of apparel. The combination of simple and elegant design in addition high quality fabric has allowed SHAFIRA to create something for every season, be it formal, or casual. Various accessories and jilbabs that are designed to harmonize with the chosen outfits are also available.

companyOverview.html:
PT Suparma Tbk was established in 1976 on a site of five (5) hectares land in Surabaya, Indonesia and employed approximately 100 people. The first paper was rolled out in 1978 using a 7,000 ton per year paper machine.
Responding to the growing paper demand in the country, in 1984 the company decided to roll out her first expansion program by adding there (3) units of Paper Machine and raised her total production capacity to 51,000 ton per year.
In 1992, the company further invested another two (2) units of Paper Machine with capacity of 99,000 tons p.a. to accommodate the strong increase of paper demand in the market in tandem with the Indonesian government industrialization program.
In line with globalization era, PT Suparma Tbk took a profound move in becoming a public company and listed in Jakarta Stock Exchange in 1994.
Today, located on a land of twenty one (21) hectares, PT Suparma Tbk operates 6 units of Paper Machine with a total combined capacity of 150,000 tons p.a. and supported by approximately 1,500 delegated employees.
Holding the motto of 'Continues Improvement', PT Suparma Tbk actively serves both domestic and international market with high quality products, services and meeting the customer expectations.

jobDescription.html:
Vela Prima Nusantara a privately funded startup company with a mission to create safe, reliable, clean, and economic urban mobility solutions. Currently our company is in conceptual design phase for urban air mobility (UAM) project. This is a good opportunity for you to be involved in the early aircraft development design process for compliance with strict airworthiness requirements for commercial transport. You will work with very experienced senior engineers from aerospace industry here in Indonesia. Let’s build a great product to be remembered by future generations.
  • Candidate must possess at least Bachelor's or Master's Degree/Post Graduate Degree in Engineering (Aviation/Aeronautics/Astronautics), Engineering (Mechanical) or equivalent.

  • At least 1 Year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.
  • Required Skill(s): Basic Aircraft Development and one of the following aeronautics specialisation knowledge: Configuration, Flight Control, Avionics, Flight Physics, Propulsion, Lightweight Structure, Electrical, Safety
  • Related skill(s), specialisation specific: Matlab, Python, C, C++, AutoCAD, Catia, Solidworks, ANSYS Mechanical, ANSYS CFD, Nastran
  • Preferably Staff (non-management & non-supervisor) specialized in Engineering - Others or equivalent.
  • Good communication skill and team player
  • Excited to explore many design considerations

companyOverview.html:
Through idealism and creativity, SHAFIRA has grown from a small muslim fashion studio into what it is now. Its name was inspired by the word “SHAF”, that does not only mean a line, but also indicates a properly structured organization.Pioneered by Feny Mustafa at Salman Mosque ITB on 8 January 1989, SHAFIRA has turned into a major company with 24 showrooms in 15 major cities across Indonesia.
With more than 30.000 active members spread across Indonesia and other countries, SHAFIRA has tried to build a good and healthy relationship with its members through activities such as health training, fashion consultation, jilbab classes and other regular member activities. In addition to the members of SHAFIRA, the company would not have been as succesful without the help and support of the mass media. SHAFIRA relatef publications have supported the company, and made it well known in public. Along with its development, Shafira’s consistency in one of the business mission that is giving benefits for others in Corporate Social Responsibility program is well managed by Shafira Foundations.
Through elegant and exclusive designs, SHAFIRA has tried its best to accommodate the needs of both men and women alike. now, at 24th years ols, SHAFIRA is trying to bring a new wave of style, with “total look” as the concept. SHAFIRA understands that attire is an important aspect of someone’s life, and tries to incorporate both design and comfort into its line of apparel. The combination of simple and elegant design in addition high quality fabric has allowed SHAFIRA to create something for every season, be it formal, or casual. Various accessories and jilbabs that are designed to harmonize with the chosen outfits are also available.

companyOverview.html:
The services that customers ask of a logistics company are becoming more and more varied and customized.  Whether you are sending goods or documents, you need the assurance that these will be sent quickly, safely and efficiently.  If your business involves  delivery of goods, you will need to contact various service providers for packaging, licensing, documentation services, and a courier or freight forwarder.  Each time you send a package, you will need to contact at least three different service providers.
RPX is here to facilitate and shorten this process. Whatever type of goods or documents you need to send, wherever you wish to send them, whether by air, land or sea, we have the infrastructure and network at your disposal. Even customs clearance and storage while your goods are in transit can be managed by RPX. RPX is supported by the latest state-of-the-art technology to answer your every needs. The comprehensive services offered by RPX along with our local and international network throughout the major cities in Indonesia and the world, will make everything easy for you.
For career development, RPX provides a various range of career opportunities at different levels throughout Indonesia. Here, you will be given chances to develop yourself, take responsibilities, master challenges, overcome problems, and improve your skills. We are committed to stimulate your improvement and development, and support your growth, to help you achieve your goals and succeed with us.

companyOverview.html:
Everything written about eCommerce opportunity in Southeast Asia is overwhelmingly positive - a population of 600 million plus consumers, growing internet connectivity, broad penetration of smartphones, a young and tech-savvy population and expanding GDP and purchasing power. The region’s rate of eCommerce share of total retail at around 1 percent shows enormous opportunity in comparison to 14-17% in the west and China.
Despite these extraordinary possibilities, the logistics environment in Southeast Asia remains a huge challenge.
Lazada eLogistics (LeL) mission is to address these challenges, delight customers and win them over to eCommerce. We are building an innovative, highly visible, low-cost logistics network. Our operating model is based on an ecosystem of logistics partners stitched together with state of the art technology and our modular infrastructure
Lazada eLogistics (LeL) is the Logistics arm of the Lazada Group and is structured around four operating Business Units
  • Express: own B2C last mile delivery capabilities from pick-up to sort to delivery
  • Transport: Management of our ecosystem of partners (3PLs) along all the transportation components
  • Fulfilment: Operation of a network of warehouses that can fill retail orders on our own behalf, as well as providing fulfilment services to merchants and international brands
  • Crossborder: Build-up & management of international logistics network giving seamlessly access to ASEAN

companyOverview.html:
PT Sanbe Farma adalah perusahaan farmasi yang berkantor pusat di Bandung, saat ini Kami sedang membutuhkan karyawan baru yang professional, cekatan dan bertanggung jawab untuk dapat bergabung bersama kami
Sanbe Farma was founded in 1975. As of now after more than three decades since inception, we are the largest pharmaceutical manufacturers in Indonesia and according the recent IMS Report, we rank highest among all the Pharmaceutical Manufacturers in Indonesia including Multinational Companies. Out of top 10 products ethically prescribed, 4 products are from Sanbe. Our market coverage in Indonesia includes more than 37,000 Doctors served by 1,000 Medical Representatives, through our associate’s net-work of 1,100 Sales persons, 35 depots, 60 sub-depots and our corporate work force consisting 8,000 personnel. Our eight manufacturing facilities in Indonesia are cGMP approved plants as per the International Standards. Our sterile preparations unit (LVPs & SVPs) is the first in South East Asia with State-of-the-Art manufacturing equipment and technology from US and Europe and PIC(S) & TGA, Australia compliant.
Our international operations in 20 countries are set to make substantial contribution to the global healthcare. Our international operations cover not only export of our formulations to various developing and under developed countries, but also seek partnerships and alliances from and to developed and regulated markets such as North America and Europe with an aim to put Sanbe Farma on the global map to supply Generic and specialty formulations not only for Indonesia but also to the rest of the world. We are also looking for new acquisitions in potential markets to make our products globally available at affordable prices.
Our propinquity to invest in profitable and strategic ventures would encourage potential and strategic companies to partner with us for mutual benefit not only for generic formulations but also for New Drug Delivery Systems (NDDs), New Chemical Entities (NCEs) and Biosimilar products.
We are committed to strive for continued achievement to provide quality products for quality health through our sincere endeavor to become global generic pharmaceutical manufacturer from Indonesia in the days to come.

companyOverview.html:
FKS Group is a South-East Asian holding company focused on food, energy and property.
Its companies combine a strong commitment to logistics and infrastructure with deep domestic and international understanding to realize the potential of businesses and people across the region.
The Group’s commitment is strengthened by more than 40 years of experience and expertise that extends globally to sourcing, manufacturing, refining, logistics, shipping, financing, risk management as well as trading logistics, shipping, financing, risk management as well as trading.
Rapidly growing, FKS Group is focusing on import, trading, process and distribution of physical grain commodities such as food and feed in Indonesia. As the number one importer and distributor of soybean and soybean meal in Indonesia, the Group handles huge supply chain volume in both food and feed sectors.
FKS Group strives to exceed stakeholders’ expectation and investment by ensuring a continued growth of the Group and developing employee’s competencies. The Group’s significant interests in sugar refineries, energy and property developments are managed by the subsidiaries.
For more information please visit www.fksgroup.com

We created this brand of our commitment to take on a new challenge to leverage on Recruit Group’s more over 50 years of industry experience and business network in Japan, to provide new opportunities to our clients across the region.

companyOverview.html:
PT Finansia Multi Finance (“FMF” or “the Company”) was founded in 1994. FMF received its multifinance licence in 1994 and is fully licenced to conduct a full range of multifinance activities including consumer finance, leasing, factoring and credit cards.
Today, FMF and its kreditplus brand are established as leading players within the multifinance sector with a focus on the used motorcycle financing, used car financing and white goods financing segments. As at 30 June 2014, FMF finances 772,234 customers through a proprietary distribution network of 313 branches / POS outlets and supported by a workforce of 13,682 employees.
On its establishment, FMF adopted a dual focus on both the retail and commercial segment largely in response to the opportunities available in the market. Following the Asian Financial Crisis (“AFC”), FMF, like many other financial institutions in Indonesia, adjusted its strategic business model and risk management framework to reflect lessons learnt over the period.
Over its 20 years of operation, FMF has weathered the course of a number of credit cycles and financial crises through a willingness and flexibility to adapt its business model and practices in response to shifting regulatory and operating environments. This adaptability has provided FMF with valuable operating experience within a number of different business segments and product groups across both the retail and commercial markets.

PENGUMUMAN :
  • PT. DGIT Systems Indonesia tidak pernah memungut biaya apapun dalam proses rekrutmen.
  • PT. DGIT Systems Indonesia tidak pernah bekerja sama dengan travel agent / biro perjalanan tertentu dalam proses rekrutmen.

  • Jika membutuhkan klarifikasi lebih lanjut dapat langsung menghubungi PT. DGIT Systems Indonesia
DGIT is a specialist supplier of software and services to digital and communications service providers, using cutting-edge technology to create intuitive, flexible and highly customisable solutions for the modern digital marketplace.
DGIT is the creator of Telflow, the multi-award winning quote-to-cash platform that provides CPQ, order capture, provisioning and inventory management for digital and communications service providers. DGIT is also home to Inomial, the innovative revenue management and billing platform that handles subscription management and billing solutions for telecommunications carriers, digital media distributors, utilities companies and cloud service providers. Together, Telflow and Inomial can be used to seamlessly automate and effortlessly manage the complete end-to-end opportunity-to-operate journey for digital and communications services.
DGIT plays a key role in contributing to the B2B and REST API standards advanced by the TM Forum, and has been consistently recognised by TM Forum awards for its role in transforming the operations of digital and communications service providers, and for its outstanding open architecture and API design. DGIT is also a significant contributor to the Metro Ethernet Forum (MEF) in the area of inter-provider wholesale B2B APIs.
Originally founded in Melbourne in 2005, DGIT now has offices in Melbourne, Auckland and Denpasar – with around 100 employees across these three locations – and is represented by partners in the Asia-Pacific, the UK, North America, Africa and the Middle East. DGIT has almost 80 customers including Tier 1 and Tier 2 telecommunications providers, digital service providers and enterprise organisations, and is rapidly expanding its customer base around the world.

jobDescription.html:
We are looking for a contract based talented Java engineer to join an experienced team of engineers working on our flagship to support our products: Telflow, a next-generation service delivery platform for telecommunications and cloud providers (http://telflow.com), and Inomial, a high-performance ecosystem of billing microservices (http://inomial.com). In this role you will be challenged to resolve complex problems while providing workarounds as temporary solution.
  • Get hands-on experience supporting a globally competitive software platform using the latest technology and a microservices architecture.m
  • Learn new technologies with support and coaching from senior developers in Indonesia and abroad.
  • Work safely and comfortably remotely taking advantage of our teleworking experience to continue to learn and collaborate with peers from around the world.
  • Join a fun and casual office with like-minded, clever peers - when the pandemic clears!
If you are passionate about technology, working remotely, love helping customers achieve their goals, and are enthusiastic about learning new skills and applying them to real-world problems, we want to hear from you!
What you will do
  • Troubleshooting complex problems and incidents while providing workarounds as temporary solution
  • Work independently and collaboratively in a creative and agile team
  • Work with a global team on an award-winning software product
  • Design, develop continuously deploy solutions and new product features for our customers
  • Contribute ideas to the product design and architecture
  • Continuously improve technologies and processes with support from seniors and architects
Skills we are looking for:
  • Creative person with awesome troubleshooting and analysing skill
  • Great attention to details
  • Ability to work well with others in a collaborative team environment
  • Excellent English communication
  • Software development experience in Java
  • Desirable - Knowledge of common integration technologies (GraphQL, Kafka, REST, SOAP, JMS etc.)
  • SQL experience (PostgreSQL, MySQL, Oracle etc)
  • Desirable - Knowledge of Design Patterns and UML
  • For this position we will consider applicants of any experience level (as long as you meet the above criteria), and adjust pay accordingly
Our technology:
  • High performance PostgreSQL – SQL  PL/PGSQL
  • Cutting-edge integration technologies – Kafka, GraphQL
  • Business Process Management and Rules libraries (Activiti, Drools, etc)
  • Docker microservices  Docker Swarm orchestration
  • High performance  Highly available architectures, data structures and algorithms
  • Training in Telecommunications and Service Provider Domain
Benefits : 
  • Contract based employment
  • We reward high achieving employees with pay above industry average  
  • BPJS
  • 12 days annual leave and other personal leave 
Your application  
Please include your academic  results, and  provide your CV in English only.

companyOverview.html:
Yayasan Syiar Bangsa didirikan pada tanggal 16 April 2012 yang berlokasi di Gedung Sekolah Islam Al-Azhar Summarecon Bekasi. Pada awalnya Yayasan Syiarbangsa dibentuk oleh PT. Summarecon Agung sebagai perwujudan tanggung jawab sosial dalam bentuk pendidikan professional, bersama-sama dengan Yayasan Pendidikan Islam (YPI) Al-Azhar yang berpusat di Sisimangaraja Kebayoran Baru-Jakarta Selatan, berkerja sama mendirikan dan mengelola Sekolah Islam Al-Azhar Summarecon Bekasi.

Untuk mengemban misi Syiar Islam, Yayasan Syiar Bangsa juga mengelola Masjid Raya Al-Azhar yang menjadi salah satu landmark di Kawasan Hunian Summarecon Bekasi, terletak di Jalan Bulevar Utara yang bersebelahan dengan Sekolah Islam Al-Azhar Summarecon Bekasi. Yayasan Syiar Bangsa juga berperan dalam kegiatan-kegiatan yang diadakan di Masjid Raya Al-Azhar seperti Kuliah Dhuha setiap Sabtu & Minggu pagi, dan kegiatan keagamaan lainnya.
Yayasan Syiar Bangsa memiliki beberapa Program Kerja yaitu :
I.  Program Kerja Jangka Pendek.
Pendirian Gedung Sekolah
Mendirikan Gedung Sekolah untuk tingkat usia SMP dan SMA bagi masyarakat sekitar kawasan Summarecon Bekasi
Penyelenggaraan Fasilitas Pendidikan
Mengelola dan menyediakan Fasilitas Pendidikan berupa SMP Islam Al-Azhar 31 dan SMA Islam Al-Azhar 8 Summarecon Bekasi bagi seluruh warga masyarakat Bekasi khususnya di sekitar kawasan Summarecon Bekasi

II.  Program Kerja Jangka Menengah.
1.  Dukungan Program Sekolah
Membantu program Sekolah dalam upaya memperoleh Akreditasi A dari BAN
Mendukung Sekolah dalam peningkatan sistem pengelolaan Sekolah yang lebih
2.  Pengembangan Sekolah
Mewujudkan bangunan Sekolah Dasar Islam dan mengelola operasional sekolah

III.  Program Kerja Jangka Panjang.
1.  Modernisasi pengelolaan Yayasan.
Menjadikan Yayasan sebagai Institusi modern yang menerapkan sistem pengelolaan dan administrasi berbasiskan Teknologi Informasi
2.  Standarisasi Pengelolaan
Berupaya meraih sertifikasi ISO 9001 versi 2008
Pembiayaan
Mampu mandiri secara finansial dan berkontribusi kepada masyarakat sekitar.
4.  Pengembangan Fasilitas Publik
Apabila dipandang perlu akan mengupayakan pembangunan Sekolah lain di kawasan Summarecon Group.

RGF is stands for RECRUIT GLOBAL  FAMILY, a global brand of Japan’s largest recruiting and information service company, Recruit Holdings co., Ltd.
We created this brand of our commitment to take on a new challenge to leverage on Recruit Group’s more over 50 years of industry experience and business network in Japan, to provide new opportunities to our clients across the region.
RGF HR AGENT takes charge of RGF’s business entity in general recruitment services. We provide total human resource services to clients at every stage of staff placement, such as evaluation, remuneration, and staff training. At the same time, we assist job-seekers in various ways to find the right job according to their individual preferences and experiences. Besides our services to assist full time staff recruitment, we also offer a range of support services for RPO (Recruitment Process Outsourcing) and contract base/temporary recruitment needs.
Our Company’s status as the Japan #1 market share holder in human resource, temporary staffing, and job advertisement field makes it possible for us to provide high quality total human resource management services not only in Japan but across the region.
We just open our RGF HR AGENT Brand in Indonesia on 1st May, 2013 and will continue and expand the business for the future.
